102b4('dul ba): gzu bo 'dul ba 'dzin pas chos rnam pa 'di lnga dang ldan pas rtsad pa zhi bar byas na bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur te/lnga gang zhe na/nyes pa la nyes par brjod cing nyes
102b5('dul ba): pa med pa la nyes pa med par brjod pa dang /lci ba la lci bar brjod cing /yang ba la yang bar brjod pa dang /lhab ma dang bcas pa la lhag ma dang bcas par brjod cing /
102b6('dul ba): lhag ma med pa la lhag ma med par brjod pa dang /nyes pa med pa'i gang zag la nyes pa med par brjod cing /nyes pa yod pa'i gang zag la nyes pa yod par brjod pa dang /nyes
102b7('dul ba): pa med pa'i gang zag la nyes pa med par rtog par byed cing nyes pa yod pa'i gang zag la nyes pa yod par rtog par byed/u pa li gzu bo 'dul ba 'dzin pa chos rnam pa de lnga dang ldan pas rtsod pa
103a1('dul ba): zhi bar byas na bsod nams mang du 'bulnga par 'gyur//u ba li ng+ge wA bsnun/de bzhin du bslab par bya ste rjod pa byung zhing skyes pa la ji ltar chos bzhin
103a2('dul ba): ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin/ji ltar ston pas bstan pa bzhin zhi bar bya'i snyam du u ba li khyod kyis de bzhin du bsrab par gyis shig/'dul po las byung ba rnam pa bcu drug
103a3('dul ba): ces bya ba rdzogs//sgra rnams kyi mdo bsdus pa ste/bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang po dang //so sa phyung dkyil 'khor dang //de bzhin na lab byang sems te//
103a4('dul ba): gzhi rnams ni 'dir bsdu so//mdor bsdus pa ste/bsnyen par rdzogs dang lhag pa dang //yongasu dag dang bskor bas//phyed dang gsum dang sde dag dang //chad pa dag kyang
103a5('dul ba): de bzhin no//blangs pa dang ni sha rjen dang //bsdus pa rnams ni mdor bshad pa'o//mdor na bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa na//bud med skyes par mngon du gnas//rab
103a6('dul ba): tu ma byung bsnyen par rdzogs//bar chad dag kyang rnam pa bzhi//mkhan po med dang bya rog dang //dang po'i sder yang brjod pa'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du
103a7('dul ba): yod pa'i 'a te tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' raban bzhugs pa'i tshe/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la chi dang ldan pa u bo las zhus so/bathun pa
103b1('dul ba): par rdzogs pa'i tshe mtshan 'phos na de ston par rdzogs pa zhes dgyi 'am/d+hu/ bsnyen blam rdzogs pa zhes bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka/
103b2('dul ba): stsal pa/u pa li bsnyen par ni rdzogs mod kyi/dge slong ma'i nang du ni thod shig/btsun pa dge slong dag gis bud med skyes pa 'dra ba skyes pa'i dbyangs can
103b3('dul ba): skyes pa'i skad du smra ba skyes pa'i sgra can//skyes pa'i dbyibs lta bu zhig bsnyen par rdzogs par bgyis na/bsnyen par rdzogs par zhes bogyi 'am/bsnyen par ma rdzogs
103b4('dul ba): pa zhes bgyi/u paM li bsnyen par ni rdzogs mod kyi/bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa ni 'das pa dang bces par 'gyuraro//btsun pa skyes pa zhig las bud med pa dang 'dre ba bud
103b5('dul ba): med kyi dbyangs can/bud med kyi sgo can bud med kyi dbyibs lta bu zhig bsnyen par rdzogs par bgyis na/de bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes bgyi'am/bsnyen par ma rdzogs
103b6('dul ba): ba zhes bgyi/u pa li bsnyen par ni rdzogs mod kyi/bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa ni 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyuraro//btsun pa rab tu ma byung bar dge slong dag gis
103b7('dul ba): bsnyen par rdzogs par bgyis na/de bsnyen par rdzogs par zhes bgyis/de bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhi bgyis/u pa li bsnyen par ni rdzogs med kyi
104a1('dul ba): bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa ni 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro//btsun pa bsnyen par ma rdzogs par mkhan po bgyis te dge slong dag gis
104a2('dul ba): bsnyen par rdzogs par bgyis na/bsnyen par rdzogs par zhes babya 'am/bsnyen par ma rdzogs par zhes bgyi//u pa li snyen par ni rdzogs mod kyi/bsnyen par rdzo
104a3('dul ba): par byed pa ni 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro//btsun pa bar chad kyi chos dang ldan la bdag bar chad kyi chos dang yang ldano//zhes bya mtsho bzhin du dge slong dag gis
104a4('dul ba): bsnyen par rdzogs par bgyis na/bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes bgyi'am/bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa zhes bgyi/u pa li bsnyen par yang ma rdzogs la bsnyen par rdzogs
104a5('dul ba): par byed pa yang 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro//btsun pa bar chad kyi chos dang mi ldan la bdag bar chad kyi chos dang ldan zhes mchi ba zhig dge slong dag gis bsnyen
104a6('dul ba): par rdzogs par dgyes na/de bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes bgyi 'am/bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa zhes bgyi/u pa li bsnyen par ni rdzogs mod kyi/bsnyen par rdzogs
104a7('dul ba): par byed pa de dag ni 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyuraro//btsun pa bar chad kyi chos dang yang mi ldan la bdag bar chad kyi chos dang yang mi ldano zhes mchi ba zhig dge slong
104b1('dul ba): dag gis bsnyen par rdzogs par bgyis na/de bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes pagyi 'am/bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa zhes bgyi/u pa la bsnyen par yang rdzo/la bsnyen par rdzogs
104b2('dul ba): par byed pA laM yang 'dres pa dang bcas par mi 'gyu ro//betsun pa mkhan po mu mchis bzhin du dge slong dag gis bsnyen par rdzogs par bgyis ni/de bsnyen par rdzogs
104b3('dul ba): pa zhes bgyi 'am/bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa zhes bgyi/u pa le bsnyen par ni rdzogs mod kyi/bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa dag ni 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyu ro//
104b4('dul ba): btsun pa mkhan po dang ldan par dge sbyong dag gis bsnyen par rdzogs par bgyis ni/de bsnyen par rdzogs pA n+de bgyi 'am/bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa zhes bgyi/u pa la
104b5('dul ba): bsnyen par yang rdzogs la bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa la yang 'das pa dang bcas par mi 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/
104b6('dul ba): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis lo bdun sanupa bya rog skrod nus na rab tu phyung shig ces gsungs ni/btsun pa lo drug lon pa de yang dge 'dun gyi sgo sar bya rog kyang skrod nus
104b7('dul ba): na de rab tu dbyung bar bgyi 'am/rab tu mi dbyung bar 'gyi/u pa li lo bdun lon par bya ba'i phyir te rab tu dbyung bar mi bya'o//btsun pa lo bdun ni lon na dge 'dun
105a1('dul ba): gyi bsgos nas bya rog skrong mi nus na de yang rab tu dbyung bar bgyi 'am/u pa yi bya rog mu par bya ba'i phyir te/rab tu dbyung bar mi bya'o//gleng gzhi'o//
105a2('dul ba): nang na sgo thog ma'i mdo tshigasu bcad pa dang po'o////mdor na/bram ze dang yang nyin par dang //dkor 'chos grangs de bzhin te//lhag pa dag dang lo drug dang //
105a3('dul ba): drug tu bya dang bcu bzhi dang //shol ba'i zla bar sbyar ba ste//'dra ba rnams la'ang de bzhi bya//dge slong 'khod pa'i gnas na ni//bslab pa 'byin pas klag par bya'o//sangs
105a4('dul ba): rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na/'dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dpyang ra ba na bzhugs pa'i tshe/bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams dge slong dgi gan du 'ongs
105a5('dul ba): nas/'phags pa de ring tshes grangs du zhes dris pa dang /de dag gis smras pa/kye mi shes//bram ze dang khyim bdug gis smras pa mu stegs can gyis kyang tshes grangs
105a6('dul ba): dang nyi ma dang skar ma dang yud tsam yang shes na/khyed chag rab tu byung na tshes grangs tsam yang mi shes sam/de dag lan med nas cang mi zer bar 'dug/de ltar gyur
105a7('dul ba): pa dge slong gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de lta bas na tshe grangs bgrang bar ngas rjesu gnango zhes gsungs pa dang
105b1('dul ba): dge slong thams cad kyang bgrang ba la zhug so//de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gos bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/thams cad
105b2('dul ba): kyis me bgra dA brda dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan dang /gtsug lel khang skyong gnyis kyis grangs shig/dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan dang khang skyong gnyis kyang ma dran nas/de dag
105b3('dul ba): hUMnyes pa'i dmig skye gyur pa dang /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsom pa dang /'jim pa ri lu ba ci ste byos la spyod bu la brgyus te nog lany+tsi ma
105b4('dul ba): re zhing dran par gyis shig/srad bu 'phyongs par gyur pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od ma'i byang bu bco lnga byos la spyad bu la brgyus te zhig la/de las nyin cig cing
105b5('dul ba): rI re grongs shig ces gsungs pa dang dge slong thams cad kyis de bzhin bgrangs pa dang dran pa nyams par gyur te/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge 'dun
105b6('dul ba): gyi gnas brtan gyis bgrang bar gyis shug/bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis yang der 'ongs nas 'phags pa de ring ches glengs du nas dris pa dang /dge slong dag
105b7('dul ba): dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan dang khang skyong gis sheso//der gtad pa dang de dag gis smras pa/'phags pa ci de dge khyed kyi chos grangs kyi mdzad pa yin nam/ci khyed
106a1('dul ba): dris na ci'i phyir gzhan la gtong /khyed cag nyid kyis smyos shig/de dag lan med nas cang mi zer bar 'khod do//bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'phya
106a2('dul ba): zhing gtsug khang nas byung ste dong ngo //de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/bram ze dang khyim bdog
106a3('dul ba): rnams 'bye ba ni yus te/de bas dge 'dun gyi nang du tshes grangs brjod par bya'o snyam du dgongs nas/dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams
106a4('dul ba): 'phya ba ni yus kyi de lta bas na dge 'dun gyi nang du tshes grangs brjod par gyis shig/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge 'dun gyi nang du tshes grangs brjod par gyis shig ces
106a5('dul ba): bka' stsal pa dang /dge slong rnams kyis dge 'dun gyi nang du tshes grangs brjod kyis zla ba byed po 'dzin par mi byed//khyim bdag dang bram ze dag gis smras pa/'phags
106a6('dul ba): pa khyed kyis zla ba phyed po bzung ba yang mi shes te/de ltar ma gzung na yar gyi zla ba phyed dang mar gyi zla ba phyed po ji lta bur shes par 'gyur/de dag lan med nas cang mi
106a7('dul ba): zer bar 'khod do//de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/zla ba phyed po zung la tshes
106b1('dul ba): grangs brjod par bya'o//brjod pa ni 'di bzhin du bya ste/dge 'dun thams cad 'dus shing 'khod pa dang /dge slong cig gis rgan rims kyi drang por 'dug la rim gro dang bcas
106b2('dul ba): pas thal mo sbyar la tshig 'di skad du smros shig/de ring ni zla ba mar gyi tshes gcig ste/gtsug lag khang gi bdag po dang /lha rnams kyi phyir tshig su bcad pa re re brjod cig/
106b3('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyis tshes grangs ni brjod kyi gtsug lag khang gi bdag po'i ming nas ma smos pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gtsug lag khang gi bdag po'i
106b4('dul ba): ming nas kyang brjod par bya'o//'di skad du sbyin bdag ming 'di zhes bya bas sang dge slong gi dge 'dun rnaM ba shos la spyan drangs kyis de la btsun pa rnams kyis dge ba'i yid kyis brtse bar
106b5('dul ba): mdzod cig gtsug lag khang gi bdag po la ji lta ba gzhan yang sbyin par byed pa dang /sbyin pa'i bdag po lo yang dge ba'i yid kyis brtse bar mdzod cig/ji ltar dge ba'i yid
106b6('dul ba): kyis brtse bar mdzad pas na de'i dge ba'i chos rnams 'phel bar 'gyur gyis/'grib par mo 'gyur ro//de bzhin du gzhan yang de na rkyen du gnas pa'i sems can thams cad la
106b7('dul ba): yang so so'i ming nas brjod par bya'o//dge slong dag gis kyang tshig thams cad rdzogs pa'i rjes la so so nas tshigasu bcad pa re re lhogs shig/bram ze dang khyim bdag dag yang der
107a1('dul ba): 'ongs nas 'phags pa de ring tshes du zhes dris pa dang de dag gis smras pa/k+She de ring ni bco lnga'o//bram ze dang khyim bdag gis smras pa/'phags pa 'jig rten
107a2('dul ba): thams cad kyi ni de ring bcu bzhin/khyed cag gi ji ltar bco lnga ci khyed cag zhag 'dums par mi byed dam/de ltar gyur pa'i dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa
107a3('dul ba): dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/zhag 'dums par yang byos shig/bcom ldan 'das kyis zhag 'dums par byos shig ces gsungs pa dang /dge slong dag zla
107a4('dul ba): ba phyed phyed cing zhag 'dums par byed//bram ze dang khyim bdag dag yang der lhags nas 'phags pa de ring tshes grangs du zhes dris pa dang /dge slong dag gis smras pa/kye de ring
107a5('dul ba): nged kyi bcu bzhi'o//de dag gis yang smras pa 'phags pa de ring 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi bco lngan khyed cag gis ji ltar bcu bzhi/ci khyed cag zla ba phyed phyed cing zhag re 'dum
107a6('dul ba): par byed dam de dag gis smras pa 'dums par byed//bram ze dang khyim bdag dag de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis
107a7('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'phya ba ni yus te/de lta bas na zla ba byed phyed cing zhag 'dums par ma byed cig/dus gcig gi zla ba phyed dang
107b1('dul ba): nyis 'das shing zhag bdums par byos shog/destan lo gtsogs gso sbyin bcu ban ban d+hak+Sha/de'i lhag marnams mo bco lnga'o//do nam+b+ha yang bram ze dang khyim bdag
107b2('dul ba): rnams lhags nas 'phags pa dang ltar gyi zla ba 'di khyod kyis gang zhes dris pa dang /dge slong dag gis smras pa/kyai tid ky-i ni dbyar zla tha chung po//de dag gis smras pa/'gyu
107b3('dul ba): ba 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi ni zla ba 'dridi debyur zla ba rling po na/ji ltar khyed kyi dpyang zla tha chungasaci khyod kyis zla ba ba shol po mabor rama~M/ma bor ro//bram ze dang khyim
107b4('dul ba): bdag drug 'byung bar byur //de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/bcom ldan 'das la gsil pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams
107b5('dul ba): 'phya ba ni yus kyis/de lta bas na zla ba shol bor cig/bcom ldan 'das kyis zla ba sham bor cig ces gsungs pa dang /dge slong dag gis lo re re zhing shol bor ro//
107b6('dul ba): bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams snang der lhags nas 'phags pa de ltar sti zla ba 'di khyed kyis gang zhes dris pa dang /dge slong dag giswA smrasdu pa/kye reng cag gi dA ltar nA
107b7('dul ba): dbyar zla 'bring ba'o//de dag gis kyang smras pa/'phags pa 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi ni zla ba 'di dbyar zla tha chungs ni khyed cag gis ji ltar dbyar zla 'bring po/ci khyed
108a1('dul ba): cag lo re re zhing shol 'dor ram/de dag gis smras pa darjong //bram ze dag khyim gdag dag 'phya nas de ltar gyur pa dag gis/bcom ldan 'das la
108a2('dul ba): gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag khyim bad /dang bram ze rnams dbya ba ni sus kyi po de lta bsaM na la re re zhing zla ba shol ma dor bar
108a3('dul ba): drug drug cing shol bor cig/lo drug lnga sum ste de lta bur zhag dang zla ba phyed do dang blab dang po bskyes na mnyam par 'gyur te/mu stegs can gyis glags btsal kyang
108a4('dul ba): blags mi rnyed par 'gyuraro//bcom ldan 'das kyis lo drug drug cing shom bor ces gsungs pa dang /dge slong dag gis lo drug drug cing zla ba shol 'dor ro//rgyal po
108a5('dul ba): dag ni gsum gsum zhing shol 'dor bar byed//dge slong dag gis de bzhin tu byas pa dang /blon po dge 'phya bar gyur nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'dra
108a6('dul ba): gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dgra rtsod so rnams dbya ba ni sus te da b+ha badz+ra ni rgyal po'i gzhung bzhin du yang gyis shig/sker mi
108a7('dul ba): mi mthun par rgyu ste/dge slong dag gis sna zur mi sbyor ba dang /sbrang ma rje bya rnams pa dbar rtse slong rnams man d+h+ya nas de ltar gyur pa dbye slong dag gis/ma
108b1('dul ba): 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong rnams skar ma rtsi ba dag 'phya ba ni yus te/de bas na skar ma'i rje su yang 'jug par byos shig/gleng
108b2('dul ba): gzhi'i nang nas sgo dang po'i mdo'i tshig su bcas pa gnyis pa'o///mdor na/yongasu dag pa gnyis bya dang //mtshams kyang rnam pa bzhir bya ste//de bzhin dang
108b3('dul ba): pa na mkha' las//ma bkrol bar yang snga ma bzhin//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' bar na bzhugaso//bcom
108b4('dul ba): ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/btsun pa mtshams kyi nang na mchis pas mtshams kyi slad rol na mchis pa rnams la yongasu dag pa stsal tu rung ngam/u
108b5('dul ba): pe li mi rung ngo //btsun pa mtshams kyi slad rol na mchis pas mtshams kyi nang na mchis pa las yongasu dag pa sbrul tu rung ngam/u pa la mi rungango //btsun pa mtshams
108b6('dul ba): kyi nang na/mchis pas mtshams kyi slad rol na mchis pa'i las bgyir rung ngam/u pa li mi rungango //btsun pa mtshams kyi slad rol na mchis pas mtshams kyi nang na mchis
108b7('dul ba): pa'i las bgyir rung ngam/u pa li mi rungango //btsun pa las bgyid pa mtshams kyi nang na mchis bzhin du/mtshams kyi slad rol na mchis pa rnams la las bgyir rung
109a1('dul ba): /dam/u pa li mi rung //btsun pa las bgyid pa mtshams kyi slad rol na mchis bzhin du mtshams kyi nang na mchis pa rnams la las bgyir rung ngam/
109a2('dul ba): u pa li mi rung //sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u ba lis zhus pa/btsun pa dad pa len pa'i dge slong gis dad pa blangs nas na mkha' las mchis na
109a3('dul ba): pa blangs pa zhes bgyi'am/ma blangs pa zhes bgyi/u pa li ma blangs pa ste/gdod log shig/btsun pa mtshams snga ma ma bkrol bar slad ma dgum du rung ngam/
109a4('dul ba): u pa li mi rung //gleng gzhi'i nang nas sgo dang po'i mdo sde'i tshig su bcad pa gsum pa'o////bam po so gcig pa/mdor na/bskor ba dang ni 'jig pa dang /
109a5('dul ba): shing dang sa'i skye ba dang //mi 'byung ba dang 'byung bar byed//'chi ba yang ni de bzhin no//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i 'dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi/
109a6('dul ba): kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs pa'i tshe/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/btsun pa mtshams la mtshams kyis bskor du rung ngam/u pa
109a7('dul ba): li dkyil 'khor dang /chus bskor ba dang /dge slong ma'i dbyar mo khang ma gtogs par gzhan mi rung ngo //mtshams la mtshams kyis gzhig tu rung ngam/u pa li mi
109b1('dul ba): rung ngo //btsun pa rnam pa dus mtshams 'jig par 'gyur/u pa li lnga ste/dge 'dun thams cad kyis bor te dong ba dang /dA gau 'dun thams cad mtshan 'phos pa dang /
109b2('dul ba): dge 'dun thams cad slar babs pa dang /dge 'dun thams cad 'dus byas pa dang /gsol ba'i las dang lnga'o//btsun pa shing cig las gtsug lag khang gnyis kyi mtsham
109b3('dul ba): dgum du rung ngam/u pa li rung //de bzhin du gtsug lag khang gsum mam bzhi yang rung ste/shing nyid ni gcal bar byas shig/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ljongs ka
109b4('dul ba): shir spyad pa spyod pa na gnas gzhan zhig tu 'dzum pa mdzad do//chos nyid kyis nam sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe na 'od sngon po ser po dmar po
109b5('dul ba): dkar po rnamaso zhal nas byung ste/kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro/kha cig ni steng du 'gro/'og tu song ba de rnams ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang //thig nag dang /kun
109b6('dul ba): dmyal dang /'o 'dod 'don pa dang /'o dod 'bod pa chen po dang /tshig pa dang /rab tu tshig pa dang /bstir med pa dang /chu bur dang /rgyun tu chu bur can dang /a ta ta
109b7('dul ba): dang /ha ha ba dang /hu hu ba dang /ud pa la lta bu dang /pad+mo lte bu dang /pad+mo chen po lta bu rnamasu phyin nas gang tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba de dag la bab na bsil bar gyur
110a1('dul ba): grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba de dag la bab na dro bar gyur te/des sems can dmyal ba de dag la gnad pa ni bde ba'i khyad par du gyur pa dang /de dag
110a2('dul ba): 'di snyam du/kye ci bdag 'di nus shi 'phos som/'on te gzhan du skyes snya du bsams pa dang /de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa gtang //de dag
110a3('dul ba): gis sprul pa mthong ba dang 'di snyam du/kye bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos pa yang med/gud tu skyes pa yang ma yin gyi sngon mo mthong ba'i sems can 'di'i mthus na/bdag
110a4('dul ba): cag gnod pa las khyad par du bde bar gyur to snyam du bsams nas/de dag sprul pa la sems dad par gyur pas na/sems can dmyal ba'i gnod pa'i las med par gyur te/
110a5('dul ba): gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du gyur pa der lha dang mi'i nang du mtshams 'dzin par gyur to//gang steng du song ba de ni rgyal chen bzhi'i lha dang /sum cu rtsa gsum dang /mchom
110a6('dul ba): dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /tshangs ris dang /tshangs lha nye phan dang /tshangs chen dang /snang ba dang /tshad med snang ba dang /
110a7('dul ba): kun snang dang ba dang /chung dag dang /tshad med dge ba dang /dge rgyas dang /sprin med dang /bsod nams 'phel dang /'bras bu che ba dang /mi che ba dang /mi gdung ba dang /
110b1('dul ba): shin tu mthong ba dang /gya nam snang ba dang /'og min gyi bar la sogs par song nas mi rtag pa dang /sdug bsngal dang /stong pa dang /bdag med par brjod cing tshigasu
110b2('dul ba): bcad pa gnyis kyang brjod do//'byung bar bya phyir brtsams par byos//sangs rgyas bstan la brtson par byas//'dam bu'i khyim la blang chen bzhin//'chi bdag
110b3('dul ba): sde rnams gzhom par byos//gang zhig rab tu bgo yod par//chos 'dul 'di la spyod 'gyur ba//skye bo'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas//sdug bsngal tha mar 'byin par 'gyur
110b4('dul ba): de des 'od zer des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi kham su bskor nas/slar bcom ldan 'das kyi slad bzhin du 'brang zhing dong ngo //de ste bcom ldan 'das
110b5('dul ba): kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/bcom ldan 'das kyi snam log su mi snang bar 'gyuraro//ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun du mi snang bar
110b6('dul ba): 'gyur ro//sems can dmyal bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur//byol song du skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhabs kyi me rti
110b7('dul ba): par mi snang bar 'gyur ro//yi dag su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro//ma ro skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/pus mo gnyis
111a1('dul ba): su mi snang bar 'gyuraro//stobs kyi 'khor lo sgyur bar lung ston par bzhad na ni/phyag g.yor pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro//'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal
111a2('dul ba): por lung ston par bzhed na ni/phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyuraro//lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar mi snang bar 'gyuraro//nyan thos pa'i byang chub tu lung
111a3('dul ba): ston par bzhed na ni zhal du mi snang bar 'gyuraro//rang byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyuraro//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
111a4('dul ba): tu lung ston par bzhed na ni gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur//de nas 'od zer de dag bcom ldan 'das li lan gsum bskor nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tor du
111a5('dul ba): mi snang bar gyur to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo gnyis sbyar te/bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/kha dog sna tshogs du ma stong //zhal nas
111a6('dul ba): byung ba mang po ste//phyogs kun des ni rnye gyur pa//nyi ma ji ltar shar ba bzhin//tshigasu bcad de yang smras pa/rgod dang zhum las rnam bril nga rgyal spangs//sangs rgyas skye
111a7('dul ba): bo mchog gi rgyur gyur pa//rkyen med dung dang pad+ma'i rtsa ltar dkar//rgyal ba dgra thul 'dzum pa nye bar ston mi mdzad//de tshe rang gis mkhyen cing blo brtan pa//rgyal dbang nyon
111b1('dul ba): sur dro'i rnams//rngub pa'i khyu mchog brtan pa'i gsung rab kyis//the tsam skyes po dge bas bsal bar mdzod//rgya mtsho las nI ri rgyal brtan pa zhin//yang dag mngon
111b2('dul ba): rdzogs rgyu med 'dzum mi sten//dertan pas bab phyir 'dzum pa nyer bstan pa//do nA skye bo mang pos thos par 'tshal//btsun pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
111b3('dul ba): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis na 'dzum pa mdzad/kun dga' ba de ni de bzhi no//de ni
111b4('dul ba): de bzhin te/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyu med rte ni myed par 'dzum pa mi mdzod//kun dga' ba phyogs 'dir yang dag
111b5('dul ba): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung bzhugs nas chos bstan to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo rings shing myur bar stod g.yogs bzhi ltab tu blta ba ste bting
111b6('dul ba): nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gdan bting ba 'di la bzhugs par gsol/gnas 'dir yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
111b7('dul ba): 'od srung dang /da ltar gyi bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gnyis bzhugs par 'gyur zhes gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tsho dang
112a1('dul ba): ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' sprul to//leg so//kun dga' bo tras ma smras par khyod kyis shes pa ni legaso zhes gsungs nas gdan
112a2('dul ba): bting bu de la bzhus so//bzhugs nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo phyogs 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gtsug lag khang ngo //'di ni 'chags so'o//
112a3('dul ba): 'di ni stegs bu'o//'di ni sgo khang do//'di ni zhabs 'khru ba'i sa'o//'di ni bsro khang ngo //'di ni drug khang rung ba'i khang pa'o//'di ni dugs kha //sangs rgyas bcom
112a4('dul ba): ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/btsun pa rung ba'i sa zhes kyang bgyi/mi rung ba'i sa zhes kyang babyin/btsun pa ji tsam gyis na rung ba'i bar riHpar bgyi/u
112a5('dul ba): pa li dam pa'i chos yod pa'i tshe rung ba dang mi rung bar gyur/dam pa'i chos zhig par gyur na thams cad kyang rung ba'o//btsun pa ji tsam byis na dam pa'i chos mchis pa zhes
112a6('dul ba): bgyi/ji tsam gyis na zhig pa zhes bgyi/u pa li ji srid du las byed cing nan tan byed pa yang yod pa'i bar du ste/las byed na nan tan byed pa yang yod na dam pa'i chos yod
112a7('dul ba): ba zhes bya'o//las kyang mi byed la nan tan byed pa dag kyang mdan/de ni dam pa'i chos zhig pa zhes bya'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus
112b1('dul ba): pa/btsun pa mtshams kyi nang na rgyal ba bzhugs bzhin du las bgyir rung ngam/u pa li ru //rgyal ba grangasu bskangs la las bgyir rung ngam/u pA li mi ru //de ci'i phyir/
112b2('dul ba): zhe na/u pa li sangs rgyas dkon mchog kyang gzhan/dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang gzhan no//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lnga tshe dang ldan pa u pa~M lis zhus pa/btsun
112b3('dul ba): pa mi bskyed pa'i mtshams bskyed du rung ngam/u pa li ma rung //btsun pa ji tsam gyis na mtshams bskyed du mi rung ba zhes bgyi/u pa li gsum gyis te dkyil 'khor
112b4('dul ba): dang chus bskor ba dang /mtshams kyi nang ngo //btsun pa krung 'bab pa'i pha rol tu mtshams dgum du rung ngam u pa li mi rung //de ste zam pa brtan pa zhig yod na rlung ngo //
112b5('dul ba): de ste btsun pa zam pa chad dam zhig par gyur na ji tsam gyis na mi 'jig pa zhes bgyi/u pa li slar yang bcing bar bya ba'i sems yod na zhag bdun du 'jig par mi 'gyuraro//
112b6('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/btsun pa dge slong gis mtshams 'gums pa'i tshe/las byed pa'i dge slong gum ste dus bgyis
112b7('dul ba): bkum pa zhes bgyi 'am/ma bkum zhes bgyi/u pa yi mtshan ma rnams brjod la las kyang yang du byas na bcad pa zhes bya'o//bzlog pa ni ma bcad pa'o//btsun pa
113a1('dul ba): dge slong ma'i mtshams gcod pa'i tshe las bgyid pa'i tshe las bgyid pa'i dge slong ma gum ste/de dus bgyis na bkum pa zhes bgyi 'am/ma bkum pa
113a2('dul ba): zhes bgyi/de ste u pa li mtshan ma rnams brjod la las kyang mang du byas na bcad pa zhes bya'o//bzlog pa ni ma bcad pa'o//gleng gzhi'i nang nas sgo dang po'i mdo sde'i
113a3('dul ba): tshigasu bcad pa bzhi pa'o//mdor na/sa dang na mkha' las bya ba//mtshams dang yongasu dag pa dang //gnas gcig 'dug pa'i dge slong gis//las rnams kun la
113a4('dul ba): blta ba'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs pa'i tshe/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
113a5('dul ba): la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/btsun pa sa la mchis pa dag gis sa la mchis pa dag dang lhan cig tu las bgyir rung ngam/u pa li mi rung //dad pa byin
113a6('dul ba): pa ni rung ste de ste sa la gnas pas grangasu chung la sa la gnas pa rnams las dad pa yang blangs par gyur pa'o//btsun pa sa lha mchis pas rtsig pa la mchis pa dang
113a7('dul ba): lhan cig tu las bgyir rung ngam//u pa li mi rung //dad pa byin pa ni rung ste sa la gnas pa dag mang por tshad la rtsig pa la gnas pa'i rnams las dad pa yang blangs
113b1('dul ba): r+m+ma ma ga sa sa su ga na na zu shA/du rgyu na da du/
113b2('dul ba): sle//da na /don gyig pa'i sri na gnas pa y-i sa par gyur zer//na
113b3('dul ba): TI sted du mchis pa dag sal sa bdan ma khyer rung ngam/sre sa dz+yo//dang b+hin+dan drung s+ho/de
113b4('dul ba): na gnas pa da/ zlangs rgya su la gnas pa na 'i nga ba 'du /tsun rtag pa blan mchis dan
113b5('dul ba): ga sbyong na mchis pa dag dang sbyin cig tulas bzeng rdung 'i/u mi mi mdzo// basbyin de rtsig pa la gnas pa dag gis grangasu bzheng nga /
114a1('dul ba): steng na gnas pa rnams dad pa yang blangs par gyur pa'o//btsun pa rtsig nga'i steng na mchis pa dag gis na mkha' la mchis pa dag dang lhan cig tu les
114a2('dul ba): bgyir rung ngam/u pa li mi rung //btsun pa shing la mchi bdag gis shing la mchis pa dag dang lhan cig tu las bgyir rung ngam/u pa lI mi rung ngo //dad pa byin na
114a3('dul ba): rung ste/de ste shring la gnas pa dag grang su bskang lA/shIng la gnas pa'i rnams las dang pa yang blangs par gyur pa'o//shing la mchis pa dag gis sA lo ma
114a4('dul ba): pa dag dang lhan cig tu las bgyir rung ngam/u pa li mi rung //dad pa byin na rung ste/de ste shIng la gnas pa dag gis grangasu bskang la sa la gnas pa'i rnams
114a5('dul ba): las dad pa yang blangs par gyur pa'o//btsun pa shing la mchis pa dag gis rtsig pa la mchis pa dag dang lhan cig tu las bgyir rung ngam+ba/u pa lI mi rung
114a6('dul ba): ngongo//de ste shing la gnas pa dag gis grangasu bskang ba sa la gnas pa'i rnams las dad pa yang blangs par gyur pa'o//btsun pa shing la mchis pa dag gis nam
114a7('dul ba): mkha' la mchis pa dag dang lhan cig tu las bgyir rung ngam/u ba li mi rung //btsun pa na mkha' la mchis pa dag gis na mkha' la mchis pa dag dang sbyin
114b1('dul ba): TIg tu las bgyir rung ngam/u pa li mi rung ngo //tsun pa na mkha' la mchis pa dag gis sa la mchisna pa dag dang lhan cig tu lus bgyir rung ngam/u pa
114b2('dul ba): yi mi rung ngo //btsun pa na mkha' la mchis pa dag gris rtsig pa la mchis pa dang /lhan cig tu las bgyir rung ngam/u pa li mi ru ngo //btsun pa na mkha'
114b3('dul ba): la mchis pa dag gis shing la mchis pa dag dang lhan cig tu las bgyir rung ngam/u pa liM mi rung ngo //sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus
114b4('dul ba): pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba 'di'i dkyil 'khor las las brgya rtsa gcig tu gsungs pa btsun pa las brgya rtsa gcig pa d+mo'i nang nas las dus na
114b5('dul ba): dad pa dang bcas par 'gyur/dus na dad pa ma mchis par 'gyur/u pa li thams cad kyang dad pa dang bcas pa ste/mtshams bcad pa ni ma gtog so//btsun
114b6('dul ba): pa rdzu 'phrul lam sgyu mas mtshams dgum du rung ngam/u pa li mi rung ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/u pa li rdzu 'phrul dang sgyu ma ni tha snyad du gdagos pa med do//btsun
114b7('dul ba): pa gza' dang 'od zer dang /nyi ma dang zla ba dang skar ma rnams kyis mtshams dgu mo du rung ngam/u pa li mi rung ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/u pa liM gza'o
115a1('dul ba): dang 'od zer dang nyi mu dang zla ba dang skyur ma rnams mi brtan pa'i phyir//bdun pa chu rlabs kyi mtshams ma 'gum du rung ngam+ba/u pa li mi rung ngo//
115a2('dul ba): de ci'i phyir zhe na/u pa li chu rlabs ni mi brten pa'i phyiraro//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa btsun pa yong su dag pa len pa'i
115a3('dul ba): dge slong gis yongasu dag pa blangs nas steng gi na mkha' las mchis na des yongasu dge pa blangs pa zhes bgyi 'am/u pa li ma blangs pa ste/gdod blang dgos so//
115a4('dul ba): btsun pa las bgyis gcig gis las kyi tshig kyang gcig/gsol pa yang gcig gis gnas bzhir sde bzhi la las bgyir rung ngam/u pa lci rung ste/de ste gar+m+ma/
115a5('dul ba): bzhir dge slong gsum gnas la gsol ba dang /las kyang mngon du gyur cing der gsol ba byed pa'i dge slong gis gnas gzhi'i mtsham su sab mo 'am ro lde 'a
115a6('dul ba): khri 'am gzhan dag kyang rung steng du 'dug nas las bya'o//las byed pa de nyid dag gri grang su skyong ba'o//btsun pa dge slong gcig gis gnas gcig tu mchis
115a7('dul ba): pa gnas bzhir las bgyid du rung ngam/u pa li rung ste/de yang gnas bzhir 'di lta ste bsdigs pa'i las dang /smad pa dang /bskrad pa dang slar bsdum pa
115b1('dul ba): dad mya mthong ba'i phyir spang ba dang /slaR+Ya las myi byed pas spyang ba'i las dang /sdig pa lo lta ba spyir ma btang bas spang ba'i lngas dang chad pa'i las te rnam pa la mngon/
115b2('dul ba): du phyoganas par gyur pa y+ra las byed pa'i dge slong gnas bzhi'i mtshams srub mo 'am/re ldes mnan te 'dug pa'o//gleng gzhi'i sgro dang po'i tshig su bcad pa lnga pa'o///
115b3('dul ba): me dor na/byed dang gsum las 'das pa dang //phye dang gsum yang ri ri steng //dge 'dun phye ba skya rang dang /mtshams kyi nang du byin gyis brlabs//sangs rgyas
115b4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugaso//de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis
115b5('dul ba): zhus pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshams chen po tshod cig ces gsungs na/btsun pa mtshams chen po de'i tshad ji tsam lags/u pa li/dpag tshad
115b6('dul ba): phyid dang gsumo//btsun pa phyed dang gsum phan chad kyang mtshams zhes bgyi 'am/u pa li ma yin te/yug tshad bye dang gsum tshun chad 'tsham so/tsun pa 'o gi khams kyi mtshams gang lags/
115b7('dul ba): nup+pu li ji tsam chu la thug par gyur pa'i bar du'o//btsun pa dpag tshad phyed dang gsum las 'das te chu la thug par gyur na tsi de yang mtshams zhes bgyi'am/u pa li
116a1('dul ba): ma yin//dpag tshod spyod dang gsum tshun chud ni mtshams kyi do ban chad ni mtshams ma yin no//btsun pA ste drug khamasu mtshamasna gang /u pa la/
116a2('dul ba): ji tsam shing gi rtse mo 'am/rtsig pa'i steng l-I thug par gyur pa'i bar du'o//btsun pa dpag tshad phyed dang gsum phan chad kyi shing gi rtse mo 'am/rtsig pa'i steng du gyur nA
116a3('dul ba): ci de yang mtshams zhes bgyi 'am/oM ba li ma yino//u pa yi dpag tshad phyed dang gsum tshun chad ni mtshams kyi de phan chad ni mtshams ma yino//btsun po ri
116a4('dul ba): mtshams gang /u pa li ji tsam chus bskor ba thug pa'i bar du'o//btsun pa dpog tshad phyed dang gsum phan chad cig chus bskor bar gyur na cing yang mtshams zhes bgyi
116a5('dul ba): 'am/u pa li ma yino//u pa li dpag tshad phyed dang gsum tshun chad ni mtsham so//de phan chad ni mtshams ma yino//btsun pa dbyar gyi nang du dge 'dun bya ste/de na /
116a6('dul ba): slong cig zhag bdun du byin gyis brlabs te/bdug chos la phyogs par bsams bzhin du chos ma lags pa'i phyogs kyi nang du mchis na dbyar chad pa zhes ba gyi 'am/
116a7('dul ba): dbyer ma chad pa zhes ri gyi/u ba li de ste de dag gis lta ba lo yang dang ma der song nas spyi reng shang na byar chad pa zhes bya'o//de ste lto ba la yang ma dang ya
116b1('dul ba): srong nas sgra rang myur shU na dbyar mchod pa zhes bya'o//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dbyar tshul nA gnas pa'i tshe/dge slong gis zhag bdun du byin gyis brlabs te mjams
116b2('dul ba): kyiskud rol du song shig rjes gsungs na gsu byin gyis brlab par bgyi/u pa li mtshams kyi nang du'o//ji lta bur bgyi/dge slong gi mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar ba bya ste/
116b3('dul ba): tshig 'di skad ces smros shig/dgongs shig tshe dang ldan pa dag/bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba mtshams kyi nang gnas 'dir dbyar dang po 'am tha ma yang rung ste tshul du zhugs
116b4('dul ba): pa las bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba dge 'dun gyi don la mtshams kyi slad rol tu mchi ba'i slad du zhag bdun du byin gyis brlabs te/bodag dbyar 'dir gan so//bdag dbyar 'dir
116b5('dul ba): gan so//zhes kun tu rgyas par bya ste snga ma bzhi no//gleng gzhi'i sgo dang po'i mdo tshigasu bcud pa drug//mdor na/sde lha rnams te bsams bzhin du//kun rgyu gnyen la
116b6('dul ba): de bzhin te//lung la the tsom blang bya dang //mdza ba'i phyir yang 'gro ba'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' rang
116b7('dul ba): nabazhugs//sangs rgyasra bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/btsun pra'i com ldan 'das kyis dbyar tshul du 'jug mar gyiso shig/ces gsung
117a1('dul ba): na gang dag tshul du 'jug par 'gyu/u pa li de ni nom pa sa ste dag slo ma slong mdang dge slob ma dang dge tshul pa dang dge tshul ma'o//ji ltar 'jug par brgya
117a2('dul ba): ba thams cad kyang snga ma bzhin du'o//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis zhag bdun du byin gyis brlab par byas na dge bsnyen gyi don la mtshams kyi slad rol tu song shig
117a3('dul ba): ces gsungs na/btsun pa de ste mu stegs can zhig mchis na de'i don la yang mchi bar bgyi 'am/u pa l-i de ste sdig pa la lta ba de las 'bral bar 'dod na 'gro bar bya'o//
117a4('dul ba): btsun pa gnyen zhig mchis na de'i don la yang mchi bar bgyi 'am/'gro bar bya'o//btsun pa dge slong zhig gzhung la the tsom 'am dogs pa zhig mchis ni de yang ma
117a5('dul ba): bar bgyi'am/u pa li de yang 'gro bar bya'o//btsun pa dge slong gis ma thob pa las thob pa'i slad du ma chud pa lta chud pa'i slad du mngon du ma bgyis pa las mngon du
117a6('dul ba): bgyis pa'i slad du the tsem 'am dogs pa zhig mchis na de yang mchi bar bgyi 'om//u ba li de yang 'gro 'ir bya'o//gleng gzhi'i sgo dang po'i mnga'i tshogasu bcad bya 'dun
117a7('dul ba): 'o///mdor na/madras gos kyang de bzhin te//khon te grong du 'gro ba dang //rkyen to d+ho dang de bzhin pa//gtan la badzin gong lug so//sangs rgya
117b1('dul ba): ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/btsun pa
117b2('dul ba): me dras pa'i gos byin gyis brlab par rung ngam/u pi l-i mi rung mod kyi rnam pa de lta bu'i rkyen gyis na rlung ngo btsun pa ma dras pa'i gos 'tshal nas grong du mchir ru ma/u pa'i
117b3('dul ba): me ru mod kyi de lta bu'i rkyen gyis na ru //bum pa ma dras pa'i gros 'tshal te khyim pa'i khyim du mchir rung ngam/u pa li mi rung mod kyi de lta bu'i rkyen gyis nu ru ngo //btsun pa ma dras pa'i gos
117b4('dul ba): 'chal te khyim du gnas rung ngam/u pa li mi rung mod kyi de lta bu'i rkyen gyis na rung ngo //btsun pa ma dras pa'i gos 'tshal te kun tu rgyu'i khyim du 'chir rung ngam/u pa li
117b5('dul ba): mi rung mod kyi de lta bu'i rkyen gyis na rung //btsun pa ma dras pa'i gos 'tshal te kun tu rgyu ba'i gan su 'chir rung ngam/u pA li mi rung mod kyi de lta bu'i rkyen gyis na rung ngo //
117b6('dul ba): btsun pa ma dras pa'i gos 'tshal te slad rol du mchir rung ngam/u pa li mi rung mod kyi de lta bu'i rkyen gyis na rung ngo //sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lo tshe dang ldan pa u pa
117b7('dul ba): lis zhus pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gos khru tshad du byos shig ces gsungs na/btsun pa la la zhib khru thung zhing lus ring na des kyang khru tshod du brgya
118a1('dul ba): 'am/u ba myi de ni khru chud du bya ba m+b+ha yin+da gyi de'i lus kyi rgyud du byos shig/brdzun pa gang la thams cad kyis chos gos mi langs na de ji ltar bgyi/
118a2('dul ba): u pa li de sa gong lugasu gyis la chongs shig/gleng gzhi'i sgo dang po'i mdo'i tshig su bcad pa brgyad pa'o////mdor na/lham la rnam pa lngar byas te//seng ge
118a3('dul ba): gcan zan mi srun dang //'dug par yang ni mi rung ste//lags pa la ni nyal mi bya'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin
118a4('dul ba): gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ba lang cang shes kyi lpags po
118a5('dul ba): las bgyis pa'i lham ma 'chang shig ces gsungs na/btsun pa ci ba lang phal gyi lpags pa la yang lham bgyis te 'chang bar mi bgyi 'am/u pa li de dag gi
118a6('dul ba): lpags pa la yang lham byas te bcang bar mi bya'o//u pa li dwe ci'i phyir zhe na/de dag kyang sna stobs dang ldan pa/so stobs dang ldan pa dang /rkang stobs dang ldan pa'o//
118a7('dul ba): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis rta cang shes kyi lpags pa las bgyis po'i lha ma 'chang shig ces gsungs na/btsun pa ci rta phal gyi lpags pa'i lham yang bcang bar
118b1('dul ba): mi bgyi 'am/u pA li de'i lpags pa'i lham yang bcang bar mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/u pa lI de dag kyang mgyogs pa dang ldan stobs dang ldan pa'i phyiraro//btsun pa
118b2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis seng ge dang stag dang gzig gi lpags pa la bgyis pa'i lham ma 'chang shig ces gsungs na/btsun pa gcan zan mi srun pa gzhan dag kyang mchis
118b3('dul ba): na de dag gi lpags pa las bgyis pa'i lham yang bcang bar mi bgyi 'am/u pa li de dag gis lpags pa la lham byas pa yang ma 'chang shig/u pa li de ci'i phyir zhe na/
118b4('dul ba): de dag kyang sen mo'i stobs dang ldan/mche ba'i stobs dang ldan pa'i phyiraro//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis pags pa'i steng du ma 'dug ces gsungs na/btsun pa ji tsam
118b5('dul ba): gyis na lpags pa'i steng du mchis pa zhes bgyi/u pa li de ni ji tsam rku ba bzhag par gyur paso//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis pags pa'i steng du ma nyal gcig ces
118b6('dul ba): gsungs na/btsun pa ji tsam gyis na pags pa'i steng du nyal ba zhes bgyi/de ni u pa li ji tsam 'phres par gyur pa'o//gleng gzhi'i sgo dang po'i mdo'i tshig su bcang
118b7('dul ba): 'phu la/ba dgu pa'o//mdor na/sha rjen dang ni rtsab mo dang //yongasu btsags par gyur pa dang /gzhang 'brum bcad par mi bya ste//gtsug lag khang dang bca'
119a1('dul ba): pa'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dza ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so//sangs rgyas bcom ldan//
119a2('dul ba): 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong se ka ta blo 'tshal ba lo sha rjen byin cig ces gsungs na/btsun pa su las blings/
119a3('dul ba): par bgyi//u pa yi de ni sha tshong pa rnam pa lnga las//rnam pa lnga gang zhe na/shan pa dang /khyim bya gsod pa dang /ri bye gsod pa dang /phag gsod pa dang /ri da
119a4('dul ba): gagasod pa rnam so//'o na btsun pa sus blang zhing byin len bgyi/u pa li dge bsten dad paso//gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/de'i dus na dge slong gzhan zhig na bar gyur/
119a5('dul ba): nas de sman pa'i drung du song ste/tshad med cig ces smras nas bzhin bzangs bdag nad 'di dang 'di lta bu zhig gis btab na dpyad cig ston cig/des 'phags pa
119a6('dul ba): mar 'thung shig dang 'tsho bar 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang //des bzhin bzangs bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnango zhes smras pa dang /sman pas khyod kyi ston pa ni thu
119a7('dul ba): rje can gyis gnang bar 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang /de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
119b1('dul ba): do ste sman byas mar gyis 'tsho bar 'gyur zhes bsgron 'thung shig/dge slong des mar 'thungs na skom gyis gzir bar gyur te/de sman pa la bzhin bzangs bdag ni skom pas/
119b2('dul ba): gzir to//des smras pa/'phags pa rtsub mo sgyur po 'thung shig/des smras pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis dus ma yin pa'i bza' ba ma gnang na ji ltarabatud+ya b+har bya/
119b3('dul ba): sman pas smras pa/'phags pa khyod kyi ston pa ni ni thugs rje can yin pas ga nang du gdon mi za'o//de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang
119b4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de ltar na rtsab mo skyur po 'thung shig ces rje su gnang ba dang /dge slong dag gis rtsab mo skyur po ji ltar btung bar mi sheso//de ltar
119b5('dul ba): gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//dge slong dag rtsab mo skye ru po ni rnam pa 'di lnga'o//lnga gang zhe na
119b6('dul ba): 'di lta ste/'bras bu'i chad las tshwar gyur pa dang /'bru'i chang las tshar gyur pa dang /zho'i chu dang /dang ba dang /rtsab mo dang lnga'o//de las 'bras su'i tshang las tshwar
119b7('dul ba): gyur pa ni/gang las 'bras bu rnams las byas pa dang /ma rung ste sbyar por gyur pa'o//'bru'i chang las tshar gyur pa nigang bru rnams las sbyar ba
120a1('dul ba): nas ma rung ste skyur por gyur pa'o//zho'i chu ni zho las chu byung ba'o//da ba'i khu ba nI dang pa zho'i chu lta bur gyur pa'o//
120a2('dul ba): rtsab mo ni rtsab mo nyid yin no//de dag gi nang du chus bslad la rus kyi nang du btsugs te ji ltar mda'i kha dog bzhin du gyur pa de ni dus dang dus ma
120a3('dul ba): yin pa dang na ba dang ni na ba'i dge slong dag btung bar bya ste de la the tsom ni ma byed cig/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa ni ste/de'i tshe na dge slong
120a4('dul ba): gzhan zhig gzhang 'brum gyi nad kyis btab nas/des 'brum bu sen mos bcad pa dang /de slar sdug bsngal zhing rtsub pa tsha zhing gnod la na bar
120a5('dul ba): gyur pa dang /de sdug bsngal gyis rab tu gzir nas des 'di snyam du bdag la bcom ldan 'das kyis sdug bsngal zhing dog pa dag tu gyur kyang ma dgongs snyam
120a6('dul ba): du bsams pa dang //dre nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs rje chen pos bsku lA nas dre'i ge nas su byon te dge slong dwa ci nyes shes smras

120b1('dul ba): la pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag ngas sgra nas kyang gzhung 'brum ma gtsad cig ces ma bsgo 'am/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to//
120b2('dul ba): 'on khyod kyis ci'i phyir de ltar bya/bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal gyis gzir ba'i slad du'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/da
120b3('dul ba): slong dag dge slong 'di ni sdug bsngal gyis gzir bas na nyes pa med kyis/ngam yang 'di ltar bsgo ba ni dge slong dge gzhung 'brum gyi nad kyis gzir na sen mo la sogs
120b4('dul ba): pas bdag nyid kyis kyang ma bcad cig gzhan yang gcod du ma gzhug cig/de la dpyad rnam pa gnyi su sbyar zhing bya ste/sman dang sngags kyiso//dge slong gzhang

120b6('dul ba): tshong pa spu bu can zhes bya ba na bzhug so//de'i tshe na khyim bdag gzhan zhig bdag nyid mos bdag nyid dga' nas gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs te/ dang ldan pa sgra

121a1('dul ba): spyod du spyong ngo //khyim bdag dus 'phags pa sgra gcan 'dzin ji srid kyi bar du gtsug lag khang der gnas nas lhung bzed dang chos gos khyer sa/

121a3('dul ba): du ljongs spyod nas/lhung gzed dang chos gos khyer te shAkya'i glong mA dab rjod pa sbu bu can zhes bya ba gang na ba der spyod cing song ste/rim bzhin du spyad pa spyod cing chod
121a4('dul ba): pa spre bu cano zhes bya bar phyin pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan 'dzin gyis khyim bdeg des gtsug lag khang de dge 'dun la phu lo zhes thos so//de skad thos nas btso

122a1('dul ba): gis khyim bdag de la khyim bdag bdag gi lus dang ngag dang yid kyis cung zad tsam yang nyes par gyur pa lta yod dam zhes bgyis na de 'di skad ces

122a4('dul ba): pa kun dga'i 'o la kun dga' bo song kha shAkya'i grong mdab tshong pa spu bu can zhes bya ba nas gnas shing 'khod pa'i dge slong thams cad 'dun khang du 'du shig par bsgo shig

122b2('dul ba): gshegs te byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun ni bting ba la bzhug so//shi bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong dgu la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag

123b4('dul ba): ni sa gzhi la dang ngo //bdag po ni mal stan la drang ngo //dge slong ni lhung bzed dang chos gos la dbang ngo //sbyin pa byed pa dang sbyin pa'i bdag po drag gis byin pa'i chos

126a1('dul ba): kyis dris pa la lan 'debs pa'i dge slong gis dge 'dun la bsgo la dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad 'dus shing 'khod pa dang /gtsug lag

126a7('dul ba): ji lta zhe na de bdag cag gi yang chos kyi ming po lag so zhes smras pa dang /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis dpe
126b1('dul ba): slod ltung da dang rgyas gas na dge slo dag dab gos/dge slong ma drugs 'tshang shog thos pa//'a stsal to//nyan du dad pa na dge slong ma gzhan zhig dus 'das nas de'i sbung
126b2('dul ba): dang chos gos dge slong zhig la bzhag go//dge slong ma rnams kyis de'i ro bsregs nas/dge slong ma'i dbyer mo khang du skyer lcug te/lhung bzed dang chos gos btsal ni ma

126b4('dul ba): dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'das te/de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos 'drin mchis na/de bdag caga'i tshal gyis slar stsol cig ces smras pa dang /des smyos pa/dge slong ma de gang du

126b6('dul ba): yin zhes smras pa dang /de ltar gyur pa dge slong ma dag gis dge slong dag la smras pa dang /dge sbyong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis de ste dge slong ma'i

127a1('dul ba): /yod pad+ma dge slong glazhan sh+log ljongs rgyu Sh+TA r+m+mad d+h+yang ri brags kyu blang bzhan zhag tu phyin nas du rgya sh+lo/dus 'das te/de de sma du khrod du par na ltung brjid dang /
127a2('dul ba): chos gos smras te gzhago//dus phyi zhig na dge slong ma mdo zhig ljongs spyad pa spyod cing ri brags kyi grong der phyin pa dang /khyim bdag des de dag mthong ste/'phags ma bdag gi
127a3('dul ba): du dge slong zhig dus 'das pa'i lhung bzed dang chos gos 'di lags kyis snyoms shig/ces smras pa dang /de dag gis smras pa/khyim bdag 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi sa ma gnang bas do/

127a5('dul ba): dge slong ma dag blang bar bya ste/de la the tsom ma byed cig ces ka' stsal to//gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/mnyan du yod par dge slong me mang zhig ljongs spyad pa spyod cing dong ba na de dag las
127a6('dul ba): dge slong ma cig na bar gyur nas de dal bus 'gro zhing phyi nas 'ongs pa la des lam stor te ri brags kyi grong gzhan zhig tu phyin nas/de khyim pa'i khyim du dus 'daso//dos de dur khrod du bor nas
127a7('dul ba): lhung bzed dang chos gos sbas te bzhago//de nas dus phye zhig na dge slong mang ning /ljongs spyad pa spyod cing ri brags kyi grong der phyin pa dang //khyim bdag des de dag mthong nas 'phags pa dag bdang
127b1('dul ba): gu khyim du dge slong ma zhig dus 'das te/des de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos 'di lags kyis snyoms shig ces smras pa dang /de dag gis smras pa/khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang

127b3('dul ba): blang bar bya ste/de la the tsom ma byed cig ces bka' stsal to//gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/btsun pa dang /slong

127b6('dul ba): pa de dbang ngo //gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/de'i tshe na dze ta'i tshal na dge slong gnyis shig 'thab par gyur te/dge slong gzhan dag gis bskor cing 'khod do//bram
127b7('dul ba): dang khyim bdag dag gis de mthong nas/de dag gis 'phags pa bdag cag gis khyim pa 'thab pa dag mthong long /bdag cag gis gtsugs par bya na khyed cag gis ci 'di mi
128a1('dul ba): gzugs par bskor te 'khod dam zhes smras pa dang /de na gzhan dag gis smras pa/'di dag nyid 'thab ma byed pa yin na ci'i phyir gzugs zhes smras pa
128a2('dul ba): dang /de dag la lan med nas bcang mi zer bar 'khod do//de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la bskor
128a3('dul ba): cing ma 'khod pa dacugs par byos shig ces bka' stsal pa dang /de dag btsugs kyang gtong du ma btub nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol

128a5('dul ba): sprul pa dang /dus phye zhig na dge slong gnyis shig nges pa'i gtam byedado//de gnyis na re 'di 'thob pa'o//'di ni 'thob pa'o zhes nges pa'i gtam smra ba na cig la cig ngag rtsub
128a6('dul ba): po sbas pa dang /de gnyis kyang dge slong dag gris spang ba'i las byas nas de gnyis kyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag ni nges pa'i gtam smra ba na cig la cig rag rna
128a7('dul ba): por smra ru zad na/ci'i phyir khyed kyis nged gnyis la spang ba'i lus kyis bcad ces smras pa dang /de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'thab pa rnams la spang ba'i las/
128b1('dul ba): kyis shig ces gsungs pas na/drod kyis khyod gnyis la spyang ba mas rgyas nas smras pa dang /de dag cang mi smra bar 'khod//de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la

128b3('dul ba): gyis bsgo shig/de ste rgan pa zhig na ni de la dge 'dun thams cad 'dus la rtsod pa zhi bar byos shig/de ste des kyang ma bskon na gdod de gnyis la spang ba'i las byos shig gleng gzhi

129a1('dul ba): can rnams kyi mthu nyams nas rnyed pa chung bar gyur te/de dag gis ji tsam 'dod pa blangs nas mu stegs bya ba bya bar brtsams pa dang /khyim bdag mgon med

131b7('dul ba): mug dang bral ba'o zhes smras te cang mi zer bar 'khod do//kun tu sbyor ba'i lhag ma dang bcas pa gang yin pa de dag kyang 'di snyam du bla na med pa la bsngos pas na bdas
132a1('dul ba): cag ni kun tu sbyong ba'i lhag ma dang bcas pa yin pas bdag cag ni mi dbangango snyam du bsams nas cang mi zer bar 'khod//bcang ba thams cad kyis

133a3('dul ba): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dgu la 'di snyed ces 'a stsam te/dge slong khyod gis khyim bdag mgan med rjes sbyin gyis gis mang po bsdus te rkyenan

133a7('dul ba): btsun pa de bzhin zhes gsol to//dge slong dag de lta bas na nga'i drung du mya ngan las 'da' bar bsams te/rab tu byung ba de la ben phrag skyong ri bya'i gos dang /mir+m+ma/
133b1('dul ba): brgya yod pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang /ro sgyu brgya dang ldan pa'i zas rnams rjes gnang //dge slong dag tshul khrims nyams pa dag ni dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra bar rkang pa'i rgyung
133b2('dul ba): pA cig tsam yang yongasu spyad par mi gnang //de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshul khrims nyams pa'i gang zag li ni nyes pa'i dmigs 'di bcu yod de/bcu gang zhe na/tshul khrims

133b7('dul ba): bu lon gyi yongasu spyod pa'o//de las dge slong 'dod chags dang bral ba zhe sdang dang bral po/gti mugo dang bral ba de dag ni bdag po byed cing yongasu spyod pa'o//kun tu
134a1('dul ba): snor bu'i lhag ma dad+ma bcus pA dag nI byin pas yongasu spyod pa'o/sor bo da byA can byasam gtan dang klag pa la zhugs pa rnams ni glan
134a2('dul ba): bstu yongasu spyod pa'o//le lo can dag ni bu lon gyis yongasu spyod pa'o//tshul khrims nyams pan+da yongasu spyod pa thams cad mi gnang //de lta bsren rnyed pa zhig

134a5('dul ba): mgron med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa btsun pa dge 'dun gyi brtan pa
134a6('dul ba): bting ba'i dge slong gis/shin tu myos bzhin du brtan pa bting bar 'gyur ba mchis sam/u pe lI yod de/'di lci ste dge 'dun gyi brtan pa 'ding ba'i tshe/
134a7('dul ba): dge slong des dad pa byin la gnyid kyis log ste/dge 'dun gyi brtan pa bting bar 'gyuraro//u pa li de ltar na dge slong shin tu myos bzhin brtan pa bting
134b1('dul ba): bor 'gyuraro//btsun pa dge 'dun gyi brtan pa shin tu myos bzhin brtan par 'gyur ba mchis sam/u pa li yod de dge slong zhig gis dge 'dun gyi brtan pa bting ba'i tshe dad pa
134b2('dul ba): byin la nyal na dge 'dun gyi brtan pa yang bting bar 'gyur te/de ltar na dge 'dun gyi brtan pa bting ba shin tu myos kyang brtan pa bting bar 'gyuraro//u pa la de
134b3('dul ba): bzhin du dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi brtan pa 'ding ba'i tshe dad pa byin pa la gnyid kyis log gam snyoms par zhugs pa ste/shin tu myos pa yang brtan pa bting
134b4('dul ba): bar 'gyur//btsun pa dge slong dge 'dun gyi brtan pa 'byin pa'i tshe myos par gyur kyang brtan pa ma byung bar 'gyur ba mchis sam/u pa li yod de 'di ltar dge
134b5('dul ba): slong gis dge 'dun gyi brtan pa 'byin pa'i tshe dad pa ma byin la gnyid kyis log gam snyoms par zhugs pa ste/u pa li de ltar na dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis
134b6('dul ba): brtan pa 'byin pa'i tshe myos par gyur kyang brtan pa mu phyung bar 'gyur ro//btsun pa dge slong zhig gis dge 'dun gyis brtan pa 'byin pa'i tshe myos par gyur kyang
134b7('dul ba): brtan pa phyung bar 'gyur ba mchis sam/u pa li yid de 'di ltar dge slong gis dge 'dun gyis brtan pa'i byin pa'i tshe dang po byin la gnyid kyis log gam
135a1('dul ba): snyoms par zhugs sam mtsha mas kyi phyi rol tu snong yang rung ste dge 'dun gyis brtan pa phyung zhes thos te thos nas kyang legs par byung ba'o//

135a3('dul ba): la las rnams bya ba dang //bcu gnyis rnams la slar 'khyal dang //mi gtsang ba dang mi btsan pa//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshol
135a4('dul ba): mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugaso//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/btsun pa bslab pa sprul pos tshul shing
135a5('dul ba): brim zhing las bgyir rung ngam/u pa li mi rung //ma nid dang za ma dang dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang /phya bsad pa dang ma bsad pa dang dgra bcom pa bsad pa dang /
135a6('dul ba): de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba dang /mu stegs can dang /mu stegs can du song ba dang /kun gnas dang so sor gnas pa dang /mi gan+da
135a7('dul ba): pas tshul shing brim zhing las bgyir rung ngamo/u pa li mi rung //btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gang la las bya ba de slar 'khyal na yang mi btsan zhes gsus
135b1('dul ba): na/btsun pa gang la chos bzhin ma lags par las bgyis po de sgrub 'khrul na yang mo btsan par 'gyur ram/u pa li don bcan//btsun pa gang zag gi las bcu gnyis
135b2('dul ba): bsgos pa'i tshe de dag 'di skad du nged cag la mya bsgo shig cesna mtshon ci de dag de ltar 'khyal ba yang mi btsun nam/u pa li btsan//de ni ngas chad pas bcad pa rnams
135b3('dul ba): kyi phyir bsams te gsungs//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis mi gtsang ba rnams sla ro la khyal na mi btsan zhes gsungs na/btsun pa ji tsam gyis na mi gtsang ba zhes
135b4('dul ba): bgyi u pa li de ni gang la phas pham pa bzhi'i nang nas gang yang rung ba zhig byung bar gyur pa ste/de tsam gyis na mi gtsang bar 'gyuraro//gleng gzhi'i sgo gnyis pa'i mdo'i tshog

135b7('dul ba): zhus pa/btsun pa las bgyid pe bslab po sprul pas las bgyis na bgyis po zhes bgyi 'am 'on te ma bkris pa zhes bgyi/u pa li ma byab pa zhes bya ste/slar yang
136a1('dul ba): bya dgos so//de bzhin du ma nid dang za ma dang mi gnas pa'i bar du snga ma bzhin du bya'o//gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na sna/dge slong gzhan zhig la
136a2('dul ba): dge sbyong zhig bsnyen par rdzogs par 'dod nas des bsnyen par rdzogs par bya ba'i dge slong rnams sbyin te/des bsnyen par rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir des dge tshul pa de
136a3('dul ba): khrid nas/dkyil 'khor du dong nas de dge slong dag dang lhan cig tu dkyil 'khor du phyin nas de mtshams kyi phyi rob tu mngags te btong ba dang /de gnyen dag gis
136a4('dul ba): khrid de song //tshe dang ldan pa de rab tu 'byung zhe de bsnyen par rdzogs nas dge slong gi dngos por 'gyur ba'i byar tshad du gyur pa dang /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gre sangs
136a5('dul ba): rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de lta bas na dge slong dag gos bsnyen par rdzogs par 'dod pa de mtshams kyi

136b1('dul ba): gas bsngon pa rtogs par 'dod du dan /rgyu spyad mo thos dAts+tsha 'khyod tsam du sangs pa la mthong ba'i ho 'khor tsam du thal ma~M swA te mngon du lta bzhin nogs shog/

136b3('dul ba): ba~M ya de bzhin//'thab mo rgod pa sdigs pa dang //smod par bya dang rigs sun pa'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i rdo rje'i tshal mgon myed zas

136b6('dul ba): shing rab tu langs pa lus dge slong la su nyal bar byed 'byung bur rtsom/phyag 'tshal ba mngon du sbyin cing 'thab po nid pA de yang sgrar gtong ba'o//btsun pa bcom
136b7('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis 'thab mo nod pa'i dge slong dag la bsdigs pa'i las byos shig ces gsungs ni/daM ste btsun pa de la bsdigs pa'i las bgyid pa'i tshom rangs pa
137a1('dul ba): gyur na de la thabs ji lta bur bgyi/u pa li de'i yo byad dang rdzas las kha cig gis lhung bzed dang chos gos khyer cig/kha cig gis ni bar bur
137a2('dul ba): gyi snod dag khyer la phyi rol tu phyung ste 'or cig/de ste ka ba la 'jun yang ka ba chod cig de ste sgo skyes la 'jun yang sgo skyes phyung la de la ngo zlag mi phod pa ma byed
137a3('dul ba): cig/dri slar sus bcos par bgyi/dge 'dun gyiso//su la bcos pa'i yo byad dgug/sbyin bdag la slong la de ste ma 'byor na dge 'dun thams cad kyi nor las
137a4('dul ba): byos shig/de la the tshom du ma byed cig/de ste btsun pa dge slong ma zhig 'thab mi rgud por gyur na dwe lce yang bsdigs pa'i las bgyi 'am/u pa li de la yang

137a7('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis/rigs sun phyung ba'i dge slong la bskrad pa'i las byos cig ces gsungs na/de ste btsun pa de la bskrad pa'i las bgyid pa'i tshe/de rangs
137b1('dul ba): ra ma myang na du laji ltur bas+ho/u pa la de la yo byAd rnams shos bya ba nas/the tsho ma khyud cig cos bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin//de bzhin du dge slong mas rag su sun byung
137b2('dul ba): pa dang /dge slob ma dang /dge tshul pha dang /dge tshul ma dag la yang bskrad pa'i las bgyi 'am/de la the tshom du ma byed cig ces bya ba'i bar du sgyu ma bzhi no//glang
137b3('dul ba): gzhi'i sgo gnyis pa'i mdo'i tshig su bcad pa drug pa'o///'dul ba gzhung dam pa//bam po so gsum pa//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis tshul khrims nyams

137b5('dul ba): cig gis nI bAr bur gyi snod dag khyer te phyi rol tu phyung la 'or cig/de ste/ka ba la 'jus na ka ba chod cig/sgo skyes la 'jus na sgo skyes kyang phyung la/de la ngo zlog
137b6('dul ba): mi phod par mi byed cig/slar phus bcos par bgyi/dge 'dun gyiso//'chos pa'i yo byad su las dgug/yon bdag la bsku'o//des kyang mi 'byor na dge 'dun thams
137b7('dul ba): tsidade kyi nor gyis slar bcos par bya ste de la the tshom du ma byed cig/tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge rlod la ji ltar dge slong ma dang dani slob mya dang /dge tshul pa deng dge tshul
138a1('dul ba): ma dag kyang de bzhino//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim pa la smod par byed pa'i dge slong de la slar bsdum pa'i las byas shig ces gsungs
138a2('dul ba): na/btsun pa de ste dge slong mas kyang khyim pa la smad par gyur na/de la yang slar bsdum pa'i las bgyi 'am/u pa li de la yang slar bsdum po'i las byed du chud

138a7('dul ba): bzhin du bya'o//dge tshul phas dge tshul pha dang dge slong dang dge bsnyen dang dge slob ma dang dge tshul ma la yang de bzhin du bya'o//dge tshul mas dge tshul ma dang
138b1('dul ba): dge slong dang dgra bsnyen dang dge slong ma dang dge tshul pha la yang de bzhin du bya'o//da ltar 'khor lo bzhin rgyas par brjod do//gleng gzhi'i sgo gnyis pa'i mdo'i tshigasu bcad

138b5('dul ba): rdzogs pa zhes pak+Shi/u pa li bsnyen par ni rdzogs mod kyi bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa ni 'das pa dang bcas pa'o//bzod pa ni gsol ba zhes bya'o//btsun pa
138b6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis lo lnga lon la/chos rnam pa lnga dang ldan na gnas ma bcas kyang ljongs spyad pa spyod du gna'o zhes gsungs na/btsun pa lo bzhi ljon la chos rnam
138b7('dul ba): pa lnga dang ldan ni de'ang gnas ma bcas par ljongs spyod pa spyod du gnang ngam/u pa li mi gnang ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/lo lnga ma lon pa mi rung ba'i phyiro//de lo drug
139a1('dul ba): gan lo dgu lon la/de yang chos kyu dang mo ldan na/d+yo gnas ma bcas par ljongs spyod pa spyod du gan ngam/A pA la mi gnang //nga ci'i phyir//
139a2('dul ba): zhen/chos lnga dang ldan par bya ba'i phyiraro//btsun pa dge slong basbyin par rdzogs nas lo gsum lo ni shA de mi sde snod gsum dang ldan pa rigs pa bsum dang ldan
139a3('dul ba): ba dri ma gsum dang bral na/de yang gzhan gnas bca' bar bgyi 'am/u pA li de yang bzhin//de ci'i phyir zhe ne/bcas pa'i tshul du bya ba'i phyir//dzA sang+ga gnas
139a4('dul ba): ma bcas pa la rnyed pa sprul ba ban+ti/u pa li da mya ngan yang zhag lnga'i bar du ste/yang gnas bca' ba tshol zhing sbyor ba ma btang ba'o//gleng gzhi'i blo go rjes phyi'i
139a5('dul ba): mdo'i tshigs bcad pa brgyad pa'o///mdor na/'thun pa deg dang mi mthun pa//tshad gzung du yang med pa dang //bcas pa dang ni mi bcas pa//de bzhin ming
139a6('dul ba): dang rigs //sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i tshul mgon med nas sbyin gyi ga ning gi' rab ni bzhug so//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la chod
139a7('dul ba): ldan pa u pa lis zhus po/btsun pa nangs pa 'thun pa zhes kyang brtsi/me mthun pa zhes kyang bgyi ni/btsun pa nongs pa 'thun pa gang lags//mi mthun pa gang lags
139b1('dul ba): u pa lis pas pham pa rnams ni phas pham par 'thun gyi/gzhan dang mi mthun pa'o//dge 'dun gyi lhag ma ni dge 'dun gyi lhag mar 'thun//rtsung bla na ltung bar 'thun/so sor
139b2('dul ba): bshags pa ni so sor bshags par 'thun//nyes byas ni nyes bya su 'thuno//btsun pa nongs pa tshad dang ldan pa zhes kyang bgyi/nongs po tshad dang mi ldan pa zhes kyang bgyi
139b3('dul ba): na/btsun pa tshad dang ldan pa de gang lags/u pa li gang zhagau gi mtha' dang nyes pa'i mtha' dran par gyur pa ste tshad dang ldan pa zhes bya'o//gang zhig dang nyes pa'i
139b4('dul ba): mtha' mi dran par gyur pa de ni tshad dang mi ldan pa zhes bya'o//btsun pa nongs pa bcabs pa zhes kyang bgyi/ma bcabs pa zhis kyang bgyi na/btsun pa bcabs pa gang
139b5('dul ba): lags pa ma bcabs pa gang lags/u pa li de ni rnam pa gnyis kyis bcabs pa ste/sems kyis bcabs pa dang /zhag tu bcabs pa'o//de la zhag tu bcabs
139b6('dul ba): pa gang yin pa de ni ma bcabs pa'o//sems kyis bcabs pa gang yin pa bcabs pA zhes bya'o//btsun pa nongs pa rnams kyi ming dang rus zhes bgyi ba btsun pa ming
139b7('dul ba): gang lags/rus gang lags/u pa lis phas pham pa rnams ni mingo //de las byung ba ni ru so//dge 'dun gyi lhag ma zhes bya ba ni ming //de las byung ba ni ru so//ltung
140a1('dul ba): ba dang so sor bshabs pa nyes pas rnams ni mdo//de las byung ba ni ru smai//gleng bzhi rtswa gnyis pa'i myado'i tshog su bcad pa dag pa'o/
140a2('dul ba): mdor na/brtsi ba chad pas bcad pa dang //bslab pa byin la mi spyad de//de dag la ni dang mi sbyin//dge slong byed dang mi len to//sangs rgyas bcom ldani 'das mnyan du
140a3('dul ba): yod pa dze tA'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhu gas//drug sde dag dge 'dun gyi lhag modze nyes pa byung bar myur nas/de dag chad pas bcad pa dang /
140a4('dul ba): de dgyur ba'i rlung du dkyil 'khor byas nas rjud pa byed//de de dag la dge slong dag gis tshe dang ldan pa dag ci zhig byed/de dag gis smras pa med pa byed zhes smras pa dang /
140a5('dul ba): dge slong dag gis 'di ni slar bcabs pa yin gyi tshod pa ma yin no zhing smras pa dang /de dag spu gong nas cang mi zer bar 'dug de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom
140a6('dul ba): ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag dang ni dge slong gcig pu gnas pa der chad pa'i las me byed tsog ces bka' stsal to//gang du
140a7('dul ba): dge slong gnyis sam gsum gnas pa der yang dge slong dag gis chad pa'i las ma byed cig/gang na dge slong bzhi 'am de las lhag ma yang rung gnas pa dge
140b1('dul ba): slong dag gis chad pa dang gzhi nas bslang ba'i chud pa gzhi nus slar bslang ba dang /yid mgu bar bya ba dang gzha nas yid mgu bar bya ba dang /gzhi nas skur skrangs te yang
140b2('dul ba): mgu ba dag myos shig/bcom ldan 'das kyis gang na dge slong lda ni 'am/de las lhag par gnas pa de dag tu dge slong gis chad pa dang /gzhi nas bsgreng ba'i chad
140b3('dul ba): pa dang bzhi nas slar bslang ba dang /yid mgu bar bya ba dang /gzhi nas yid mgu bar bya ba dang /gzhi nas slar bslang ba dag kyang byes shig ces bka' stsal pa dang /
140b4('dul ba): dge slong dag gis bslab pa byin pa'i dge slong bzhi la chad pa byed pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/bslab pa byin pa'i dge slong bzhi la yang chad pa
140b5('dul ba): byed du mi gnang //bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa byin pa'i dge slong bzhi la chad pa byed du me gan ngo zhes bka' stsal pa dang /dge slong dag gis bslab pa byin pa gsum
140b6('dul ba): dang /tshul bzhin gnas pa gcig la byed do//bsgrub pa byin pa gnyis dang /tshul bzhi ni gnas pa gnyis la byed do//bslab pa byin pa gcig dang tshul bzhin gnas pa
140b7('dul ba): gsum la chad pa byed do//de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol pa/bslab pa byin pa bzhi la yang
141a1('dul ba): chad pa ma byed cig/bslab pa byin pa gsum dang /tshul bzhin gnas pa gcig la ma pyod cig/bslab pa byin pa gnyis dang tshul bzhin gnas//
141a2('dul ba): ba gnyis la yang ma byed cig/bslab pa byin pa gcig dang tshul bzhin gnas pa gsum la yang chad pa ma byed par yongasu dag pa bzhi 'am/de las mang ba rnams
141a3('dul ba): la chad pa byos shig/chang pas bcad pa la ji lta bar gzhi nas bslang ba'i chad pa dang chad pa gzhi nas slar bslang ba dang /yid mgu bar byed pa dang /gzhi nas
141a4('dul ba): bslangs te yid mgu bar byed pa dang /gzhi nas slar bslang ba'i yid mgu bar bya ba rnams kyang de bzhin//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis
141a5('dul ba): zhus pa/btsun pa bslab papo/stsal ba la dad pa stsal du rung ngam/u pa le mi rung //chos nyid la reg na mi rung //btsun pa bslab pa stsal ba las dad pa blang du rung
141a6('dul ba): ngam/u pa li de la dge slong du 'du shes bzhag ni gdod rung //gleng gzhi'i sgo gnyis pa'i mdo'i tshogasu bcad pa bcu rdzogs te sgro gnyis pa rdzogaso////mdor

156b7('dul ba): da gros kyi tshong pa dngagis kyi 'ang po dang /mal gyi khang pa da su kyig dnga'i rgya nga rung ngo shis ring byi dri dang gise dang la tshogs pa rnam pa sna chags kyi
157a1('dul ba): gang bar yod kyis tshur spyon lhan cig de zhug s+ho zhes smras nas de dag lhan cig tu l-i du mu lho brgya du ma la stong du ma lo brgya sbyong du myur dzaM ltar sems can/
157a2('dul ba): bsod nams byas pa dag pa byas pa mthu chen po rdzu 'phrul tshin po myong ba bzhin myog gyur to//dri dag gis kyang lho phyogs kyi lam du mi 'gro shig ces bsgo'o//dri lho phyogs
157a3('dul ba): kyi lam du ma 'gro shig ces bsgo yang je thur btan cing 'gro bar 'dod nas ji tsam zhig na lho phyogs kyi lam du song na de phyi phyir zhing dad pa skyes te de rim gyis lto
157a4('dul ba): phyogs snying ba dang lcags las byas pa'i grong khyer zhig mthong ste de der zhugaso//deng zhugs mi thag tu de'i sgo yang slar btsod par gyur te//de nas yang nang du song
157a5('dul ba): baM dang blo yang de bzhin du bcad//de nas yang nang du song ba dang /sgo yang bcad par gyur te ji tsam zhig na skyes bu rab tu lus che ba zhig de nas byung ste de'i spyi bo la
157a6('dul ba): lcags kyi 'khor lo 'bar ba rab tu 'bar ba shin tu rab tu 'bar ba me lce gcig tu gyur pa zhig tu 'khor zhing 'dug ste/de'i mgo la rnag khrag byung ba ni zasu za bar
157a7('dul ba): mthong //de nas bu mo 'dza' mos skyes bu de la khyod ci'i phyir de ltar gyur ces dris pa dang /des ngas ni ma la gnod pa byas pa'i phyiro zhes skyes bu des de skad du smras
157b1('dul ba): ma thag tu bu mo mdza' mo ngos kyang mngon du ston par gyur to/bdag gos kyang mA la gnod pa byas nas de'i las kyis 'dir khrod do 'ongs snyam bsnams pa dang /ngo ma thag tu
157b2('dul ba): namakha' las sgra 'dre skadadu/gang bcings pa de ni dza re/gang ma bcings pa de ni bcings pa'o zhes smra de byung ma thag tu de'i smyo ba na 'khor lo yod pa de ni med par gyur to//
157b3('dul ba): bu mo mdza' mo'i spyi bo 'khor lo byung /de nas bu mo mdza' mo rab tu sdug bsngal bar skyes bu des mthong nas tshigasu bcad de smras pa/rtag tu dga' dang dregs byeng
157b4('dul ba): cing /daskyid par byed pa por byas te//tshangs pa bla'i khang pa nas//ci'i phyir ni khyod 'dir 'ongs//bu mo mdza' mos smras pa/rtag tu dga' dang dregs byung cing //spyod pa
157b5('dul ba): byed par bor byas te//tshangs pa bla ma'i khang pa nas//'dir ni log par 'dod gyur pa//yun rings po'i las kyis gnyer//las kyis rang nas gnyer nas kyang //gang du
157b6('dul ba): las kyis gnyer ba der//las kyang rnam par smin par 'gyur//las kyis rnam par smin pas na//'khor lo 'bar ba rab 'bar ba//bdag gi srog la gnod gyur te//kle
157b7('dul ba): pa 'khor lo 'bar bar gyur//mi des smras pa/khyod kyis ngan pa'i sems bskyed de//dga' bar byed pa ma yi mgor//khyod kyis rdog pas brgyab pas na//de yi las kyi//
158a1('dul ba): 'bras bu yin//bu mo mdza' mos smras pa/'khor lo 'bar bya rab 'bar ba//bdag gi srog la gnod byed pa/lo grangs stong phrag ji srid du//nga wa
158a2('dul ba): klang la 'khor bar 'gyur//mi des smras pa/lo grangs stong phrag drug cu dang //lo grangs brgya'i bar du ni//'bar ba'i lcags kyi 'khor los kyang //khyod kyi mgo la 'joms
158a3('dul ba): bar byed//de nas bu mo mdza' mo des mi de la kye skyes bu gzhan dag kyang 'dir 'ong ba lta yod dam mang zhes smras pa dang /mi des smras pa gang gi las 'di lta bu
158a4('dul ba): byas pa dag ni 'dir 'ong bar 'gyur ro//de nas bu mo mdza' mo de sdug bsngal gyis mngon du gzir ba dang /sems can rnams la snying rje ba bskyed nas mi de la 'di skad
158a5('dul ba): smraso//kye skyes bu ngas sems can thams cad kyi phyir 'khor lo 'di mgo la bzod par byas/gzhan dag gis 'di 'dra ba'i las byas po de dag 'dir ma 'ong zhig
158a6('dul ba): tsos smras mo thag tu bu mo mdza' mo byang chub sems dpa' de'i mgo las 'khor la de shing rta la bdun tsam du na mkha' la 'phags nas 'dug pa dang /da'ang dus 'das
158a7('dul ba): nas dga' ldan gnam gyi lha'i khamasu skye so zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to//dge slong dge ji snyam du sems de'i dus na bu mo mdza' mo zhes bya ba ni nga
158b1('dul ba): nyid yin te/de'i tshangs chod byas te/kar sha ba na ma la byin pa de'i lus kyi rnam par skyon pus ni grong khyer chen po rnam bzhir rab tu bde ba myong bar gyur to//de nas ngas
158b2('dul ba): ma la gnod pa cung zad cig byas pas las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pas ni rnam pa 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal mying bar gyur to//de bas na dge slong dag de bzhin du
158b3('dul ba): bslab par gyis shig/phywa dang ma la phan gdags par bye yi gnod par ma byed cig dang /de lta bu'i gnod pa myong bar 'byung ba ni ji ltar bu mo mdza' myos sa skye bo'i
158b4('dul ba): chen mo rang bzhin te/yon tan mang por yang 'gyur zhing du yang de bzhin gshegs pa yin te/dge slong dag de bzhin bsgrub par byos sbyin//dge slong dag de lta bas
158b5('dul ba): natshul khrims rab tu nyams par 'gyur yang rnam pa lnga la ni nye g.yog bya bar gnang ste/lnga gang zhe na/pha dang ma dang mkhyen po dang slob dpon dang nad pa rnamaso//glang
158b6('dul ba): bzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag nyi ma ni shar/bya rog ni zer/zheng pa ni rmo/brko byed ma lus pa su
158b7('dul ba): brnams na du'o//dge slong dag de ni dper byas te/don de mi shes pa'i phyir don de'ang bstan par bya ste/dge slong dag nyi ma shar ces bya ba ni de bzhin gaushegs pa yang
159a1('dul ba): /dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshig bla dag so//bya rog zer ro zhes bya ba ni/chos kyi snod gang zag rnams kyi tshig bla dgoso//zhing pa zhing rme ba ces
159a2('dul ba): bya ba ni sbyin par byed pa dang /sbyin bdag rnams kyi tshig bla dag so//ma byin par rku ba rnams ngu'o zhes bya ba ni bdud kyi 'khor gyi tshig bla dag so//de lta bas na dge slong dag

159a6('dul ba): dgon par gsungs pa ni phyis 'gyod par gyur ta re/'di ni ngas bstan pa'o zhes gsungs pa'i bar du snga ma bzhi no//dge slong dag dgon pa dang nags tshal gyi phyogs
159a7('dul ba): dang bas mtha' la gnas shing bsam gtan byed pa la zhug so//mnyan du yod pa ni khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis dgon pa la gnas pa'i dge slong dag gi phyir dgon par
159b1('dul ba): khyim brtsigs te/ji tsam zhig na bsod snyoms pa gzhan zhog ljongs spyad pa spyod cing mnyan du yod par phyin pa dang /de'ang slar khyim du 'ongs te 'dug pa dang /de dus phyi
159b2('dul ba): zhog na de'i skra dang kha spu ring por gyur nas snga dro'i dus na sham thabs bgos to//lhung bzed dang chos gos khyer te song ba dang de la khyim de dag ngos 'phags pa sgra dang kho spu
159b3('dul ba): ri zhes smras pa dang /des bzhin bzangs 'dreg mkhyen med do zhes smras nas/khyim bdag gis 'phags pa de lta na bzhud cig dang /bdag gis 'dreg mkhyen pa
159b4('dul ba): zhes smras pa dang /des bsod snyoms blangs nas slar song ba dang /nges 'dreg ma 'an yang bta //bsod snyoms pa dri rab tu le lo tsun zhig ste de gding ba'i steng du 'dug
159b5('dul ba): bzhin skra bregs pa dang skra yang griding ba'i steng du lhung nas zad par dor ma nus/khyim bdag nges bsams pa/'dreg mkhan khyod song la dge slong de'i skra dang kha spu dag
159b6('dul ba): bregs sam ma bregs ltos shig ces smras pa dang /de der song sdong nas gding ba de'i steng du 'dug pa dang de'i gos la skra dag chags nas/khyim bdag des bso
159b7('dul ba): snyoms pa de la mgu ba dag byas nas slar khyim du song ba dang /de'i chung mas jo mo'i sras ci khyod 'dreg mkhan gyi khyim na 'dug gam/des gos la bltas na sgra chags
160a1('dul ba): shing 'dug pa mthong nas des bsams pa/bsod snyoms pa la de gding ba'i steng du 'dug bzhin du sgyu ma bregs grang zhes de ltar 'gro'o snyam bsams
160a2('dul ba): nas de der song ste bltas pa dang /de'i gding ba la skra dag gis gang zhing 'dug pa mthong nas/'phags pa gi deng ba'i steng du skra mo bregs pa tsam yang mi shes sam zhes
160a3('dul ba): nyes par ngor brjod pa dang bsod snyoms pa de gnod nas spa gong ste/ngo tsha nas cang mi zer bar 'dug/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa
160a4('dul ba): dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag khyim bdag de dag 'phya ba ni yus te/de bos na dge slong dag gding ba'i steng na 'dug cing skra ma 'dregs

160a6('dul ba): sa dang sgo khang du smre bregs nas/de nyid nyes pa'i dmig su gyur na se/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gang dge 'dun gyis phyag dar byed pa'i gnas der

160b1('dul ba): gsungs pa dang /dge slong kha cig rgyas shing 'khrugs la ring bar gyur khwa tsa ka non par gyur to//phyi rol tu 'gro ma nus mon pa dag kyang tsha zhing char pa bab par gyur pa dang de

160b3('dul ba): dge slong dag rgas shing 'khogs la rid par gyur pa dang ni ste mi bde ba dag ni snga khang du skra breg par gyis shig/min pa dang tsha zhing char pa bab par gyur te/phyi rol tu 'byung
160b4('dul ba): byur mi bden/de yang snga khang du sgra breg par gyis shig/sa'i dngos pa thams cadadu 'dus gro zhi phyi bdar bya/ya na ni bye chug shig/skra ni bsdus la phyag dar khrod du 'or cig/sen
160b5('dul ba): mo gcod pa yang go rims 'di bzhi no//gang mi bde bar gyur pa de la rje su bcas kyi/mi bdo ba med po dag ni de ltar mi byed cig/byas na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyuraro//gleng
160b6('dul ba): gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/de'i tshe na dge slong ba zhig na bor gyur na/des rtsa ba dang sdong bu dang 'dab ma dang 'bras bu rnams kyi sman gyis gsos kyang de'i nad sos par ma gyur

161a1('dul ba): dang /des 'phags pa phyo dro byi zo shig dang sos par 'gyur zhes smras pa dang /de dag gis bzhin bzangs phyi dro phye bza' bar bcom ldan 'das kyis myu gan

163b1('dul ba): rlung na chongs shog ces gsungs na/ji lta bu bcang b+hur ba /u pA lA dr-i ni rin po che las byas pa mA g+hA ga sa pa'o//b+hAn+d+han+da pa bcom ldan 'das kyis khri dang rlung

163b3('dul ba): ni khyim bdag gzhan zhig na bar gyur nas/des sman pa la dris pa/bzhin bzangs bdag nad 'di 'dra ba zhig gis btab na sman dpyad kyi thabs ston cig ces smras pa dang /des

163b5('dul ba): ngos khyim bdag ci byed cing 'dug ces smras pa dang /des ji ltar gyur pa zhib tu smraso//des khyim bdag kho bo bkru sman gtong ba rab tu mkhas kyis sman pa la sbyin pa de kho bo
163b6('dul ba): la byin cig dang ngos khyod la bkrus smin bting zhes smras pa dang /khyim 'dag des la gos kyis de bzhin du big+hi'o zhes smras pa nas/des de bkru smanr-i btang nas
163b7('dul ba): gtsug lag khung du langs te song //khyim bdag de'i bkra sman mchod nas de'i nye du dag song ste sman pa la dris pa khyim bdag de bkru sman mchod na thabs ji lta bur bgyi zhe
164a1('dul ba): smras pa dang /de la bkru sman sum brud/de dag gis 'phags pa 'di zhes bya bas rlung zhes smras pa dang /dakhros nas de nyin gyi rgan du song la dris shig ces smras/
164a2('dul ba): de dag gis de de'u shi ba lngas sos nus/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol po dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de lta bas na dkri
164a3('dul ba): slong dag gis rngan pa len cing sman ma gtong shig/de ste bkru sman btang na yeng gud du ma 'gro shig/de 'dra ba'i rkyen cig byung na yang sman dpyad ston la song shig/de bzhin

171a7('dul ba): mi mtshungs ci las byung //khyod kyi lus las 'od byung ba//ci phyir khyod gdong pad+mo kha 'bus 'dra//khyod ni gser gyi 'od 'dra ba//ci yi 'bras bu lha mo bdage/

171b2('dul ba): se li de la mar me phul//nyon mongs mun pa sil lnga phul//zla ba'i 'od zer 'dra ba'i 'od mthong nas//thub pu gsal ba'i dngos po ste//ston pa'i 'od mthu mthong bas na//
