171b4('dul ba): rnam par dag/brgya byin gyis smras pa e ma'o zhing 'di yon tan can//nyes pa thams cad rnam spangs la//mtho ris gang du skye ba yi//khyod kyis sa bon
171b5('dul ba): drir btab bo//gsor bzhin spangs la dkar ba yin//rnam pa mchog la sus mi mchod//sangs rgyas padad+ma mo kha' byis bzhin//gang du lhags pas
171b6('dul ba): skye ba pad mo spyan//yan lag ma chog rnams 'bar ba ste//sprin ni me tog ka ma la 'dra ba//chos nyid kyis lha'i bu po 'am lha'i bu mo yang rung ste sumA
171b7('dul ba): cu rtsa gsum du skyes nas/ring po me lon par gang nas shi 'phos pa dang /gang du skyes pa dang las gang yin pa'i sems 'di gsum skye bar 'gyur ro//
172a1('dul ba): stu'i bu mo dpal rgyo blo gros mas bdag gang nas shi 'bos shes bltas na mo laso//gang du snyam pa dang /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i khams bzang por skyes pa mdzang //
172a2('dul ba): las gang yin zhe na/bcom ldan 'das la sems rab tu dad pa'o snyam du sems nas dri nas dpal gyi blo gros mas 'di snyam du bdag gis zhag lon la bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal lta
172a3('dul ba): ba ri mi rigs kyi ci nas bdag gis zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das lta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam bsams nas/de nas lho'i bu ma dpal gyi glo gas mas dri ma med pa 'tsher ba'i rna tsan+de
172a4('dul ba): thogs/lus do shal dngas mo des brgyan te/sgra'i me tog ud pa laM dang po d+mod ku mu dang pud+ha ri ka dpa/man+t+ra ra ba la sogs pa'i me tog dgu gis bang bya bkang nas 'di ma'i
172a5('dul ba): tshal byAkA lan dka gnas pa rgya chen dos thams cad 'od snang bar byas te/bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis mngon par gtor nas chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
172a6('dul ba): snar 'o/bcom ldan+da 'as kyis phy-i bsum pa dang drug many+dza pa dang /khams drung rlung bzhin mkhyenanas dzA ltar 'phags pa'i bden po pa ni rab tu rtogs par
172a7('dul ba): bde lta bu'i chos bshad do thos nas lha'i bu mo dpal gyi blo gros mas 'jig cho ga su lta ba'i ri rtse me nyi shu thib ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du
172b1('dul ba): byaso//des bden pa mthong nas brjod pa bya ba rnam gsum brjod de/btsun pa bdag la 'di ltar ni phas kyang ma bgyis mas kyang ma bgyis rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis lhas kyang ma bgyis/
172b2('dul ba): sdug pas kyang ma bgyis/pho nu dang gnyen gyis kyang ma bgyis/tshe snga ma la ma bgyis bram ze dang dge slong gis ma bgyis/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gis mchi ma khrag gi rgya mtsho ni
172b3('dul ba): bsgang rus pa'i ri las ni bsgral ngan song gi sgo ni bgum/mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo ni phye ste/bdag ni lha dang mi'i gan su bzhag go zhes gsol to//smras pa/khyod kyi mthus ni rab
172b4('dul ba): gsal ba/ngan song lam ste nyes mang po//mtho rase bsod nams sgo yang phye//mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob//khyod la brten nas nyes pa rnams kyang spangs//bdag gi
172b5('dul ba): rtag tu rnam dag nyid kyang thob//'phags pa dga' zhing zhi ba'i lam yang thob//sdug bsngal mtsho las pha rol bdag rgal nas//'gro ba na yang lha mi rnams kyis mchod//skye rgan dang
172b6('dul ba): 'chi ba'i nyes dang bral//srid pa stong yang rab tu thob par dga'//de ring thub pa'i zhal mthong 'bras bu thob//btud nas sen mo de yang rab tu 'phyang //zhabs gnyis la yang phyag
172b7('dul ba): byas dga' ba skyes//rgyal la g.yas kyi phyogs nas bskor nas ni//lha yi 'jig rten khamasu mngon du song //de nas lha'i bu mo dpal gyi blo gros mchod pas khe rnyed pa bzhin//
174a1('dul ba): zhing pa lo legs pa bzhin/dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba bzhin/nad pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin/longs spyod pa gang dag dang ldan pas bac+doMs
174a2('dul ba): kyi drung du 'ongs pa'i longs spyod de nyid dang bdag gi gnasu song ngo //dge slong dag srod dang tho rangs mi nyal zhing thub pa la brtson zhing /'khod pa dong bcom ldan 'das kyis der 'od
174a3('dul ba): rgya cher snang ba mthong ngo //mthong nas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ci bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das la zhal blta ba'i phyir tshangs pa 'khor gyi bdag po 'am/brgya byin

174a5('dul ba): slong dag tshangs pa 'khor gyi bdag po yang ma yin/brgya byin lha'i dbang po yang ma yin/'jig rten skyong ba bzhi la sogs pa lhag pa'ang ma yin mod kyi rgyal po gzugs
174a6('dul ba): can snying po'i chung ma dpal gyi blo gros ma zhes bya ba zhig bdag gi 'tsho ba la ma bltas te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten las mar me'i phreng ba phul ba/
174a7('dul ba): de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras 'khor lo 'phangs te 'tsho ba dang phra lo//de nga la sems mngon par dad bzhin du dus 'das nas sum cu rtsa gsum du gnas bzang po'i lhar skyes//
174b1('dul ba): drimyu mo de'aM d+hang du 'ongs te de la dus chos bshad nas des bden pa mthong ste bdag gi gan su song ngo //de ltar dgra dge slong da /bsod nams la 'jigs par ma byed cig/ci'i phyir zhun//
174b2('dul ba): de ni bde ba'i tshig bla dgas//mos pa dang sdug pa dang /shin tu sdug pa dang //yid du 'ong bar gyur pa ni 'di lta ste bso de na mgo//dge slong dag khyed cag gos bsad nam sa ma ston
174b3('dul ba): pa la 'jigs par gyis shig/ci'i phyir /de ni sdug bsgrim gyi tshig bla drug so//ma mos pa dang /mi sdig pa dang shin tu mi sdug bye dang /sid du mi 'ong ba ni 'di lta ste sod
174b4('dul ba): nams ma yin pa'o//dge slong dag ngas yun ring po nas kying mngon par mthong ste/yun ring po nas bsod nams byas pa rnam par smin pa mos pa dang sdug pa drang shin tu sdug pa dang /
174b5('dul ba): yid du 'ong ba dag myong por 'gyuraro//dge slong dag ngas lo bdun gyi bar du byams pa'i sems bsgom pra bsgral pa rikri ba dang rtas pa bdun gyi bar du 'jig rten 'dir ma 'ongs//'jig
174b6('dul ba): rten 'jig pa'i tshe san+d+ha snang dang ba'i lta sa su skyeso//rtas pa'i tshe tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang stong par skyes nas der yang ngas tshangs pa dang /tshangs chen gyis bdag por gyur nas
174b7('dul ba): rim zil gyim nan gyi gzhan gyis ma yin no//sems can brgya drug bcul pa'i sbyar /sems can gyi nang ni mchog tu bsdug so//stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug gi ba ri
175a1('dul ba): byin lha'i dbang por gyur to//brgya phyug glangs myod pa'i bar du 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur to//mtha' bzhi btul nas rin po che bdun dang ldan no//ran
175a2('dul ba): po che sna bdun ni rnam pa 'di lta bu yin te/'di lta ste/'khor lo rin po che dang /glang po rin po che dang /rta rin po che dang /nor bu rin po che dang /bud med rin po ched
175a3('dul ba): khyim bdag rin po che dang /dmag mi rin po che dang bdun no//nga la bu yang stong tshang nas de dag kyang dpa' ba dang nus pa dang /gzugasu ldan pa/pha rol gyi sde tshar gcod pa
175a4('dul ba): ste/de yang ngas 'di ltar rgya mtsho'i mtha' tshun chad sa chen po 'di chos kyis btul gyi dbyug pa dang mtshon gyis gnod cing mi bde ba med par gnaso//de'i tshe yeng nga 'di snyam
175a5('dul ba): du las gang gis 'bras bu rnam par smin pas bdag 'dir mthu che rdzu 'phrul che bar gyur snyam bsams pa dang /yang 'di snyam du las 'di'i 'bras bu gsum dang las 'di'i 'bras bu
175a6('dul ba): rnam par smin pa gsum gyis bdag 'di ltar mthu che bar gyur te gsum gang zhe na 'di lta ste sbyin pa dang gdul ba dang dul ba'o snyam du bsams nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis de
175a7('dul ba): skad ces gsungs nas yang ston pas 'di skad gsung so dge zhing bde bar 'dod pa yis//bsod nams rnam par smin la ltos//lo bdun bar du dge slong dag/byams par
175b1('dul ba): byed pa'i sems bsgoms pas//bskal pa 'jig cing rtas gyur pa//bdun du 'jig rten 'dir ma 'ongs//'jig pa'i tshe na bdag nyid ni//'jig rten kun snang dang bar gnas//rtas nas
175b2('dul ba): chormongs pa'i 'jig rten na//tshangs chen dbang sgyur gnasu yang //lan bdun gyi ni bar du gnas//sum cu rtsa drug bar du ni//lha yi dbang po byas par gyur//brgya phrag grangs med par du
175b3('dul ba): yang //rgyal po rab tu 'jig grags byas//rgyal rig la rgyal thabs spyi bor blugs//'dzam bu gnas kyi dbang por gyur//dbyug dang mtshon gyis ma yin pa re//'jig rten 'di
175b4('dul ba): yang thul bar byas//chos nyid kyis ni rkyen med par//yang dag rje su slob par gyur//chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor nas//sa yi dkyil 'khor 'di dag tu//phyug cing long spyod
175b5('dul ba): che ba der//de 'dra'i rigasu nga yang skyes//nor rdzas thams cad phun sum tshogs//rin chen sna bdun de bzhin te//nor dang yo byad mang por ldan//rgyal po grags shing
175b6('dul ba): 'jigs par 'gyur//mthu chen de yi rgyu yis ni//gang du skyes pa'i mchog tu gyur//sangs rgyas 'jig rten phan pa can//de yis 'di ltar bshad pa'o//ngo mtshar che ba 'di
175b7('dul ba): shes pa//de yang rdzu 'phrul chung ba yin//mkhas pa gang gis dang mi 'gyur//de ste rigs ni dmar gyur kyang //de la phan par 'dod pa dang //mthu rnams chen por mngon
176a1('dul ba): 'dod pa//dam pa'i chos la bla mar byos//sangs rgyas bstan la dran par gyis//bcom ldan 'das kyis da skad gsungs pa dang /dge slong dag myed
176a2('dul ba): mgu ste/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga'o//gleng gzhi nang nis/sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigasu bcad pa bdun du'o///mdor na/

176a4('dul ba): mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so//khyim bdag mgron med zas sbyin bcom ldan 'das gang na be der song nas/bac+doMs kyi
176a5('dul ba): zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad du de ste/bcom ldan 'das kyis rje su gnang na bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skra dang sen mo'o
176a6('dul ba): mchod rten la/mtha' ma dri gtsang khang gis bskor la rta babs kyang gzugs par bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de lta bas nu khyim
176a7('dul ba): bdag rje su gnang gis byos shig/yang bcom ldan 'das de ste rje su gnang na/bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la ba gam 'gyi'o zhes
176b1('dul ba): gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/khyim bdag de lta bas na ngas rjesu gnad gis byos shig/de nas bcom ldan 'das do ste rjes gnang na bdag bris pa gam gyis/

176b3('dul ba): gnang na bdag gis ka ba dag tshal gyis byug go zhes gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/khyim bdag de lta bas na rje su gnang gis byos shig/bcom ldan 'das
176b4('dul ba): kyis de ste rje su gnang na/bdag gis rtsig dro rgya skyegs kyis bri bar bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/khyim bdag de lta bas na rje su gnang gis ris
176b5('dul ba): shig/gleng gzhi'i nang nas sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshig su bcad pa brgyad pa'o///mdor na/ba lang so dang tha gu dang //phreng ba rin chen phreng ba can//g.yog
176b6('dul ba): ma dang ni snying po dang //snying po yi ni sgo yang ngo //sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze tA'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba ni bzhug so//bcom ldan 'das kyis
176b7('dul ba): dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la mchod pa dang bkur sti byos shig ces gsungs na dge slong dag gis mchod rten la mchod po byed pa na phur bus btab nas me tog gi phreng ba btags pa
177a1('dul ba): dang /bram ze dang khyim ba dag dad pa dag gis mthong nas kyang phyir 'di ltar dge slong dag bris ston pa'i mchod rten la phur bu med pa la phur kur btab ces
177a2('dul ba): 'phyas 'dog so//de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dong /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/bram ze dang khyim bdag 'phya ba ni yus te/
177a3('dul ba): delta bstan mchod rten la phur bu ma btab par ba lang gi so ltalte bu chung ngus thob shig/bcom ldan 'das kyis ba lang gi so lta bu chung ngus thob shog ces bka' stsal pa dang /dag

177a5('dul ba): par mchod rten rtsig de'i tshe nas tshugs shig ces bka' stsal to//dge slong dag mchod pa byed pa na mchod rten la 'dzegs nas me tog gi phreng ba rnams mgur chu'i brel
177a6('dul ba): 'dug pa dang /bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis mthong nas ci'i phyir 'di ltar dge slong dag gos ston pa'i mchod rten la rdog pas ci zhing 'dong zhing 'dong zhes 'phyas 'dogs so//
177a7('dul ba): de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gos bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'phya ba ni yus te/de lta bas/
177b1('dul ba): nA dge slong dag gis ston pa'i mchod rten la rdog pas rdzis zhing ma mdo pa ni ga/de ste mchod pa'i phyir na ni/khyim byas 'dzegs shig/de med na dag tshul pas rkang pa gnyis khrus la
177b2('dul ba): dris byugs gam gos kyis dkris te 'thogs shig/de dag kyang med na dge slong dag gis ston par 'du shos zhog la dus la bab par soms te de lta re de bzhin du 'dzegs la dI'i ri ma
177b3('dul ba): byebyas shig/mchod rten che ste/'dzeg mi nus pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/thag lus thogs te 'dzegs shig dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la me tog gi phreng ba
177b4('dul ba): phul ba dang de dag snying sa twa mi mdzes par gyur nus khyim bdag skyabs med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das dbu skra drang sen mo'i mchod rten la me tog gi phyeng ba phul ba dang de dag bsnyegs
177b5('dul ba): te mi mdzes nas/de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la rin po che'i phreng ba dbul lo zhes gsol ba dang /bcom ldan 'das
177b6('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/de lta bas na khyim bdag gnang gis phul cig/dbu mra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la bya rog la sogs pa bya rnams 'khod de/de dag gi rdugs pas mchod
177b7('dul ba): rten ma rung bar gyur pa dang /khyim bdag mngon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das la dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la byo rog la sogs pa bya rnams mchis shing rtug pas
178a1('dul ba): mchod rten ma rung bar bgyis na/de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la g.yogs dang
178a2('dul ba): snying pos g.yog go zhes gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag de lta bas na gnang gis g.yog pa'i snying pos g.yogs shig ces bka' stsal pa dang /des g.yog
178a3('dul ba): pa'i snying pos g.yog so//g.yogs pa de dbyar 'drul zhing mun pas mi snang bar gyur pa dang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/bcom ldan 'das la bdag gis dbu skra
178a4('dul ba): dang sen mo'i mchod rten la g.yog pa'i snying pos g.yogs pa de da ltar dbyer gyi chab kyis rul te mun par gyur mi mngon no/de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bdag gis
178a5('dul ba): chab sgro gdod par bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de lta bas na khyim bdag gnang gis/sgo thod cig gleng gzhi'i nang nas sgo gsum pa'i
178a6('dul ba): mdo'i tshigasu bcad pa dgu pa'o///mdor na//khar ba la sogs mchod rten bya//gser dang dngul la sogs pa dang //rgyul mtshan gyi mu 'di la bsgyur//
178a7('dul ba): 'brumar la sogs chag tshig gdag//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i rdza ta'i tshil mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba ni bzhugaso//khyim po dag mgon med
178b1('dul ba): zas sbyin bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das kyis
178b2('dul ba): de ste gnang na bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis khar ba'i mchod rten bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/khyim bdag de lta bas na gnang gis byos shig dang /

178b4('dul ba): du dngul las byas pa dang /bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang /shel las byas pa brgya cher byos shig/de ste yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skra dang

178b6('dul ba): rgyal mtshan phul cig ces gsungs pa dang /des ci 'dra ba zhig dbul ba mi shes nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rgyal mtshon bzhi ste seng ge'i rgyal mtshan dang /
178b7('dul ba): chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan dang /klu'i rgyal mtshan dang /khyu mchog gi rgyal mtshan no//de ste yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skra dang sen
179a1('dul ba): rmA d+hA//mo'i mchod rten la 'bru myur gyis chag chags gdan po zhes gsol pa nga /com ldan 'das kyis bkar s+yAm+b+ha du/dam+b+ha bsgom snyom dag gan gas
179a2('dul ba): chag rgyag thob shig/yang gsol pa/de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bdag gis bcom ldan 'dus kyis cu skad sbyin mo'i mchod rten lnga ljod ris kyis b+hag ni zhe
179a3('dul ba): gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de lta bas na khyim bdag gnang gis byugs shig/ji lta brjing rlos kyis byugs pa de bzhin du can don gyis byug pa yang
179a4('dul ba): rgya cher byos shing//gleng gzhi'i nang nas sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshig su btsod pa bcu ste/gleng gzhi'i nang nas sgo gsum po rdzog so///mdor bsdus par nA//
179a5('dul ba): sgrol ba dong yang de ltar dgyur//drug sde dag dang btso blag mkhan//gnod pa bsten pa de bzhin to//kun du rgyu dang sbyin po dang //chag chag ga ba dang rung ba dang // zhin
179a6('dul ba): rnams bsdus par mdzod//mdor ni/le da smras ma khyud dang //dra ba da yang gzugs 'a khor dang/debo dang 'bras dang ts+tsha dang //nor las skyes dang
179a7('dul ba): rnam//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i rje ta'i tshi la mgon mod zas sbyi na dga' rab na btsug so//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan gsub
179b1('dul ba): lis zhus pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis sgrol ba lA lag gzungs byos shig/gsungs na ci 'dra ba las bgyi//u pa li rin po che ma gtogs pa'o//yang gsol /btsun pa//
179b2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi pus 'khyud chongs shig ces gsungs na ci lta bu las bcang bar bya//u pa la skud pa sna bdun te bal gyi dang ldum bu sha na ka'i dang /ras kyi skud pa
179b3('dul ba): dang /zer ma'i dang /rtswa du gu la'i dang /ko dam pa ka'i dang /srin bal rnams so//yang gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dra ba byos shig ces gsungs na ji lta bu las

193a1('dul ba): de yang 'di snyam du bdag song lu ma yur mo dang nu bo dag gi mya ngan bsang gi chos bshad du 'gro'o snyam du sems nas/da ji tsam dga' ba'i bar du ljongs spyod
193a2('dul ba): de mnyan du yod pa gang na ba de log su ljongs spyod cing song ngo //rims bzhin du spyod cing mnyan du yod par phyin nas lam gyi ngal bsos te bdag gi khyim du 'ongs pa dang /nong

193b5('dul ba): gleng bzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/dge slong dag lci ba'i ri lu dang /so shing dang /bkru ba'i yo byad dang /bang lang gi lci ba rnams 'chag sa dang /khyams dang sgo khang dag tu bor

193b7('dul ba): kyis bka' stsol po/yid btsugs pa rnam pa lnga las ni long shig/mdza' ba dang yid 'dris pa dang /bla ma dang mi 'gyur ba dang thos ni dga' bar 'gyur ba ste/yid btsus
194a1('dul ba): rnam sbrul ni skad du t+yan+ta/la tsam du ma rgyu rgyug rlung /non du tan du yod nAste/mnyan du med pa na khyim bdag gzhan zhig 'dug pa des
194a2('dul ba): rigs mnyam pa las chung ma zhig rje sa nas/de dang ldan cikrid+hA hUM dga' yong su spyo do//de la rno gu'i yong su spyod bu las dus bye zhig na tshung ma sems can dang rngan par gyu
194a3('dul ba): de zla ba brgyud dam dgu 'dres pa dang /bu ma zhig btsos nas de nig bdun gsu mo nyi shu rje gcig gi bar du btsos de'i bcos ston chen po byis nas rigs dang 'thun pa'i maung
194a4('dul ba): so//de bsri sa bskyed de rgyur gyur pa dang /khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis blangs te/de rdzas la sogs pas de rdzus te btang ngo //dus phyi zhig na khyim pa de dus 'das nus
194a5('dul ba): de khyo dang bral bu'i mya ngan gyis gdungs nas logs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ngo //de dus kyi zhig na mu gi byung nas bsod snyoms slong zhing 'dug pa dang de
194a6('dul ba): snod rnams spyod po las skye shig tu de'i byas mthong nas des smras pa/rgyu med ltar gang ni zhing 'dzug ces sgos 'ad/des bA mu ke b+h+re nas pa rab
194a7('dul ba): shing 'dug zhes smras pa dang /des bu mo de ltar na khyod rab tu ma byung na ni/des khyod la mi 'dong bzhin du sbyin na/de bsod snyoms ma byed par bdag gi khyim du zan ze/
194b1('dul ba): zhing dbyar mo khang du song shig des khas blangs/de grogs cig dang gnyis kyis zos shing dbyar mo khang du song ngo //zhag du ma zhig gi bar du der zos nas/bu bsod snyoms nga
194b2('dul ba): gnyis ni zas sbyin par mi nus kyis/khyod cig pu 'dir zan zos shing song shig ces smras pa dang /des pha bcom ldan 'das kyis gcig pu grong du 'gro bar ma gnang zhes smras pa

194b6('dul ba): du 'dug nas/thal mo sbyar la tshig 'di skad ces smos cig/gson cig 'phags ma'i dge 'dun ma rnams bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas 'di 'dra ba'i mu ge'i dus la bab nas/bsad
194b7('dul ba): snyoms blangs pa yang mi nus na/'phags ma'i dge 'dun ma bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'phags mi'i dge 'dun ma las gnyen dang lhan cig tu 'dre bar nye spyod kyi sdom pa gsol
195a1('dul ba): na/'phags ma'i dge 'dun dag gis bdag ming 'di zhes dgyi ba la gnyen dang lhan cig 'dra ba nye spyod kyi sdom pa stsol cog/badz+ra ba can brgya ba'i phyir rwa/

195a3('dul ba): slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di ni/'di ltar mu ga'i dus la bste/'phags ma'i dge 'dun dag las gnyen dang lhan cig tu 'dra bar nye spyod kyi sdom pags smin/

195b1('dul ba): slo me 'du zhes dam hA/mu ga 'dus la da n+tu/gan dang nag tu rlung m+b+ha snum pa stsal bar rgyad ba dnganan tu ma na du na//oM badz+rad dan smos shog/sh+tsang+ga//
195b2('dul ba): ma dge 'dun gyis dun slong ma ming 'di zhes 'byi ngas gnyon dang nan cig tu dri hU~M slod kyi sdom pasgra lags te 'a ma gsum dus/de de bzhin du na to//ngan
195b3('dul ba): nAsu ban da ldan cig N+DI dweDU b+h+rU~M kyi ma p+na/dge/'dun man sbyin pa gyu ni/cig zug rten gyi khyim dun myong chis la de hU~M du ma byed ca/rnam

195b7('dul ba): cizhig gis dus 'das nas dge slong de rje ltar dus 'dus mas/khyim da b+h+ri rmo/dge slong de ji ltar dus 'das gakhyim bdag ris thos nas/gtsug lag khang dus /
196a1('dul ba): /shos bzhin du dge slong dag la dris pa/'phags pa 'di zhes bgyi ba'i dge slong de gang na mchis/de dag gis smras pa/bzhin bzangs dus 'das//
196a2('dul ba): 'phags pa des bdag gi kAr sha pa ni zhog bskyis te 'tshal to//bzhin bzangs de ni dur khrod du bskyal gyis der song ste/dos shig 'phags pa khyed kyis de'i lhung bzed dang tshwa/

196b1('dul ba): zhig bskyis pa dang /de dus kyi mtha' zhig tu ji zhig gis dus 'das pa dang /dge slong dag gis snga ma bzhin du lhung bzed dang chos gos btsangs nas de la byin no//khyim bdag gis
196b2('dul ba): smras pa/'phags pa des bdag la 'di tsam zhig 'tshal te bdag la ni 'di las ma stsal gyis gzhan yang stsol cig ces smras pa dang /de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan

197a1('dul ba): dang lhung bzed ni khyed rnams kyis bgos na bdag ci'i phyir dur khrod du song ste 'dang/khyed rnams kyis byin cig de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom
197a2('dul ba): ldan 'das la gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong rnams gos 'ching ba 'di smra ba ni bden gyis do ni byin cig/dge slong rnams kyis de'i ras nyid byin pa

197a4('dul ba): rnams kyis de btsod par brtsams pa dang /snga ma'i rin thang du ma lon nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/lhag ni chos gos dang lhung bzed rnams chongs la byin cig/
197a5('dul ba): gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na dge slong zhig gis tha ga pa la ras 'thag pa'i phyir skud pa dang /rngan pa byin pa las dge slong dus 'das nas dge slong rnams kyis tha ga pa la bros te///

197a7('dul ba): ras sbyin par byas skud pa dang /rngan pa ni ma logaso zhes smras pa dang /dge slong rnams kyis de ji ltar bya ba ma shes nas/de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bac+doMs la
197b1('dul ba): gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams/tha ga pa smras pa ni bden gyis rasu long shig ces smras pa dang /dge slong rnams kyis phra mo las dkug pa dang /des 'phags
197b2('dul ba): parnams bdag gis des le sbom po sbyin par byaso zhes smras pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong de ni dus 'das kyis ci ltar byin pa de lta bur long shig/gleng
197b3('dul ba): gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/dge slong zhig gis gos 'tshod pa la kar sha pa na byin te/ras shig byin cig ces smras pa dang /dge slong de dus 'das nas dge slong rnams kyis gos

197b5('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyis de la ji ltar bya mi shes//de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams gos 'tshong ba de sgra
197b6('dul ba): nga ni bden gyis/rasu long shis ces smras pa dang /dge slong rnams kyi phra mo bkug pa dang /des 'phags pa rnams bdag gis de la sbom po dbul bar bgyis zhes smras pa dang /

198a1('dul ba): yod pa na ste/drug sde rnams 'jig rten pa la grags par gyur to/gang su yang rung nyo ba dang /'tshong ba de dag de dag gi drung du dong nus 'phags pa dngos po 'das
198a2('dul ba): ci ri zhes 'dri'o//de nas mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag gnyis shig cig ni gos nyo//cig ni 'tshong ste/de gnyis rin thang gi gtam smra zhing khang po'i steng du nye dga' bo phyogs der

198a5('dul ba): dga' bos 'di ni kar sha pa na nyi shu ri ba zhes smras nas/gnyis pa la yang gsung ste/bzhin bzangs ci khyod nyo'am 'on te 'tshong ba zhes dris pa dang /des 'phags pa bdag ni
198a6('dul ba): 'tsheng ba'o zhes dris so//des bdag ni 'tsheng ba'o zhes smras pa dang /nye dga' bos 'di ni kAr sha pa na bzhi bcu ri'o zhes smras pa dang /de gnyis gsang ste bslus nas/yang
198a7('dul ba): gnyi ga'i mngon sum du khyed cag ji lta bur legs pa de lta bur byos shig ces smras//de lta bur 'tshong ba des 'di ni kar sha ba na bzhi bcu ri'o zhes smras pa dang /gang nyo ba des
198b1('dul ba): 'phags pa bdag gos dad pa dang /yid ches pa las 'do nI kar sha pa na nyi shu rilo zhes thos so//zhes smras pa dang /des smras pa/khyod kyi dad pa dang yid ches pa su yin/'phags
198b2('dul ba): pa nye dga' bo yin no//bdag cag gnyis la des shes bzhin du gtses te bdag la des kar sha pa na bzhi bcu ri'o zhes smraso//des smras pa/bdag la yang des shes bzhin du gnyi ka
198b3('dul ba): la slu ba'i phyir mdor na des gnas ngan len la mtshungs par spyod kyis phyin chad dgos pa yod na yang de la mi 'di'o zhes smraso//de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis/bcom ldan 'dra

198b5('dul ba): ma gcod cig/khyim pa rtsod pa'i drung na ma 'dug cig/dge slong dag gis dngos po gang yang rin thang go cad dam khyim pa rtsod pa'i drung na 'dug na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro//
198b6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis dngos po gang la yang dge slong gis rin thang ma gcod cig/ces gsungs na/dge slong dag gis chos gos dang gos nyo bar 'dod pa'i phyir/tshong dus su song ste///

199a6('dul ba): sha pa na la sogs pa'i tshul gyis tshig lan gnyis lan gsum du 'dres par bskyed cing smra na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun gyi phyir rin

199b1('dul ba): bsgo ste/bsrung ba dang yang mang du bya//ca tso ma po 'byin pa'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshul bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugaso//gang gi tshe rgyal
199b2('dul ba): po gzugs can snying pos dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la bza' shing drung stong dang ldan pa'i kun dga' ra ba zhig phul ba de'i tshe na/dge slong rnams kyis 'bras bu zos nas rgyal por
199b3('dul ba): bor bas na mda' lte bu'i nag su gyur to//de nas dus phyi zhig na rgyal po lam de phyogasu phyin pa dang /des de dag mthong nas des blon po rnams la 'di lta bu su'i rab zhes smras pa dang /
199b4('dul ba): blon pos mda' lta bu'i nagasu myur pa'i kun dga' ra bo 'di/lho'i bza' shing drung stong dang ldan pa'i kun dga' ra ba dag 'phags pa rnams la phul ba de 'di nyid lags te/de dag
199b5('dul ba): gis 'bras bu zos nas phyal bar bor bas na da ni mda' lta bu'i nogasu gyur pa'o zhes smras pa dang /rgyal pos smras pa/kye 'phags pa de dag 'di la zhal ta dang las mi byed dam
199b6('dul ba): des lha de dag bsam gtan dang kha thon la zhugs pas/'di'i sug las dang zhal te mi bgyid do zhes smras pa dang /rgyal po cang mi smra bar gyur to//de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnam
199b7('dul ba): kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de lta bas na rtsa bas 'tsho ba las phyal bar med par gyis shig/dge slong rnams kyis

200a3('dul ba): byed mi nus/drug sde rnams ni byed du mi btub pas na las ma byas pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa 'khor rnam par dbye bas 'khor rnam par phye la
200a4('dul ba): skal skal du gos te las byos shig/dge slong rnams lung nod pa dang /klog pa dang //kha ton dang tshul bzhin yid la byed pa rnams kyang /sde de la zhugs po dang /
200a5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de 'ba' shig la yang 'jug par mi bya ste/la lar so shing bza' bar bya/l-i lar gdong pa bkru bar bya/laM lar ni rkang pa

200a7('dul ba): gis 'bras bu rgyal zhing smin pa de dag mthong nas/de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa rnams bdag cag kyang a mra smin pa'i 'bras bu bza' bar bgyi/kho bo cag kyang dbang ngam
200b1('dul ba): zhes smras pa dang /dge slong rnams kyis 'di dag ni bdag cag gos sngar bgos na/bzar ga la yod ces smras pa dang /de dgu 'phya bar gyur nas/de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis

200b4('dul ba): dbang ba dang /nad thams cad kyi rung ba'i rin dang /nar mar bza' ba thams cad do//de bas na dge slong rnams kyis rtsa bas 'tsho ba snyed dam 'bras bu 'am/me tog la sogs pa
200b5('dul ba): gang zag rnams kyis yongasu spyod pa bzhin du yongasu spyod cig/de dag mngon sum du dbang ba yin pas na zhal ta byos la me tog dang 'bras bu rnams ni/dge 'dun la rims shig/
200b6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon sum du dbang ba yin pas so sor zhal ta byos la me tog dang 'bras bu rnams dge 'dun la rims shig ces gsungs pa dang /dge slong rnams kyis de
200b7('dul ba): dag zhal te byas pas me tog dang /'bras bu smin pa dang /de dag yal bar bor nas me tog dang 'dras bu rnams rkun po rnams kyis khyer ba dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis srungs ma/
201a1('dul ba): zhog shig ces gsungs nas/dge slong rnams kyis nyung ngu zhig bzhag ste/de nyid nyes pa'i dmigasu gyur nus/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
201a2('dul ba): mang du 'khod pa de dag las phyed ni zan sngar zo shig/bcom ldan 'das kyis shing tog a mra'i 'bras bu smin pa dge 'dun la roms shig ces gsungs pa dang /gang gi tshe smin
201a3('dul ba): par gyur pa de'i tshe/srin bus zos par gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gnas 'chi' ba rnams kyis so sor brtag par byos shig/so sor brtag par
201a4('dul ba): byed pa de dag ca co che nas/dge slong rnams kyis de las bzlog kyang de dag mi btub pa dang /de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/bcom
201a5('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'phags pa'i mi smra bas so sor brtag par bya ste/ca tser ma smra shig/smras nas 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyuraro//gleng gzhi'i sgo bzhi pa'i
201a6('dul ba): mdo'i tshig su bcad pa dgu pa'o////mdor na/rung bar bya dang dge tshul ba//bdag gis byin gyis brlabs pa dang //bslangs shing byin len byed pa
201a7('dul ba): dang //yang na de ltar bstan pa dang //mtshams bcings pa dang stong pa dang //'thab mo dang ni rdzogs pa'o//bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshol bya ka lon+da ka
201b1('dul ba): gnas pa na bzhugaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis shing tog a mra'i 'bras bu rims shig ces gsungs pa dang /dge slong rnams sus brim pa mi shes nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis
201b2('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/rlung bar byed pas rims shig/rung bar byed pa ma na/dge tshul bas byos shig/dge tshul ba med na dge slong rang gi lag 'khrus la byin len byos te s+ye sar rung bar
201b3('dul ba): byas shig/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rang gi lag bakhros la byin 'an thos nyis sor rung bar byos pa rims shig ces bka' grel ba dang /'dris bu mong bas kong ba'i don dru gtsu
201b4('dul ba): blos mtheg nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/khyim pas kyang grogs byos la gnyis kas brim par bya ste/gang khyim pas brims pa rdo ni byin len bya'o//gang dge slong gis
201b5('dul ba): brims pa de ni byin len mi dgos so//a mra gzhan zhim par grags pa zhig yod na de dag bsres te brims pa dang thams cad kyis thob par ma gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis de
201b6('dul ba): dgaso sor rims shig ces gsung so//bcom ldan 'das kyis a mra gang zhim par grags pa so sor rims shig ces gsungs pa dang /drug sde rnams kun dge' ra bar dong nas
201b7('dul ba): dedag gis a mra'i zhim por grags pa de rang gis blangs nas/gtsug lag khang du 'ongs te byin len byas shing zos pa dang /dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag
202a1('dul ba): a mra'o zhim po de dag ma brims nas/ci'i phyir zad dam zhes dris pa dang /srung ma rnams kyis de dag drim du ga la yod/drug sde rnams kyis blangs te gtsug lag
202a2('dul ba): khang du dong nas byin len byas te zos so zhes smras pa dang /dge slong rnams 'phya bar gyur te/de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/bcom ldan 'dra
202a3('dul ba): kyis dgongs pa/dge slong rnams gang su zhig sngar blangs la/phyis byin lon byed na/nyes pa'i dmigasu 'gyur te/de bas na dge slong gis sngar blangs pa la las phyis byin
202a4('dul ba): len mi bya'o snyam du mkhyen nas/dge slong dag drug sde rnams kyis ni mi rigs par byas kyis de bas na dge slong rnams sngar blangs pa las phyis byin len ma byed cig/sngar blangs
202a5('dul ba): pa phyis byin len byas na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro//gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/dge slong rnams me tog dang 'bras bu dang bcos pa dang /gzhan yang bza' ba dang
202a6('dul ba): btung ba 'drim pa la 'dzub mos bstan cing 'di byin cig/'di dag byin cig ces smras zhing yongasu zos pa dang /'brim pa ma snyoms par gyur nas/'dod chags dang bral ba'i dge
202a7('dul ba): slong kha cig gis dpyas pa dang /de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis/bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag 'phya ba
202b1('dul ba): ni yus te de bas na dge slong dag gis 'dzub mos 'di byin cig/'di dag byin cig ces bstan cing bza' bar mi bya'o//dge slong gis 'dzub mos 'di byin cig/'di dag byin cig ces
202b2('dul ba): bstan cing zos na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyuraro//ltung ba med pa ni drod chung bos sbyin par 'dod pa dang /drod che bas ma smin par 'dod pa'o//gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na s+t+wa~M/drug sde
202b3('dul ba): rnams ljongs spyad pa spyod cing ri brags kyi grong gzhan zhig gi gtsug lag khang zhig tu phyin nas/de'i dge slong dag nyin par spyod pa'i phyir dong ste/gtsug lag khang de stong par lus
202b4('dul ba): pa dang /drug sde po rnams dga' bo dang bsnyen dga' bo gtsug lag khang stong pa mtshams ma bcad pa 'dir bdag cag rnams kyis 'dir gnas na ji ltar gnas par bya//mtshams
202b5('dul ba): gcad kyis tshur shog ces smras nas/de ngag gis legs kyis de bzhin du bya'o zhes smras nas/de dag gis mtshams bcad ma thag tu snga na gnas pa'i dge slong dag lhags
202b6('dul ba): pa dang /drug sde rnams kyis de la ngal bso zhig ces byas na/de dag gis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rnams 'di ltar khyed cag ni glo bur du lhags pa'o//ded ni snga nas gnas pas
202b7('dul ba): khyed cag la bdag cag gis ngal bso zhig ces bya ba'i rog so zhes pa dang /drug sde po rnams kyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag gis kyang mtshams bcad do//de dag gri
203a1('dul ba): smras pa/bdag cag gis sngar mchoms bcad do zhes smras nas/dge slong de dag mtshams snga ma btsun nam ngon te phyi ma bcan nam zhes the tsom skyes/
203a2('dul ba): pa dang /de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong glo bur ba rnams gtsug lag khang du zhugs ma thog
203a3('dul ba): tu stong par mthong yang mtshams bcad par mi bya'o//lam gyi ngal ba so ste shin tu brtags nas snga na gnas pa med na gdod mtshams bcad par bya'o//gzhan du na bcad
203a4('dul ba): par mi bya'o//gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na s+t+wa~M/dze ta'i tshul gyi sgor khyim pa gnyis shig/'thab mo byung ste de na dge slong cig 'dug pa de la cig gis dbang btsugs nas
203a5('dul ba): de de la rgyal po'i pho brang du che bzhi byas te/cig shod po chad pas bcad pa dang de la 'phya'o//de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to//bcom
203a6('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag khyim pa de 'phya ba ni yus kyis/de bas na dge slong rnams 'thab mo byed pa'i drung na me 'dug par che bzhi yang mo byed par byol
203a7('dul ba): te song shig/dge slong 'thab mo byed pa'i drung na 'dug cing tshe bzhi byed na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro//gleng gzhi'i sgo bzhi pa'i mdo'i tshig su bcad pa bcu pa'o//
203b1('dul ba): klong gzhi'i sgo bzhi pa rdzogs so////mdor bsdus pa na/byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams dang //yul bskor dang ni yon gyi snod//kun 'dus pa dang steg bu
203b2('dul ba): dang //rnga chen 'khor lo tha ma'o//mdor na/drang srong chen pos gnang bar gsungs pa ni/byang chub sems dpa'i sku gzugs dang //stogs bu dang ni rgyal mtshan dang //ba dan
203b3('dul ba): lcags kyi ka ba'o//gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bdag gis bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i
203b4('dul ba): sku gzugs bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/khyim bdag gnang gis byos shig/bcom ldan 'das de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na
203b5('dul ba): bdag gis byang chub sems dpa'i sku gzugs la rgyal mtshan gyis bskor ro zhes gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/khyim bdag gnang gis bskor cig/
203b6('dul ba): yang de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bdag gis sku gzugs stegs bus bskor ro//zhes gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/khyim bdag gnang
203b7('dul ba): gis stogs bus bskor cig/yang de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bdag gis sku gzugs la lcags kyi ka bas bskor ro//zhes gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das
204a1('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/khyim bdag gnang gis bskor tsog/yang du ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bdag gis lcags kyi ka ba'i stong du ba dan gdags par
204a2('dul ba): bgyi'o zhes gsol ba dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/khyim bdag gnang gis thogs shig/gleng gzhi'i sgo lnga pa'i mdo'i tshigasu bcad pa dang po'o//
204a3('dul ba): mdor na/byang chub sems dpa'i yul skor dang //de bzhin rgyan dang byug pa dang //khyogs dang shing rta ba dan dang //gdugs dang rgyal mtshan snyan gyi rgyan//sangs rgyas
204a4('dul ba): ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so//khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bdag
204a5('dul ba): gis byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyi yul bskor bar brgya ro zhes gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/khyim bdag gnang gis skor cig/byang chub
204a6('dul ba): sems dpa' rgyan med de mi mdzes nas//khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bdag gis byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs la rgyan
204a7('dul ba): dngul lo zhes gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/khyim bdog gnang gis phul la rkang pa'i rgyan dang rna rgyan ma gtogs pa gdu bu la sogs pa yang
204b1('dul ba): la ts+tshag/daste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bdag gos byang chub sems dnga'i gzugs la dru'i rgyan gyis brgyan par bgyi'o zhes gsol ba dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/
204b2('dul ba): pa khyim bdag gnang gis brgyan par byas shig/byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs grong khyer du rkang pas khyer ba dang /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/de ste bcom
204b3('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis gnang na/bdag gis byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs khyogs la grong khyer du bkur bar bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/khyim
204b4('dul ba): bdag gnang gis khyer cig/khyogs las khyer yang mi mdzes par gyur nas/khyi mo bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/bdag gis byung
204b5('dul ba): chub sems dpa'i gzugs shing rta las bkur bar bgyi'o zhes gsel ba dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol pa/khyim bdag gnang gis de bzhin du byos shig/shing
204b6('dul ba): rgyu yang ba dan dang gdugs dag med pas/mi mdzes par gyur nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis de ste/bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/bdag gis shing rta'i steng du
204b7('dul ba): ba dan dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan la sogs pas brgyan par bgyi'o//zhes gsol ba dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/khyim bdag gnang gis brgyan par
205a1('dul ba): byas hUMH/byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs la me tog gis snyun gyi snong ma brgyun nA mo mdzes byar gyur nas khyim bdag mgon med nas dz+nyAn
205a2('dul ba): gyis de ste/bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod na/bdag gis byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyi dbu'i snyan gyi gong du me tog gi rgyan dbul zhes gsol pa dang bac+doMs kyi

205a4('dul ba): rnams dag/rol mo rnams kyang mi dgag cing //rgyan tshogs rnams kyang mi bzhago/sangs rgyas bac+doMs mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dka' ra ba na bzhug so//khyim/
205a5('dul ba): bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bdag gis byang chub sa de'i gzugs kyi zhabs la yon dbu lo zhes gsol pa dang /bac+doMldas kyis bka' stsal pa/khyi
205a6('dul ba): bdag gnang gis phul cig/de'i mchod ston gyi tshe yul sna tshogs na gnas pa'i dge slong dang dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma dang /gzhan yang lta bar 'dod pa'i phyir dal
205a7('dul ba): mo che lhags pa rnams kyis de la yon phul ba mangs pas/rnyed pa de sus bkur ba dge slong rnams kyis mi shes nas/bac+doMs kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong gis bkur bar bya'o zhes
205b1('dul ba): pa dang /dge sbyong gnas brtan dang gnas brtan dag gis khyer pa dang /mi dga' ba skyes nas bac+doMs kyis bka' stsal pa/gnas bca' bar byed pa dang /gzhan yang gzhon pa dang rgan pa rnams kyi///
205b2('dul ba): babur bar bya'o//dge slong gnas brtan dang /gnas brtan dag gis ni bsrung bar byos shig/yon phul ba dang /me tog dang /gos la sogs pa shing rta'i thog tu bzhag pa dang /kha cig ni lhungs bla
205b3('dul ba): ma byin par len pa dag gis thugs thub tu khar nas/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis de ste bac+doMs kyis gnang na/bdag gis shing rta'i steng du phreng ba'i snod bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang /bac+doMs
205b4('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/khyim bdag gnang gis byos shig/dge slong rnams kyis rol mo rnams kyang ma zhi/skye bo rnams kyang so sor ma gyos par/gzugs kyi rgyan rnams spras pa dang /bram ze
205b5('dul ba): dang khyim bdag dad pa dgis 'phags pa dag bdag cag ji ltar dad pa de bzhin du/ma dad pa yang skyes te/kye ma'o khyed kyis rol mo rnams kyang zhi la/skye bo mang po so sor gyes nas gzugs
205b6('dul ba): kyi rgyan rnams dgrol na ci nyes zhes dpyas pa dang /de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bac+doMs la gsol nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dog bram ze dang /khyim bdag rnams 'phya/
205b7('dul ba): bani yus te/de lta bas na rol mo rnams kyang ma zhi/skye bo mang po yang so sor ma gyes par dge slong rnams kyis gzugs kyi rgyan ma btul cig/rtul na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyuraro//gleng
206a1('dul ba): bzhi'i sgo lnga ba'i mdo'i tshig su bcad pa gsum pa'o///mdor na/kun 'dus pa dang dus ston dang //dpyod zla tha chungs ltab bas dang //lok+ta dang ni drA
206a2('dul ba): la/mchod ston chen po tha ma'o//sangs rgyas bac+doMs mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshul mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba ni bzhugs//khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis yul sa
206a3('dul ba): gnas nga'i dge slong dang /dge slong ma dang dag bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma rnams mthong ba dang /yid dgu'i bskyes nas/des bsams pa bac+doMs kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong rnams 'di ltar dus
206a4('dul ba): sbyin pa'i rnam pa lnga ste/lnga gang zhe na/glo bur du 'ongs pa dang /'dong ba rnams la sbyin pa byin pa 'di ni sbyin pa'i dus dang po'o//nad pa dang nad g.yog la sbyin pa byin pa 'di ni sbyin pa'i dus gnyis
206a5('dul ba): 'o//lo nyes shing pongs spel ba la sbyin pa byin pa 'di ni sbyin pa'i dus gsum pa'o//gong su la yang rung ste/mi thog gsar ba dang 'bras bu gsar ba dang /gsar thog de dag de thog ma
206a6('dul ba): tshul khrims dang ldan pa ston dang ldan pa la byin zhing /de'i 'og tu bdag za ba 'di ni sbyin pa'i dus bzhi pa'o//gang sul yang rung ste/rlung ldang ba 'am/yul rmus pa 'am/char 'bab
206a7('dul ba): ba'am/grang ba la sogs pa de lta bu'i rnam pas rlung ldang ba dang /lus chus pa dong cher 'deb pa dang /grang bal zan nam/skye mo'i mthug pa skom la sogs pa de dag phyir byung
206b1('dul ba): ste/dge 'dun la 'dul zhing 'phags pa/'di zos na lus kyang mig sher/chos gos la yang char gyis mi phog ste/bde ba la reg cing gnas par 'gyur ro zhes sbyin pa 'di ni sbyin pa'i dus
206b2('dul ba): lnga pa'o//de ltar na 'di ni yul so so na gnas pa'i dge slong dang /dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma la sogs pa lam gyis ngal ba rnams la de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis
206b3('dul ba): gnang na bdag gis de dag 'dus pa'i zas sbyararo snyam du bsams te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste drung du phyin pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs
206b4('dul ba): gcig tu 'dug/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bac+doMs glo bur du mchis pa/yul so so na gnas pa la sbyin pa byin pa 'di ni
206b5('dul ba): sbyin pa'i dus dang ba'o zhes bya ba nas snga ma ltar bde ba la reg par gnas par bya ba 'di ni dus kyi sbyin pa lnga'o zhes bya ba'i bar du sbyin pa'i dus lngar gsungs na nga 'dir byang chub mda'i mchod
206b6('dul ba): po chen po la yul so so nas mchis pa'i dge slong dang dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen me la sogs pa glo bur du mchis pa las kyis yongasu gdungs pa de rnams la de
206b7('dul ba): ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bdag gis 'dus pa de dag gi zas sbyaro zhes gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/khyim bdag gnang gis sbyor cig/
207a1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/bcom ldan 'das la zla ba gang lnga bcos zhes zhus pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' stsal pa///

207a3('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/khyim bdag gnang gis sbyor cig/yang bcom ldan 'das lo du lags nas dbu bregs shes gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/khyim bdag lo lnga

207a7('dul ba): yang zla ba gang la bac+doMs kyis bla na med pa'i yis mngon du chud ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/khyim bdag dpyid zla tha chungs la'o//de ste boc+doMs kyis
207b1('dul ba): nang na/bcom ldan 'das 'dzam+bu'i grib ma la gzugs bzhugasmra pA lnga mchod ston chen po sbya ro zhes gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/khyim bdag gnang gis sbyor cig/gleng gau hU~M
207b2('dul ba): sgo lnga ba'i mdo'i tshigasu bcad babazhi pa'o///mdor nr-i/rtswa sman dang ni the tshom dang //snga phyi dag tu 'dug pa dang //ci co dag dang lam rnams dang //gaN+DI dung dang rnga rdung ba'o//sang+yas

207b5('dul ba): ba dang /dge slong rnams zan zos pa dang the tsom skyes nas/rtswa stan da khyer te dong nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/stan khyer te ma 'dong bar phung por byos te zhog la/gang gi tshe dus
207b6('dul ba): skyon yongasu rdzogs par gyur pa de'i tshe thams cad 'ori cig/dge slong rnams ston mo'i dus la sde phyir 'dug nas gzhan zan zos te song bar gyur pa dang /gzhan gdod 'ongs pas la las
207b7('dul ba): thob la las ma thob ste brel bar gyur nas khacom ldan 'das kyis go rims ji lta ba bzhin du 'dug shr-Inanye sa dasungaso//dge slong mang po 'dus pa dang ca cor gyur pas dus ma shes
208a1('dul ba): /nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis dus brjod par byas shag ces gsungs pa dang /dadag nyid du dus ma babag/dus la bang gzhes brjod pa dang /bac+doMs kyis bka'
208a2('dul ba): sprusbal pa/graN+DI brdung bar byos shig/de ltar yang gzhan dag la gsal bar ma gyur nas/de la bcom ldan 'das kyis sngar ni gaN+DI chung ngu brdungs la phyis gaN+DI brdungs shig ces
208a3('dul ba): gsung so//de ltar yang gzhan nyid par gnas par song ba rnams kyis ma thos nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis dung kha sdoms te bus li rnga yang brdungs shig ces gsung so//glang gzhi'i
208a4('dul ba): lnga de'i mdo'i tshigasu bcad balnga pa'o///mdor nA/dwer ni rnga yang brdung bar bya//de nas shing rta dbyung ba dang //dngos po byung dang rnyed pa dang //ji ltar tshul bzhin
208a5('dul ba): bsgo bar bya'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshul mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gaN+DI dang dung kha sdoms
208a6('dul ba): pa dang /rnga brdungs sh+log ces bka' stsal na/de dag gis gaN+DI rdung ba'i rjes bzhin brdungs po dang nad pa dang las la gtogs pa rnams lha gnod par gyur nas/bai rjes kyis
208a7('dul ba): ga/'phrul pa/gang gi chend pa rnams zas mnas zin par gyur li/las byeng ba rnams kyang zas zas zin 'do'i chen/gaN+DI dang dru ba sngos pa dang rnga brdzus shig mchod
208b1('dul ba): nga yums san gnas par dge slong dang dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyon dang dran bzhin ma la sogs pa so sor mdzod pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA byung shig dang /
208b2('dul ba): nas rang 'dong ngo zhes gsungs pa dang /mchod ston de'i tshe dge slong rnams kyis rnyed pa grub pa de ji ltar bgo ba mi shes nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ji ltar dran rims
208b3('dul ba): bzhin du mnyam par gos shig/dge slong mang ba 'dus pa de dag ca co byed pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/bcu zhing gcig tu bgo bar bya'o//rgyu zhing gcig tu bya'o//

209b1('dul ba): kyang ji ltar gyur pa smras nas/ro dag cang mi smra bar 'dug/des bsams pa de'i phyir na brjes kyis phyug byos shig par gsungs te/ji nas nga'i nyan thos rnams byams par snyoms dang phan pa'o//

209b3('dul ba): te ci rung gis 'gro'o snyam bsams nas/de song nas phyis de la phyag kyang mi byed na bzod pa byed pa lta ci smos/de nas dus phyi zhig na dge slong rgan pa dge slong gzhan zhig dang lhan cig

209b5('dul ba): ldan pa 'di lta bu'i dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa 'di la ci'i phyir bzod par ma byas/rgan po des 'di ni 'di ltar sdig pa'i sems khro ba can te/ltos shig dang nga yang khyod la phyag

210b1('dul ba): dang /gcad nas des ngan su smras pa'i chog do lta bu sgrom zhod 'du'o/de'i bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyus mo mkhyen pa dang /ma gzugs pa dang mchud pa dang /

214b6('dul ba): mang du bsgoms la/dge slong la yang sems gdug pa skyes pas/de ltar sbrel gdug par skyes te/'tsho ba dang /gsod pa 'i chags shing gzhan gyi srog 'phrog cing
214b7('dul ba): gzhan 'tsha ba dang bral nas 'tsho bar byed/'dinas shi 'phos nas rgyud gang du skye gang du skye bor 'gyur/gang du mngon par skye bar 'gyurabacom ldan 'das kyis

215a7('dul ba): des kyang de'i mgo ba la reg par byas pa dang /de gnyis la skye bo mang pos mthong ba dang /rab tu 'o mtshar skyes nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo mang po de dge ng+ge'i phyir
215b1('dul ba): de lta bu'i tshul chos bshad/de thos pas na srog chags brgya stong du mA rnams kyis ni byang bar chen po rtogs par gyur to//sbrul pa' drug pa de yang bcom ldan 'das la sems
215b2('dul ba): mngon par dad nas/de dus 'das pa dang /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lce'i gnas bzang por skyeso//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams lce bka' stsal pa/de
215b3('dul ba): bas na dge slong rnams 'di dang gzhan dag kyang khro bas kun tu khebs na nyes pa'i dmigasu 'gyur te/de bas na dge slong gis khros pa'i dge slong la ji ltar de'i khros dang
215b4('dul ba): khengs par gnas pa rnam par byang ba de lta de lta bur bzod par gsolo//des kyang sems kyis bzod par byos shig/gang snga dro khros pa la de phyi dro bzod par gsol cig/gang phyi dro
215b5('dul ba): khros pa la nI nub mo'o//gong nub mo khros ldan des phyi de nyin mo bzod par gsol cig ces gsungs nas/bcom ldan 'das gdan las gzhengs te/nang du yang dag 'jog
215b6('dul ba): la 'jog pa'i phyir gtsug lag khang du gsheg so//chos nyid kyis lha'i bu 'am bu mo yang rung /skyes nas ring por ma lon par gang nas shi 'phos/gang du skyes las gang
215b7('dul ba): yin zhes sems pa rnam pa 'di gsum skye ste/sbrul gdug pa la shi 'phos nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lho'i ris bzang por skyes te/bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon du dad pa
216a1('dul ba): rgyu na dzang //dus spyan sa ga ga pa 'o thos 'di sgyum da 'dagan na n+tu/ ldan 'das sbyar 'gro bar rigs kyis/8
216a2('dul ba): 'dir zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la ltar 'gre'o sgyu ma du bsams nas/de nas lha'i bu sngon sbrul gdug pa de dri ma med pa'i rna 'a chu 'byung bzhin du thogs shing /de shAl
216a3('dul ba): dang sen mo dos lus brgyan te/de nyid kyi nub mo lha'i me tog ud pa la dang /pad+mo dang ku mu dA dang /pur+t+ti ri ka dang /man+dA ra ba la sogaso pas phang pa bkang ste/snang ba
216a4('dul ba): chen pos dze ta'i tshal thams cad du snang bar byas nas bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gto te/chos nyin pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug/bcom ldan
216a5('dul ba): 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /ngag la nyal ba dang /khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas de 'dra bar 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang dag par rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos
216a6('dul ba): bstan nas/lha'i bu sngon gyi sbrul gdug pa des thos pa d+ma 'jog chag su lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras
216a7('dul ba): bu mngon du byas//des 'den pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig gsum smras te/btsun pas phan btags pa 'di lta bu ni mas kyang ma bgyis/phas kyang ma bgyis/rgyal
216b1('dul ba): pos kyang ma bgyis/lhas kyang ma bgyis/sdug byas kyang ma bgyis/bdag gi gnyen myang bas kyang ma bgyis/sngon gyi pha mas rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/dge sbyong dang bram zes//
216b2('dul ba): kyang ma bgyis te/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskam/rus pa'i ri ni bsgral/nganA song gi sgo ni bcad/mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo ni
216b3('dul ba): phye nas lha dang ma'i gnasu gzhag/khyod mthus shin tu mi bzad ngan song gi/nyes pa mang du ldan pa'i lam rnams bcad//mtho ris 'gro ba'i lam phye bsod nams mchog/mya
216b4('dul ba): don 'dres pa'i lam ni bdag gis thob//khyod la brten pas nyes pa med pa yi//bdag deng shin tu gtsang ba rnam dag mig/'phags pa'i yid du 'ong ba'i zhi gnas thob/
216b5('dul ba): bdag gis sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal//skye bo lha dang lha min mi yis mchod//skye rgan dang 'chi las rnam par bral//srid pa stong du'ang mthong bar shin tu dka'/
216b6('dul ba): thub khyod dang bdag mthong bar 'bras bur bcas//de nas so mo do ni rab 'phyang bzhin//zhabs gnyis la ni phyag byas dga' ba skyes//dgra thul de la g.ya su bskor nas ni//
216b7('dul ba): lU yi 'jig rten lha yul der song ngo //de nas lha'i bu sngon sbrul gdug pa de tshod pa khe thob pa ltar/chun pa lo legs pa ltar/dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba ltar/
217a1('dul ba): nad pa nang thams ca las par bltar /dz+ha lta bu'i langs spyod da/bcom ldan 'das /nga du 'ongs pa de lta bu'i longs spyad dang /rang gi gnasu mang /
217a2('dul ba): ba dang /dge slong dag srod dang tho rangs la mi nyal bar thub par brtson par spyod pa rnams kyis mthong ba/bcom ldan 'das kyi drung na rgya cher snang ba mthong nas the tshom du gyur te/ba
217a3('dul ba): la bcom ldan 'das ci mdangs mtshan mo bcom ldan 'das la tshangs pa'akhor gyi bdag po ltar mchis sam/lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /'jig rten skyong pa bzhi dag
217a4('dul ba): blta ba'i phyir mchis sam/zhes zhus pa dang /dge slong rnams tshangs pa 'khor gyi bdag po yang ma yin/lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang ma yin/'jog rten skyong ba
217a5('dul ba): bzhi la sogs pa nga la lta ba'i phyir 'das pa ma yin gyi/gang sbrul gadrug pa dge slong gis bzod par byas pa deng la sems mngon du dang nas//dus las 'das pa dang /
217a6('dul ba): cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha'i gnas bzang por skyes nas/de 'di ltar mi dang nga'i drung du 'ongs te ngas de la chos bstan pa dang /bden pa mthong nas rang gi glan su song /de byas na
217a7('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyis 'di ltar bslab par byaste/gang gis brjod par bya ze dang /bzod pa'i skyon brjod par bya ba de wAn+d+ha//dge sbyong dag khyed kyis byi sgrub par bya'o//
217b1('dul ba): kyis de skad ba/ stsal pa dang /dge slong de dag yid mgu nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga'o///gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na/
217b2('dul ba): ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/btsun pa bsnyen par rdzogs par bgyid pa na/tshe dang ldan pa rnams bdag la bsnyen par rdzogs par ma byed cig ces mchi bzhin
217b3('dul ba): du dge slong rnams kyis bsnyen par rdzogs par bgyis na/bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes bgyi 'am/bsnyen par ma rdzogs par zhes bgyi/u pa li bston par rdzogs pa zhes mi
217b4('dul ba): byA ste/bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa rnams kyang 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyuraro//u ba kha~M de ci'i phyi zhe na/bsnyen par rdzogs pa nyid kyang bslab pa 'bul na/bsnyen par mtsho/
217b5('dul ba): zhes bya na/bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa'i tshe lta ci smos//yang bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge tshul pa rnams lo nyi shu
217b6('dul ba): lon nas bsnyen par rdzogs par byos shig ces gsungs nA/dge tshul po gzhan drag bdag gi lo grangs ni ma 'tshal te/de lus beng ni cha ste/de dge slong rnams kyis lo br-ing
217b7('dul ba): ma rtogs pas the tshom skyes te/bsnyen par rdzogs par mi bgyid na/de dag la ji ltar nan tan gyi zhes zhus pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/u pa li de
218a1('dul ba): lta buni mtshan las sa sor rtogs la bsnyen par rdzogs par byos shig/de la the tshom du ma byed cig/bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan las rtogs la

218a3('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/gcer bur ma dbyung bar gos sam gos kyi gdang la lhung bzed dang chos gos kyi snod bzhig la/'di phob cig ces smos la/de ni mtshan kung dang maN+Da
218a4('dul ba): la rtogs te/de ste yod na bsnyen par rdzogs par bya'o//de ste med na bsnyen par rdzogs par mi bya'o//yang zhus pa btsun pa dge slong rnams kyis dge slong la/dge
218a5('dul ba): slong ma'i las kyis bsnyen par bgyis na/bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes bgyi 'am/bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa zhes bgyi/u pa li bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes ni bya ste/bsnyen

218a7('dul ba): par bgyis na/bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes bgyi 'am/bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa zhes bgyi/u pa la bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes bya ste/dge 'dun gnyi ga yang 'das pa dang
218b1('dul ba): bcas par 'gyuraro//rkyang pa'i sgo dang po'i mdo'i tshigasu bcad pa thog ma'o//mdor na/gsang ma glong dang bsdus pa dang //sems skyed pas ni gso sbyin dang //gsad pa gsum yang /

218b3('dul ba): cig 'dron pa mang po dang lhan cig ljongs spyod du dod pa dang /de dag de'i tshe gso sbyin la bab nas/de dag gis sa gsing mi'o phyogs shig mthong nas/de dag gis smras pa//
218b4('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa dag tshur shig/sa gsong ma'i phyogs pha bi la gso sbyin bya'o zhes de dag der gso sbyin byed pa la zhugs pa dang /'gron pa mang po dag 'das nas/
218b5('dul ba): de dag kyang phyi bzhin 'dod pa las rkun pos bcom ste/gtsug lag khong du phyin pa dang /dge slong rnams kyis mthong ste/bde bar 'ongs sam/tshe dang ldan pa dag
218b6('dul ba): bde bar 'ongs sam/ci bde ba re spyad dam zhes smras pa dang /bde bar ga la spyad ci nyes/bdag cag ni rkun po rnams kyis bcomo//de lta bur gyur pa dge slong
218b7('dul ba): rnams la smras pa dang /dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gsing ma la tshigs pa'i phyir gso
219a1('dul ba): smyan ma spyod rtog/bcom ldan 'das rgyas grong dang / kha dugs rgyun rgyas shag nos gsus p+ta dang /de dag las dge slong ma
219a2('dul ba): grong du zhugs/byed ni phyi rol tu 'khod pas de dag mi 'dus par gyur nas gso sbyin ma byas /de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/
219a3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gang gleng na gnas pa rnams ni grong du gos skyon byos shig/de bzhin du dge slong rnams gso sbyin bye ste/gso sbyin lam
