219a5('dul ba): bzhin brgyangs bdag cag gso sbyin byed kyis/de'i bar du skad cig sdod cig ces smras pa/de dag gis 'phags pa rnams ni 'od phyogs na rkun pas 'jigs kyis/
219a6('dul ba): bzhin spyod cig brjo do zhes smras pa dang /der snong grang der sdong grang snyam nas/dge slong rnams bye bzhin du 'drang zhing de dag 'dod pa las nA mI nang so//dge slong rna
219a7('dul ba): kyis de ltar gyur pa bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong rnams gso sbyin gyi tshe/gso sbyin ma byas par ma 'gro shis/
219b1('dul ba): yang na 'gro bzhin du gso sbyin byas shig/dge slong dag gis 'gro bzhin du gso sbyin byed pa la zhugs pa dang /chongs pa rnams kyis 'phags pa bdag cag ni rkun bsdu 'dzi/
219b2('dul ba): pas cang mi smra bar 'gro no/khyod ci'i phyir ca co byed ces smras nas/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis
219b3('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/gso sbyin rgyas par ma byed par mdor byos shig/dge slong rnams kyis mdor byed pa la zhugs pa dang /mngon kyang tshong pa de dag gis dpyas nas//
219b4('dul ba): bcom ljon 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sems bskyed pa tsam gyis byin gyis rlobs shig/de bas na dge slong rnams tshes gos byin gyis brlab pa dang /gos bsngo ba
219b5('dul ba): dang /gso sbyin dang /tshul nas byung ba 'di bzhin ni sems bskyed pa tsam gyis 'grubo//de yang 'di ltar bya ste/sangs rgyas lo dmigs pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag
219b6('dul ba): ste sems bskyod par byos la/gso sbyin byin gyis rlobs shig/de nas tshig tu gdon par bya ste/deng dge 'dun rnams bco lnga'i gso sbyin te/bdag dge slong
219b7('dul ba): ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i yang bco lnga'i gso sbyin te/bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bI tra chad kyi chos rnams kyis yongasu dag go zhes rang gis brjod do//gso sbyin byin
220a1('dul ba): gyis brlabs la/glang gi tshe dge 'dun 'dus pa phrad pa de'i tshe dge 'dun dang lhan cig tu gso sbyin bya'o//de ltar lan gnyis lan gsum du//
220a2('dul ba): brjod de gso sbyin de ltar bya'o//gso sbyin mi bya ba ni ma yin no//ma byas na ni 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyuraro//gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/dge slong dag
220a3('dul ba): cig ljongs spyod pa spyod pa na/rkun pos zin nas de dag gis kye bas mi rlag tu 'khod de/ci byed kyis mgo reg 'di dag bsado zhes smras pa dang /dge slong dag gis
220a4('dul ba): smras pa/bdag cag ni bsad par chad pa lta snyam nas/de dag gis rkun po la/kye ci'i phyir nged cag bsad ces smras pa dang /rkun pos smras pa khyed la rgyal po
220a5('dul ba): dang phyug po dang /tshong dpon dang /ded dang nu rab tu dad pas khyed kyis de dag la smras pa dang /de dag gis nged la gnod pa byed zhes smras pa dang /de na dge slong
220a6('dul ba): gzhonu gcig cig brdzun du smras pa las byung ba'i nyes pa ltung ba byung ste/des tshe dang ldan pa rnams bdag gi ltung ba byung ba bshags pa de'i bar du bsdad par ci gnang zhe
220a7('dul ba): smras pa dang /de dag gis de ltar na gnas 'di nyid du shogs shig ces smos pa dang /des dge slong gi'i dun du 'chags pa la zhugs te/dgongs shing tshe dang
220b1('dul ba): ldan pa rnams bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba shes bzhin gyi rgyun sbas pa las byung ba'i ltung ba'i nyes pa mchis te/bdag gis tshe dang ldan pa'i mdun du bshag so//mtho lo//mi
220b2('dul ba): 'tshe'o//bshags shing thol na bdag la 'dre bar 'gyur gyi/ma bshags mthol na ni ma yino//des smras pa nyes par mthong ngo //mthong ngo //phyin chad sdom par ram
220b3('dul ba): 'cha' 'am/dam 'cha'o//de ltar lan gnyis lan gsum du smras pa dang /rkun po de dag thams cad kyis thos pa dang /de dag gis smras pa/'phags pa khyed
220b4('dul ba): rnams rgyun mi smra 'am/bzhin bzangs mi smra'o zhes smras pa dang /de dag mngon du dad nas/'phags pa rnams de ltar nu deng la su la yang mi smra shig ces smras pa dang /
220b5('dul ba): nanind med cig su la yang mi smra'o zhes smras te dong nas/de dag gtsug lag khang du lhags pa dang /the tshome skyes nas/de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom
220b6('dul ba): ldan 'das la gsol nus/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong rnams nags tshal gyi dbang po rkun po'i drung du bshags pa yin gyis/de la the tshom du ma
220b7('dul ba): byed cig/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/dge slong gzhan zhig ljongs spyad pa spyod pa la/rkun pos zin nas de dag gis bsams rlag tu khod de ci byed kyis/
221a1('dul ba): mgo reg 'di 'di dag bas do zhes smras pa dang /dge slong dag gis bsams pa bdag cag ni bsad par chad pa lta snyam nas/de dag gis rkun po la/
221a2('dul ba): kye ci'i phyir nged bsad ces smras pa dang /rkun pos smras pa/khyed la rgyal po dang phyug po dang /tshong dpon dang /ded dpon rnams mngon par dad pas na/khyed kyis de la smras
221a3('dul ba): pa|de dag gis nged la don med par byed do zhes smras pa dang /dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/thong shig dang su la yang mi smra'o//de dag gis de ste khyed bco lnga pa'i dus na
221a4('dul ba): gcig tu 'dus shing 'don pa de/nged cag la rgyas par smra bar dam 'cha' na gtang ngo zhes smras pa dang /de na dge slong cig gzhung kha ton du lobs pas de bsad kyi 'jigs
221a5('dul ba): pas skrag pas so sor thar bu myur du gton pa dang /de dag mngon par dad nas/'phags pa khyed kyis de thams cad yang dag par bzung ste/srung ngam zhes smras pa dang /
221a6('dul ba): de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa 'di ni ston pa'i bka' yin na/ci'i phyir yang dag par 'dzin cing mi srung zhes smras pa dang /de dag gis 'phags pa rnams legs kyis bzhud la
221a7('dul ba): su la yang ma gsung shig/ces smras pa dang /nad med cig mi smra'o zhes smras te dong bas/de dag gi tsug lag khang du phyin pa dang /de dag the tsom skyes te/de ltar gyur/
221b1('dul ba): pa dge sbyong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong rnams nags tshal gyi dbang po rkun po'i drung du khyA t+ton+da blugs pa ni la
221b2('dul ba): bar blugs pa yin gyis/de la the tshom du ma byed cig/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na/dge slong dag cig yul be'u zhes bya ba nas/ljongs spyod pa spyod cing drang ba dang /rkun
221b3('dul ba): pos zin pas/de dag gis kyi bsam rlag tu 'khod de ni byed kyis mgo reg 'di dag bas do zhes smras pa dang /de la rkun po gcig dge slong gi rgyus shes pas des de dag mthong ba
221b4('dul ba): dang snying rje skyes nas/de de dag thar par bya ba ni nus kyis/snying rje ba'i phyir/kye 'di dag bas de ci rung gis/rna ma rda sprul bcings te/rjes 'phrogs la dong dang /de nyid
221b5('dul ba): rang bkres shing nyom chung bas gdungs te/srog dang bral grang zhes smras pa dang /de'i nang nas cig gis smras pa/kye 'do de skad smra na/ji ltar bya zhes smras pa dang /kha cig
221b6('dul ba): gis smras pa/de ltar bya ba ni legaso zhes nas/de dag gis de la phrogs nas rtswa ma rngas pa la bcings te dong ngo //yul be'u zhes bya ba'i rgyal po 'char dpung gi tshogs yan
221b7('dul ba): lag bzhi pa dang /ri dogs bshor ba'i phyir dong ba dang /de dag gis de dag rgyang ring po nas mthong nas/des blon po la kye snang ba pho bi ri dgas ma yin nam zhes dris pa dang /
222a1('dul ba): des ldu ma 'tshalu ts+tsha nas smras pa dang /rgyal po dang nyo bar spyong nas ma yin par mthang nas/des kyi mu stegs can gcer bu pa yin nam ci zhes smras pa
222a2('dul ba): dang /de dag las cig blos lha de bzhin zhes smras pa dang /de dag las dge sbyong gi rgyus shes pa zhig gis smras pa/lha de ni mu stegs gcer bu pa ma lags kyi/lha
222a3('dul ba): shAkya'i dge slong ngo //ji ltar shes/lU de khyer logs cig ni gnag/gas pa ni dka/ro zhes smras pa dang /de nas rgyal pos de la dris pa/'phags pa khyed
222a4('dul ba): phyir 'di ltar 'dug/lha bdag cag rkun pos bco mo//'phags pa 'o na ci'i phyir de ltar 'dug/lho 'di ltar bcingaso//'phags pa 'di 'dra bar bcings pa ci'i phyir
222a5('dul ba): bcadade mi 'dod/lha bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag gi bslab par bcas pa sa bon gyi tshogs dang /srog chags kyi glong ba shig gam/bshig tu bcug na ltung
222a6('dul ba): ba'o zhes bya ba'i bsgrub pa'i bcing bas bcing so zhes smras pa dang /rgyal po dang cing mngon par dga' nas/des de dag dkrol te/re re la yang chos gos gsum ga ma
222a7('dul ba): bskon no//de dag gtsug lag khang du phyin pa dang /bdag cag gis rgyal ze'i mdun du de ltar ltung ba smras zhes te the tshom skyes pa dang /des de ltar gyur pa dge slong
222b1('dul ba): rnams la rgyas par smras nas dge sbyong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rgyal po 'di ni rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba
222b2('dul ba): 'jig rten po thams cad kyis gtso bo bas na/gang smras pa de ni legs par smras pa yin gyis/de la the tshom du ma byed cig/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/sangs rgyas
222b3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/btsun pa nongs pa dang bcas pas/nongs pa dang bcas pa'i mdun na nongs pa bashragasu rung ngam/u pa la'i mi
222b4('dul ba): rung ngo //de ltar na dngos po mi mthun na ni rung ngo //gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/dge slong cig la dge 'dun gyi lhag mo'i nyes pa byung nas de 'gyod pa skyes pa dang /de skya bo
222b5('dul ba): 'phang bseng por gyur la rid cing nyam chung ste/rmya ba la lus ma rtas par gyur nas/de la dge slong dag gis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa khyod ci'i phyir skye ba po seng bsang por byor
222b6('dul ba): la rid cing nyam chung la rmya ste/lus ma rnaMs par gyur pa de'i nang smros shig ces smras pa dang gang de cang mi smra nas/rnam de dang mdza' ba'i dge slong gi mthong ste/dris pa dang
222b7('dul ba): des de la rgyas par smras pa dang /de nas tshe dang ldan pa de ltar dge slong rnams la brjod kyis shogs shig ces smraso//de ltar brjod na bdag nyid mchi'o zhes smras pa dang /des
223a1('dul ba): de ltar na chur shog/yul gzhan du dong la/dor de dag bshags zhes smras pa dang /des kyang khas blangs nas do dang lhan cig tu yul gzhan du song
223a2('dul ba): ba las/de lam phyed du dus 'das pa dang /dge slong des bsams pa/gang gi don gyi phyir bdag 'gro ba de ni dus 'das na da ci'i phyir 'gro/phyir ldog go snyam nas de
223a3('dul ba): phyir log pa dang /de la dge slong dag gis bde bar 'ongs sam/tshe dang ldan pa bde bar 'ongs sam/ci khyed cag bde bar spyad dam zhes smras pa dang /de ngu bar gyur nas
223a4('dul ba): de la dge slong dag gis tshe dang ldan pa ci'i phyir du zhes smras pa dang /gang bdag dang lhan cig song ba'i dge slong de dus 'das pa'i phyiro zhes smras pa dang /de dag gis tshe
223a5('dul ba): dang ldan pa ci'i phyir du/'dus byas thams cad ni chos nyid kyis de bzhi no zhes smras//des de ni nyes pa dang bcas bzhin du dus 'das zhes smras pa dang /dge slong rnams
223a6('dul ba): kyis des dmyal bar ring du gnas par 'gyur bsnun du ba 'di ni rigs zhes smras pa dang /de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bac+doMs
223a7('dul ba): kyis bka' stsol pa/dge slong rnams rigs kyi bu de ni nyes pa de las phyin to//ngas ni bsam pa las nyes pa phyin par gsungs kyi/chad pa'i las kyis ni ma yin/
223b1('dul ba): de lta bas na gang de ltar rang bzhin gyis ngo tsha dang ldan pa zlas gcig gi mdun du shogs shig+sa bar gnang //des ni phya cig pi mdun du shogs shig//de la the tshom du ma byed rtsen
223b2('dul ba): ces gsungs pa dang /'dod tshogs dang bral ba ma yin pa skye bo tha dad pa/mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /'dul ba 'dzin pa dang /mi lci bu 'dzin pa kha cig dang /dge 'dun gyis
223b3('dul ba): gnas brtan dang /grags pa dang /bsod nams chen po kho cig gis ma btags pas/dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i nyes pa byu s+t+wa~M/de dag tshad par spyod pa dang /gnas
223b4('dul ba): dang /bram ze dang /khyim bdag dang gzhan yang rung /nyung ngu thos pa'i dge slong rnams kyis kyang dpyas/kha cig ni mi dga' bar gyur te/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis
223b5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de dag pos phyis mi bya ba shin tu bsams pa brtan te gcig pa'i mdun du shegs shig/'dis
223b6('dul ba): rje tshom du ma byed cig/rkyang pa'i nang nas sro dang po'i mdo'i tshig su bcad pa gnyis pa'o///mdor ni/gzhag pa'i rigs pa bzhag par bya//bdun
223b7('dul ba): yon nas kyang 'gro bar bya//mnyam du ma zin te/bzhin te/gang gis ko ba mi rung ba'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i 'tshal mig ni med
224a1('dul ba): zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugaso//cha dang ldan pa kun dga' bo gtsug lag khang skyong gi ros bab//yul kr-I sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal
224a2('dul ba): ta'i tshal du 'ongs nus/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo gang na ba der song ste/drung du phyin pa dang /rkang pa la phyag 'tshal
224a3('dul ba): nas chos nyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'dug/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos mdo sde la zhugs nas/de las byed nas chung zad tsam zhig rgyas par bshad nas/mdor
224a4('dul ba): 'chad pa la zhugs pa dang /rgyal pos 'phags pa bdag la brel ba med kyis mdor ma bshad cig ces smos//de bzhin du lan gsum du smras pa dang /tshe dang
224a5('dul ba): ldan pa kun dga' bos rgyal po chen po khyed la brel ba med kyang /bdag la brel ba yod do zhes smras pa dang /'phags pa kun dga' ba ci zhig brel zhes smras pa dang
224a6('dul ba): kheng skyong bya dgo so zhes smras pa dang /'phags pa kun dga' bo yang las kyi res mdzad dam/lha bdag ni dge 'dun gyi nang du gtogs pas na las bgyi 'tshal
224a7('dul ba): zhes smras pa dang /rgyal pos 'di dag gis bya ba yono snyam du bsams nas/de bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der sang ste phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
224b1('dul ba): phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bdag ni rgyal po rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba ste/gang bdag gis bgyi ba'i las ni bdag bgyid//gang nang gi
224b2('dul ba): blots+tshin mas bgyi ba'i rigs pa'ang na gyi btsun mas bgyid//gang gzho nus bgyi ba'i rigs pa'ong gzho nuso//gang blon po 'am blon po chen po 'am/dmag dpon nam grong
224b3('dul ba): mi 'am/ljongs pa'ang rung ste/ldongs pa nyid kyi las bgyid//bcom ldan 'das kyang bla na med pa'i chos kyi rgyal po ste/e mra'o bcom ldan 'das brtse ba can gyis
224b4('dul ba): kyang gzhag par 'os pa gzhag la/las kyi ris mi bsko bar ci gnang zhes gsel ba dang /rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis zhus pa bzhin/bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung
224b5('dul ba): pas zhal gyis bzheso//rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis kyang cang mi gsung bas zhal gyis bzhes par rig nas/rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag
224b6('dul ba): 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas song ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal po/kun dga' bo sang la mnyan du yod pa
224b7('dul ba): na gnas shing 'khod pa'i dge slong thams cad 'dun khang du bsdus shog ces gsungs pa dang /btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes nas/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' ga
225a1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la mnyan te mnyan du yod pa na dge slong ji snyed gnas pa de dag thams cad 'dun khang du bsdus nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na
225a2('dul ba): ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mag pas phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la
225a3('dul ba): 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa mnyan du yod pa na dge slong ji snyed gnas shing mchis pa de thams cad mdun khang du 'dus te mchis lags na/de la bcom ldan
225a4('dul ba): 'das kyis da dus la bab par dgongs shig/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dun khang gang na ba der bzhu de byon nas/dge slong gi dge 'dun gung na gdan bting ba la bzhugs
225a5('dul ba): te bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag deng yul kau sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal nga'i drung du 'ongs te/e ma'o bac+doMs
225a6('dul ba): gzhag pa'i rigs pa rnams ni zhog la las kyi res la bka' stsal pa'i mi rigaso zhes zer gyis/khyed cag gis deng phan chad bzhag pa'i rigs pa rnams las la ma
225a7('dul ba): bsko bar zhog zhig bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhag pa'i rigs pa rnams las lam bsko shig ces gsungs pa dang /dge slong dag gis gang gzhag pa'i rigs pa mi
225b1('dul ba): nus/bcom ldan 'das sa / sgyur du/ma sngo dzin pa dang /dul ba lan pa dang /ma lta bu 'dzin pa dang /mang po la chad pa dang /dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan
225b2('dul ba): dag ni gzhag par rigs pa'o//de la mdo sde 'dzin pa ni de nyid las//de bzhin du 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang /ma lta bu 'dzin pa dang /mang po la 'chad bya dang /dge 'dun gyi
225b3('dul ba): gnas brtan drug kyang dri nyid las yin no//bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /'dul ba 'dzin pa dang /mu lta bu 'dzin pa de nyid las yi no zhes gsungs pa dang /
225b4('dul ba): drug sde dag gis mdo sde'i le'u gcig gnyis blags nas nged cag mdo sde 'dzin pa yin pas na/nged cag la las kyi ris mA dbab shig ces smras pa dang /de ltar gyur pa
225b5('dul ba): dge slong drug gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gang mdo sde thams cad 'dzin pa de ni mdo sde 'dzin pa ste/de nI las la
225b6('dul ba): ma /shig/de bzhin du yesna pham pa gcig gum gnyis lhogs pa dag gis de kyang 'dul ba 'dzin pa'o//de bzhin du rab tu byed pa gnyis blugs pas kyang nga ni ma ltaru
225b7('dul ba): 'dzin pa yin gyisaH/las kyi res la ma sgo shig ces smras pa dang /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis
226a1('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/gang 'dul ba thams cad 'dzin pa dang /ma lta bu thams cad 'dzin pa las la ma bsgo shig/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste//
226a2('dul ba): de'i tshe na yul klo sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal ri brags kyi grong dag cig log nas/dmag ru gcig btang ba dang /de dag gis slar bcom btags nas lhag so//de
226a3('dul ba): bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du btang yang slar btags bcom nas lhag so//blon po dag gis gsol pa/lha ri brags kyi grong dag ni mthu ni cher gyur/lha'i mthu
226a4('dul ba): nI 'gribs na/de la lha nyid gshegs na ni ri brags kyi grong de dag kyang gdod khrugs par 'gyur gyi/gzhan gyis ni mi nuso zhes smras pa dang /rgyal pos nga'i yul na
226a5('dul ba): ji snyed mtshon cha'i mthus 'tsho ba de dag thams cad ma 'khod par sheg shig ces dril chen po sgragaso//de nas rgyal po mthu mang po dang lhan cig tu grong brdal der lhags nA
226a6('dul ba): thams cad bskor te 'khod do//'on kyang de dag nags tshal stug po la brten nas me phebs pa dang /blon po sa lha khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin de bsod nams 'ab
226a7('dul ba): tu rgyas shing lha rnams kyis yongasu zin pas ni 'dir mchis na gdon mi 'tshal bar ri brags kyi grong phebs par 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang /de nas rgyal pos khyim bdag//
226b1('dul ba): mgron mod zas sbyin la bsti bstang tshor byas nas/khyim bdag khyod kyi ngo lta bar 'dod do zhes yi ger spring ngo //de yi ge de thos ma thag tu rims bzhin du song ste/ri brags
226b2('dul ba): kyi grong rdal der phyin to//'on kyang grong rdal de ma 'phebyas nas/khyim bdag mngon med zas sbyin der ring du thogs par gyur nas/dge slong rnams ma mthong ba'i phyir skya'u
226b3('dul ba): bseng bseng po rid cing lus ma rtas par gyur nas/rgyal pos mthong ste dris pa/khyim bdag khyod bu dag dran nam zhes smras pa dang /des lha bdag bu la dran bdug legs
226b4('dul ba): kyis/'phags pa rnams blta bar 'tshal ba'i sla du'o zhes smras pa dang /rgyal pos blon po dag la ngas bka' stsal pa skad du ma zer bar tsi nas 'phags pa rnams 'dir byon
226b5('dul ba): pA'i thabasu sbyor cig ces yi ge spring ba dang /blon po dag gis yi ge blugs nas gros byed pa la zhugs te/kye de la tha.a ji ltar bya zhes smras pa dang /blon po rgan po gzhan
226b6('dul ba): zhig gis de lta blas de'i thabs shig bdag gis sbyar la/dag par bya'o zhes smras nas//des dze ta'i sgo na a ra ta tshangs sbyin gyi bskyed mos tshil zhig yod pa rnyings te/mda'
226b7('dul ba): lta bu'i tshal du gyur pa ste bcos legs byas/mchod rten gyi dgor nas bskyed mos tshal der yur ba drang zhes srang bu bres pa dang /de dag nyid la gnod pas na/lha lta zhing
227a1('dul ba): 'dod par 'gyuraro zhes te/de nas de dag gis bskyed mos tshal rnying pa de 'chos pa la zhugs/dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten gyi dbus su srad bu bros nas/
227a2('dul ba): srad bu 'di'i rgyud bzhin du yur ba brko'o zhes smras pa dang /dge slong gtsug lag khang na gnas pa dang /nyan par spyod du dong ba de dag 'dus te blon po'i gan du dong nas/bzhin
227a3('dul ba): bzangs 'di ci zhig rtsom te zhes smras pa dang /'phags pa rnams lhas bdag cag la nga'i pha'i bskyed mos tshal rnying pa chos shig dang /nga de ltar 'ong zhes yi ge mchis pas
227a4('dul ba): na/'di dag bdag cag gis byi bangar bgyidade/der mu drang ba'i yur ba brko'o zhes smras pa dang /ci khyed kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten zhig gam
227a5('dul ba): de ltar ma byed cig ces smras pa dang /'phags pa dag lha'i bka' bzhin ni bdag cag gis mi bgyir mi rung ste/bdag cag la mgo gnyisuM ma mchis kyis/lha'i bka'
227a6('dul ba): bcag tu mi rung zhes smras pa dang /bzhin bzangs nged kyi lha la gsol gyis/de'i bar du sdod cig ces smras pa dang /'phags pa bdag cag gis bsdad kyis gsol
227a7('dul ba): ba mdzad gsol zhes smras pa dang /bzhin bzangs lha 'dug pa der ji srid yod/'phags pa lam ring ngo //bzhin bzangs zhag cig nas bdun gyis slar 'khor tem
227b1('dul ba): sgyur mi 'khor to//de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de ltar na dge slong dag sang+yas rgyas dang /
227b2('dul ba): chos dang dge 'dun gyi phyir zhag bzhi bcur byin gyis brlabs la/mtshams kyi phyi rol tu 'dong bar gnang ngo //dge slong dag gis ji ltar byin gyis brlab pa mi shes nas/
227b3('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/stan rnams gting ste gan DI brdungs la/dris pa'i lan ljon pa'i dge slong cig brkos te/dge 'dun thams cad 'dus nas 'khod pa dang /sngar
227b4('dul ba): dge slong gcig gam gnyis sam gsum yang rung dad par bgyis te/sangs rgyas spyang dang tshis sbyin dang //dge 'dun sde khyed rnams gnas 'di'i mtshams kyi nang du dbyar sna
227b5('dul ba): 'am phyi ma yang rung tshul du zhugs pa las dge 'dun gyi don gyi phyir/zhag bzhi tanur byin gyis brlabs te/mchoms kyi phyi rol tu dong la/khyed dbyar gyi gonas
227b6('dul ba): 'dir te/dbyar 'dir gnas phyir da dam zhes bsnol ston na/de'i 'og tu dge slong cig gis gsam pa dang /las byos shig/gson cig btsun po'i dge 'dun
227b7('dul ba): rnams//sangs rgyas srung dang chos sbyin dang /dge 'dun sde 'di dag mtshams kyi nang gnas 'dir dbyar snga ma 'am/phye ma rung tshul du zhugs pa las/'di dag dge
228a1('dul ba): 'dun gyi don gyi phyir zhag bzhi bcur byin gyis brlabs te/mtshams kyi phyi rol tu 'dong zhing 'di dag dbyar gnas 'di lags te/dbyar 'dir gnas
228a2('dul ba): na de ste dge 'dun rnams kyis bzod cing dus la bas la dge 'dun gyis gnod la/dge 'dun gyis sangs rgyas srung dang chos sbyin dngo//dge 'dun sde dag bzhi bcur skos shing/
228a3('dul ba): sangs rgyas srung dang /chos sbyin dang /dge 'dun sdes dge 'dun gyi don gyi phyir zhag bzhi bcur byin gyis brlabs te/mtshams kyi phyi rol tu dong la/de dag dbyar gnas/
228a4('dul ba): 'di logs te/drangar 'dir gon so//'di ni bsol ba'o//las kyang 'di bzhin du byos shig/gson cig btsun pa dge 'dun rnams/sangs rgyas srung chos sbyin
228a5('dul ba): dang /dge 'dun po 'di dag dge 'dun gyi don gyi phyir zhag bzhi bcur byin gyis brlabs te/mtshams kyi phyi rol du dod zhing 'di dag dbyer gnas 'dir gnas te/tshe dang ldan pa
228a6('dul ba): rnams las/gang la sangs rgyas srung dang chos skyon dang /dge 'dun sde dag gis dge 'dun phyi don gyi phyir zhag bzhi bcur bsgo bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsungs
228a7('dul ba): shig/gang mi bzod pa de dag ni smros shig/dge 'dun gyis sangs rgyas srung dang chos sbyin dang /dge 'dun sde 'di dag gis dge 'dun gyi don gyi phyir zhag bzhi
228b1('dul ba): bcur byin gyis brlabs te/mtshams kyi phyi rol du mchis la de dag dbyar gnas 'di lags te dbyar 'dir gnas par dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang bas na/cang mi gsung ste/
228b2('dul ba): de de bzhin du 'dzin to//gang la dge 'dun gyis zhag bzhi bcur byin gyis brlabs te/mtshams kyi phyi rol du deng shig/de la the tshom du ma byed cig/byin gyis brlangs
228b3('dul ba): da ni 'di bzhin du gyis shig/dge slong gcig gis mdun du thal mo sbyar la 'dug ste tshig 'di skad dgongs shig/tshe dang ldan pa bdag ming 'odi zhes bgro ba mtshams kyi
228b4('dul ba): nA gnas dbyar snga ma 'am/phyi ma yang rung zla ba gsum gnas pa laso//bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi don gyi phyir zhag bzhi bcur byin gyis brlabs te/mchis
228b5('dul ba): kyi phyi rol tu mchis le bdag gi dbyar 'di legs te/dbyar 'dir gnas//de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du smos shog/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang
228b6('dul ba): ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/botsun pa zhag gcig byin gyis brlabs la/mtshams kyi slad rol du mchi bar rung ngam/u pa li rung //de bzhin du zhag gnyis
228b7('dul ba): sam/zhag gsum 'am/zhag bzhi 'am/zhag lnga 'am/zhag drug gam/zhag bdun nam/zhag brgyad dam/zhag dgu 'am/zhag bcu 'am/zhag
229a1('dul ba): nyi shu 'am/sum du'am+b+ha/zhag bzhi bcu'i bar du byon gyis brlabs te/mtshams kyi phyi rol tu 'gro bar //btsun pa zhag ban dudu//
229a2('dul ba): phan chad byin gyis brlab tu rung ngam u pa li mi rung //de ci'i phyir zhe na/u pa yi mtshams kyi nang du ni zhag mang du gnas par bya'i/mtshams kyi phyi rol du ni/
229a3('dul ba): zhag nyung ngu gnas par bya'o//yang gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis zhag gcig tu byin gyis brlab par byas shig ces gsungs na/su'i mdun du
229a4('dul ba): byin gyis brlab par bgyi/u pa li de ni dge slong gcig gi mdun du'o//de bzhin du zhag gnyis sa mo/zhag gsum mam/zhag bzhi 'am/zhag lnga 'am/
229a5('dul ba): zhag drug gi bar du byin gyis rlabs par bya'o//zhag drug phan chad nas zhag bzhi bcu'i bar du ni dge 'dun la gsol te bskos na/dge 'dun nam gang zag gi mdun
229a6('dul ba): du yang rung /ci dga' bar byin gyis rlobs shig/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa las zhus pa/btsun pa lpags pa mi rung ba de'i sha yang mi rung
229a7('dul ba): ba lags sam/u pa li phrogs pa mi rung ba de'i sha yang ma rung //de'i rgyus pa dang rum pa dag kyang ma rung ba'o//rkyang pa'i sgo dang ba'i mdo'i tsheg su bcad pa gsum pa'o//
229b1('dul ba): bam pa so dgu pa//mdor na/gzugs can snying pa mal gos dang //phyi mo dus 'das de bzhin te//bya rog 'ug pa bya rgod dang //de dag bza' ba mi bya'o//sangs rgyas bcos
229b2('dul ba): rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa ni bzhugs pa'i tshe/gang gi tshe rgyal po ma skyes dgra lhasau byin gyis bslus nas/de'i pha chos can chos bzhin du rgyal ba
229b3('dul ba): byed pa 'tsha ba dang phral ba de'i tshe/de'i mal gos dag mthong ba dang /ngu bar gyur nas blon po dag gis/lha rgyal po bgres po ni 'phags pa dag la dgyes na/gzims cha
229b4('dul ba): 'di dag kyang dge 'dun la dbul ba'i rigaso zhes smras pa dang /des mal gos de dag gtsug lag khang du phulo//dge slong dag gis de slob byang du bting ste bzhog/de dus phyir
229b5('dul ba): zhig na rgyal po gtsug lag khang du 'ongs nas/des de mthong ba dang ngu bar gyur to//byon pa dag gis 'phags pa dag khyed la byin pa na 'di mi mthong bar bya ba'i phyir na/sgro khang
229b6('dul ba): du bting ba 'di ni nyes pa'i dmigasu gyur to zhes smras pa dang /de dag cang mi zer brla 'dug/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/bac+doMs
229b7('dul ba): kyis sgo khang du ma btang shig ces bka' stsal nas/yang thag tu bting ba dang /de nyid nyi sa'i 'damig su gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis yang cog tu bting bar ma byed kyi
230a1('dul ba): ces bka' sprul pa dang /gnas khang du bting nas bzhag/ma dad pa dag gis rgyal po'i mal gos ni dge slong dag gis nges pur btsongs te zos pa na
230a2('dul ba): de ste phul ba'i bsod nams mi snang zhes dpyas pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/chos brgyad dam bcu bzhi'i tshe/yang thog tu thing la zhog shig/ma
230a3('dul ba): dad pa dag gis mthong nas lha'i mil stan dog ni dge slong dag gis btsongs nas zos te med do zhes smras pa dang /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la
230a4('dul ba): gsol nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/yon du phul ba'i dngos po 'di ni rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i yin zhes mtha' ma la yi ge bris te zhog shig/
230a5('dul ba): gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/de'i tshe na yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi phyi mo sdug cing yid du 'ong ba zhig dus 'das pa dang /de phyir phyung ste bsregs nas
230a6('dul ba): shi ba'i tshi ga byas te//nang par sngar gos kyang gsher skra yang gsher bzhin du/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
230a7('dul ba): mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug/phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la 'di skad ces
230b1('dul ba): g+haSh+Na DUn tu kAdz+nyAn dz+nyA p+pa sgyu m+b+ha smang ga na gas su so nor bzhin du 'du la 'angs//brtson 'dod drug blam+bA ra stug tsang yod du byung ba nig dus 'das /
230b2('dul ba): / phy-i chung sa bus nas zhes spyong shA sbyin //rgyam po chen ze b+h+ya ma~M bar+b+ha d+hAH
230b3('dul ba): btsun pa rab tu sdug cing yid du mchi ste//btsun pa phyi mo sos par byas/dal gleng mang po 'tshal zhes mchi ba zhig mchis na yang /bdag gis bal glang mang po yang gting /

238a4('dul ba): bdag 'bre ra tri sa dag gis bu ram bza' ba la brten nas/des dgra bcom pa mngon du gyur te/bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin rje su gnang na/bdag cag ni lam gyi ngal
238a5('dul ba): bas gzir te/'jig rten ma dad pa dag ni grong na khod bzhin du za'o zhes mi dga' bar 'gyur gyis/gud du 'dong zhes smras pa dang /kha cig gis yang tshwa dang ldan pa de ltar

239a1('dul ba): lta bas na ngas mu ge byung zhing sdug bsngal rnyed dka' ba'i dus na/ji skad du 'gron du ngos bye de thams cad bdag gir bya bar gyis shig/de dag la

241a7('dul ba): nyung bas btsal kyang ma rnyed nas/yang sman pa'i drung du song nas bzhin bzangs khyod kyis bsgo yang //bo bos 'bru mar yang ma rnyed na ma de lta ga la rnyed/gzhan

244b3('dul ba): chos kyi rdul gyis 'jigs pas na/yang na ni 'dron po de dag gi mdun du dong yang na ni phyi bzhin dong ngo //ji tsam na 'dron pa mang po rnams rkun pos bcom nas/skye bo mnga'

244b5('dul ba): bzhin du 'drangs te dong ba las/gnas der phyin pa dang /de dag gis nor mang po bor ba mthong ste/de nas dga' bo nye dga' bo phyag dar khrod pa rnyed kyis blang zhes smras pa dang /

245a1('dul ba): dag drang srong gi rgyal mtshan 'dzin la/de lta bu'i log par spyod pa dag spyod zhes spyos te/nyes pa der brjod pa dang /de dag gis 'dron pa mang po rnams rkun pos bcom
245a2('dul ba): ste/nged kyis ni ma yin gyi/nged kyi phyag dar khrod kyi gos rnyed zhes smras pa dang /de dag gis phyag dar khrod kyi gos ni ma lagaso zhes smras pa dang /de la lan med nas ci mi smra bar 'dug/

245a5('dul ba): ci bder snoms shig ces smras na/dge slong dag the tshom du gyur nas mi len to//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de ste ci bder khyer cig ces smra na/long la the tshom du ma byed cig/gleng
245a6('dul ba): gzhi ni rgyal po'i khab na ste/dge slong drug sde dag gis bsil ba tshal gyi du khro du dong ba dang /shi ba'i yo byad gdugs dang shing gos dag mang po bor ba de dag gis mthong nas/de'i nang nA/
245a7('dul ba): cig gis dga' bo nye dga' bo phyag dar khrod kyi gos rnyed kyis bkuro zhe smras pa dang /dga' bo legs kyis bku ro zhes smras nas/de dag gis blangs te ngo //dur khrod kyi srungs ma rigs don dag
245b1('dul ba): ngas nas des byasams pa/dur khrod 'di na cung zad kyang med pas na//khwa cig gis ngur brkus par gdon mi za'o snyam pa sams nas/yang 'di snyam du gang gis brkus pa de brtogs pas slar yang
245b2('dul ba): 'ongs par gdon mi zas mngon par gab ste 'du'o snyam du bsams te/de nags stug po'i nang du zhugs nas nyin cig bzhin sdod cing 'dug pa dang /drug sde dag zhag bdun nim brgyad lon te/dga'
245b3('dul ba): ngo nya dga'o bdag cag gis dur khro dum dong nas de ring zhig yon te/cung zad tsam rnyed kyang srid kyis/yang 'dong zhes smras nas de dag dang //ji tsam na de na gos dang gdugs dang /shing dag bor ba de dag
245b4('dul ba): gis blangs par bsams pa dang /rigs ngan nags tshal stug po na 'dug pa des mthong nas brgyug te 'ongs nas/des 'phags pa dag bdag cag phu nu dang /gnyen dang grogs po dag rgyal po'i
245b5('dul ba): bka' bzhin du byen pa yang dur khrod kyi gos 'di'i phyir khyed cig gos ci'i phyir bdag po yod pa'i dur khrod kyi shi ba'i yo byad dag bkur bar bya zhes smras pa dang /de dag gis bzhin bzungs nged cag bri
245b6('dul ba): ni phyag dar khrod pa'i gos blang so//des 'phags po 'di la de dag dur khrod kyi gos yin na rab tu ma legaso zhes smras pa dang /de dag ldan med nas cang mai dzI tre 'du'o//de ltar gyur pa bac+doMs la gsog
245b7('dul ba): pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag rigs ngan 'phya ba ni yus te/de bas na dge slong dag bdag po yod pa'i dur khrod nas phyag der khrod kyi gos ma len cig/dge slong dag dri/

246a4('dul ba): 'dun sbyin rnaMs gus gas//klung shig dgasas b+hU ma hrI/ A rgyas bcom ldan sa du me tshal mdon rnyed pas sbyin ma kun dga' dzin /

246a6('dul ba): ra d+ha //nye dga' bros shing rta'i sdug shi d+hi thAs te la mthorje bo ni mda'i bor nas skyes gang nar ma dga' ba 'dzin bdag cag gi phrog shing dbang phyug ts+tsha byAt+tha'i sgrargyun
246a7('dul ba): bca' ba'i phyir badrugs zhes byas te dong ba las khyim padag gzhan dgagis kyang ning stegs bu byi pa//gzhan nigagis kya de mi gsom pa ste/gal te 'don gad na 'do
246b1('dul ba): bu zhig grub na/bdag gis 'dir khang pa brgyas la bram ze brgya rtswa brgyad ston mo bya'o zhes smras pa las de 'ang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang ldan pas de'i de'ang grub nas des der dam ji ltar bcas pa
246b2('dul ba): cad bsgrubs nas/de log pa'i lha khang du gyur te/lha khang bas kyang byin gyis brlabaso//de nas tshong po 'dron pa mang po dag cig lam der zhugs pa dang /drer gos dang bal dang shing bal dag mang du phu'o//drug sde/
246b3('dul ba): dag slar log pa'i tshe lha khang de rab tu rgyas par mthong nas/de dag gi smos pa/dga' bo nye dga' bo shing rta'i srog shing dbang phyug gos dang bal dang shing bal dag rab tu mang zhing phun sum tshogs pa de
246b4('dul ba): bku mo des ngag gis blang bar brtsams pa dang lha khang pa dag lhags te/de dag gis 'phags pa dag lha khang 'di ni bdag cag ste/'di ni las dang byi dor bdag gis bgyis na/lha'i gos rnams ci

246b6('dul ba): smi so//lha khang po des ku tsa bton po dang /de nas nye dga' bo khros nas de rdog pa cig brgyab nas bsgyel bar byas//de nas de snyoms shing dregs pa rnams gang nas/'phags pa khyed dam gzhan zhi gis byas
246b7('dul ba): bor gyur pa yang bdag cag ni 'di la rten cing 'tsho ba yang 'di la ltos na/ci'i phyir khyed kyis 'phags pa'i chos ma yin pa byed ces smras pa dang /de dag ma spobs te cang mi zer bar 'dug/da ltar gyur pa//
247a1('dul ba): dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/dge slong dag log pa'i lha khang na gnas pa dag 'phya ba ni yus te//de lta/
247a2('dul ba): bas na dge slong gis lha khang bdag po yod pa'i gos la sogs pa blang bar mi bya'o//dge slong dag gi lha khang bdag po yod pa'i gos la sogs pa blangs na/'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur//
247a3('dul ba): log pa'i lha khang pa dad pa gzhan gyis ci bde bar spyod cig ce smras pa dang /dge slong de dag the tshom skyes te ma blangs pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gal te ci bder byas pa
247a4('dul ba): ni blang bar bya ste/de la the tshom du ma byed cig/gle ngo gzhi mnyan du yod pa na ste/bcom ldan 'das kyis nad pa la skul cig ces gsungs pa dang /ji tsam zhig na dge slong zhig na bar gyur/
247a5('dul ba): pa de'i nad g.yog gis/tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun la cung zad cig phul cig ces smras pa dang /des kyang bdag la cung zad tsam yang med mod kyi/chos gos gsum dbulo zhes smras pa dang
247a6('dul ba): de cang mi zer bar 'du'o//des chos gos gsum phul nas/de dag gis btsongs te bgoso//dge slong de phyis sos te langs nas chos gos gsum gyis 'ongs par gyur te de ltar gyur pa
247a7('dul ba): ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag gis dge slong la dge 'dun gyi chos gos gsum ma blang shig/bslangs na 'das pa
247b1('dul ba): dang bcas par 'gyur ro//dge 'dun gyis kyang ma blang shig/de ste blangs na yang ma 'god cig/bgros na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro//rkyang pa'i sgo gnyis kyi mdo'i tshigasu bcad pa gnyis pa'o//mdor na//
247b2('dul ba): gnyi ga la yang gnang ba dang //rnam pa tha dad rje su gnang //sum cha dang yang dge tshul dang //dge slong ma dang dge tshul ma//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ti'i tshal mgon med za sbyin gyi kun//
247b3('dul ba): dga' ra ba na bzhug so//dge slong drug cu zhig ljongs rgyu ba spyod cing ri brags kyi grong zhig tu phyin nas de na khyim bdag dad pa zhig gnas pa des de dag de'i khyim du bshos la spyan dngas nas des dge slong ri zhing
247b4('dul ba): ras yug ri dbu lo ste du bas so//de dag za ba la zhugs pa dang /dge slong ma drug cu zhig kyang ljongs rgyu ba spyod cing ri brags kyi grong der phyin pa dang bsod snyoms slong ba la zhug so//gzhan zhig gis khyim bdag 'di'i
247b5('dul ba): khyim na/dge slong dag bshos gsol gyis der bzhud cig ces smras pa dang /de dag der song ste de dag gis kyang zan zos pa dang /de nas khyim bdag des ras yug drug cu zhig rgan rims kyi mdun du
247b6('dul ba): gzhago//dge slong dag ji lta bur bgo ba mi shes nas/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge 'dun sde gnyis kyis 'thob/
247b7('dul ba): pa yin gyis/dge 'dun sde gnyisu bgos shig/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag gzhan cigs gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs te/des de'i zhal sros te/dge 'dun sde
248a1('dul ba): gas pa shos gsol nas rnyed pa yang myung du rdul te/da slong dag gas pagos pa dang /de sbyong da//dad cag lan chos gos gsum dgos kyis dge tshul pa dag lan stong/
248a2('dul ba): g.yogs dang mthang gisu ji ltar bdag cag dang mthang gosu mnyam par dag zhes bya'o//de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka
248a3('dul ba): sprul pa/dge slong dang dge slong ma ni skal ba mnyam pa 'gas shig/dge tshul mdong dge slob mo dag ni sum cha byin cig/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge tshul pha dag sume chu byin cig ces
248a4('dul ba): stsal ba dang /ji tsam zhig na dge tshul pa gzhan zhig lo nyi shu yang chang zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par 'dod na/de la dge slong gis tshe dang ldan pa lo yang nyi shu cheng na/ci'i phyir bsten rgyu
248a5('dul ba): rdzogs par mi byed ces smras pa dang /des kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis ni bdag cig gi rnyed pa 'di lta bur bcas na stong ga yogs dang mthing gosu mi ldan na/chos gos gsum du
248a6('dul ba): te ji lta bsnyen por rdzogs par bya zhes smras//de lta bur gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / c+doMs kyis bka' stsal gi dge tshul pa bsnyen par rdzogs par 'dir
248a7('dul ba): pa dang /dge slob ma la sum gnyis byin cig/dge tshul dang dge tshul ma gzhani skal ba sur cher zad//rgyarkyang pa'i sgo gnyis kyi mdo'i tshig su bcad pa gsum pa'o////mdor na/ke'us
248b1('dul ba): len drug cu dang //brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum dang //sgra gcan 'dzin dang dpal sbed dang //gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten de bzhin te//gdugs dang bris pa de bzhin sbyar//zan la 'gron du 'gro pa'o//sangs rgyas
248b2('dul ba): ldan 'das ko sa lar ljongs rgyu zhing spyod pa na ri brags kyi grong gzhan zhig tu byon nas/ra brags kyi grong de na khyim bdag cig gnas pas/bcos nyan thos kyi dge 'dun du bcas pas khyim du bshos la
248b3('dul ba): sbyin drang so//dge slong ma drug cu zhig ljongs rgyu ba spyod pa na/ri brags kyi glong der phyin nas/de dag kyang der zin zos pa dang /bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum dang lhan cig tu bshos
248b4('dul ba): gsol nas/khyim bdag des ras yug brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum zhig rgan rims kyi mdun du bzha'o//dge slong dag gis ji ltar bgo ba mi shes nas/dge slong ma dag gis de la gzhan byar ci yod/
248b5('dul ba): sngon yang dge 'dun sde gnyis pa shos gsol ba las bdag cag gis snyed pa'i phyed thob na/da yang bdag cag la snyed pa'i phyed byin cig ces smra so//de lta bur gyur pa dge slong dag gis bac+doMs la
248b6('dul ba): gsol pa dang /bac+doMs kyis bka' stsal pa/gang du dge slong ma mngal/dge slong pha nyung na der rnyed pa dge 'dun gnyi gar bgos shig/gang na dge slong pha mang la/dge slong ma nyung na der mgo/
248b7('dul ba): grangs bzhin du bgos shig/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/khyim bdag cig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dag bshos la spyan drang so//dge slong gi dge 'dun dag
249a1('dul ba): ni dang /bcom ldan 'das ni gtsug lag khang na bzhugs te/bAshos chung mnos su//rnam pa lnga'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gtsug
249a2('dul ba): lag khang na bzhugs shing bshos mnos te gsol lo//lha gang zhe na/lha rnams la chos 'chad par bzhed pa yin/nad pa dag gzigs par bzhed pa yin/mal stan dag gzigs par bzhed
249a3('dul ba): pa yin/nang du yang dag 'jogs la 'jug par bzhed pa yin/nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gnas 'cha' bar bzhed pa yin no//don 'di ni bcom ldan 'das nyan
249a4('dul ba): thos rnams 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gnas 'cha' bar bzhed pa'i phyir/gtsug lag khang na bzhugs shing bshos mnos te/gsol la//khyim bdag der rgan pa dag mngon par dad nas//

249a6('dul ba): ma dag brims so//de'i tshe nA tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan 'dzin bcom ldan 'das kyis bshau sra mnos /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bshos mi nos nas/'ongs pa
249a7('dul ba): dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis sgra gcan 'dzin la dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams bsod pa'i zas kyis tshim par byas sam des rmas pa dang des gsol pa/btsun pa
249b1('dul ba): rgyun rnams ches//sgra gcan 'dzin khyod ci'i phyir ring cing nyams chung zhing de skad zer ba smros shig/nges ni gsu bcad de smras pa//'bru mar gyis ni mthur gyur te//mar gyis kyu
249b2('dul ba): ni mdangs su 'gyur//'bru mar tshigs kyi tshod mas ni//mngangs mchis stobs lta ga la zhig/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sgra gcan 'dzin ci yin pa de smros shig
249b3('dul ba): des de ltar gyur pa bcom ldan 'das la zhib mor gsol to//bcom ldan 'das kyis sgra gcan 'dzin lo//de na gnas brtan su zhig 'dug ces bka' stsal pa/bcom
249b4('dul ba): ldan 'das mkhan po mchis so//sgra can 'dzin la dge slong shA ri'i bus ni 'og ma dge ma brtags pas na dan du zos pa yin na//de lta bu'i byung ba'i phyir bcom ldan
249b5('dul ba): 'das kyis/dge slong dag dge 'dun dag bsdus nas/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du gdan gting ba la bzhugs te/nyan thos rnams la 'dul ba la bslab
249b6('dul ba): pa'i gnas bca' ba'i phyir/dge slong dag dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan dge slong gis mtshungs par spyad pa'i chos ngas bcas ste/dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan dge slong
249b7('dul ba): gis zas 'drim pa'i tshe/snyoms par rims shig ces bsgo shig/des tshod ma snga re re la'ang smras pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis stsal pa/lan tshwa 'am dang por gang

250b3('dul ba): dus bye 'di sum na ci zhig ces dris pa da /'di ni lkugs pa yi sbyin byas pa'i mthu ste/des sbyin de dag ci la byas po zhib m+be dr-I byas na/bram ze'i bu ngas mA ga'o//rgyus
250b4('dul ba): TIdri slad 'ongs nas des bram ze'i bu khyed song la rgyu brag rgyu sno suM sh+log ces smras pa dang /des kyang chu brog 'tshol lags zhes smras pa dang /sus byin mi pa bris
250b5('dul ba): byi//nges pa gi khyi sha can te/des khyed la bye byin nu de khyod kyis sdig par gyur to zhes smras nas/dris de la spyad pa dang /dris zos par skur ba skyegasmo so//dge slong
250b6('dul ba): do mi shes sam/gang ma pa 'chad po'i bram zo de ni de nyid nader mun bram ze'i bu de ni de ltar myi dge slong shA ri'i bu ste/de'i chen meng dus
250b7('dul ba): mas pa par ba slad nas de sa sbyin so//de 'di yang sa sa ma sbed nas 'di ya sgyu rmugs par gyur to//gling gan ni rgyam pa'i khakha na ste/
251a1('dul ba): tshe na rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na khyim bdag me skyes kyi sring mo'i khyo gcer bu pa'i dge bsnyen dpal sbed ces bya ba zhig 'dug ste/khyim bdag
251a2('dul ba): me skyes dad pa des 'di snyam du dpal sred 'di dge 'dun dag la yon 'bul du bskul lo snyam bsams nas/des de la dpal sbed dge 'dun la mchod pa dang /yon phul
251a3('dul ba): cig dang /khyod kyi bsod nams su 'gyur ro zhes smras//dpal sbed kyis smras pa/ngas kyang dge 'dun dag mchod cing yon dbul bar byas/khyod kyis kyang gang po la
251a4('dul ba): sogs te rab tu byung ba'i dge 'dun dag la mchod cing bshos gsol cig/me skyes gyis 'di snyam du bsam pa/de ste khas ma blangs ni dpal spyod kyis dge 'dun la
251a5('dul ba): mchod pa'i bar chad du 'gyur na/sems can thams cad la sbyin pa lta nyes med kyis/gcer bu pa'i dge 'dun dag zan byin te/bdag gi dri dge 'dun la mchod
251a6('dul ba): cing yon dbul ba'i ched du bya'o snyam bsams nas/des zla ni skyon no zhes khas blangs nas/dpal sbed kyis 'di snyam du bdag gis dang por sangs rgyas la sogs te/
251a7('dul ba): dge slong gi dge 'dun dag sngar bshos gsol na ni me skyes kyis phyis zan mi sbyin gyis/glang po la sogs te rab tu byung ba'i dge 'dun dag bshos sngar gsol ba da
251b1('dul ba): ngas phyis zan sbyin no//snyam bsams nas me skyes la 'di skad ces smraso//me skyes khyod kyis dang po zan byin cig dang /ngas kyang phyis dge slong gau'u ta ma dang /nyan thos
251b2('dul ba): kyi dge 'dun dag zan sbyin no//des kyang khas blangs nas/de nas khyim bdag me skyes kyis gang po dag gang ni 'dug pa der phyin nA sau/gang po dang lhan cig rab tu dga'
251b3('dul ba): zhing 'gu ba'i gtam sngo tshogs dag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go//phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/khyim bdag mi skyes kyis gang po la 'di skad ces smras so//gang
251b4('dul ba): po khyod sang bdag gi khyim du gcer bu ba mang po dang /dge 'dun dang lhan cig tu bshos gsol gyis khas long shig/gango bos bsams pa khyim bdag 'di ni gor ma
251b5('dul ba): chag par dge slong go'u ta ma la sun par gyur nas/bdag cag la rab tu dad par gyur te/de ni bdag cag gi rnyed pa rab tu rnyed pa ste/gang po bdag cag gi dge 'dun gyi
251b6('dul ba): rigs la rab tu dad par gyur to snyam nas des khas blangs so//de nas khyim bdag mi skyes de dag spyan drangs nas song ngo //de nas khyim bdag me skyes kyis de'i nub mo rab tu
251b7('dul ba): bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba'i kha zas dag sbyar nas nang par sngar longs te/sngar langs nas stan bting /ril bdag chus bkang ste bzhago nas/gang po dag la sman
252a1('dul ba): rkyen pa dun nas ba/glang nga dus pashams kyis/dus mngon par //dang /de da na pa la skad kyis de'i gan du sa
252a2('dul ba): tusmras pa/'phags pa gang dag sbyong g+ho'u ta mya ni khyim bdag gi khyim du bzhud de/de nang du bo zhu kar sgo'i them pa la zhabs bzhig nas 'dzum pa ston te/da nas nyam
252a3('dul ba): bos kun dga' bo zhes bya ngas snyed g.yogs phyo gus gcig tu gzar/puso mo g.yas pa'i lha nges la gzugs te thul mA sbyar nas/de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
252a4('dul ba): de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyon thos dag ni rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/btsun pa ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis na 'dzum pa mdzad ces zhus pa dang
252a5('dul ba): nges kyang kun dag ra bo de de bzhin no//de de bzhin to/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos dag ni rgyu rkyen med par 'dzum pa
252a6('dul ba): skyon par mi mdzad de/ji lta bur dgengs pa bzhin lung ston te zhes smras nas/de la skye bo mang po dag kyang rab tu dad par gyur gyis/khyod kyis kyang khyim bdag me skye
252a7('dul ba): kyi khyim du 'gro ba'i tshe de ltar bya ba'i rig so//'on kyang skye bo mang po dag rab tu dad par 'gyuraro//des khas blangs so//de nas gang po gcer bu pa mong pos bskur
252b1('dul ba): nas/khyim bdag me smos kyi khyim du ston pa dang /khyim pad/mo smos kyi sgra'i khyim pa lnga rkang pa bzhag ste/gang du 'byung ba dang /de'i nang na sa gcod bu ngan rgyag gis rkang pa la btud do/bcom ldan
252b2('dul ba): 'das skyes bu dam po khyod lta bu rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum par mi mdzad do zhes dris pa dang /chu'i dregs brel gyi 'gram na spre'u po zhig gis spre'u mo zhig mthong nas/de la sems rab tu
252b3('dul ba): te/spre'u mo de la brgol lo snyom nas brgyugs pa dang /greng de shing gi rtse mo nas rdeg cig 'tshong nas dus 'das//de'i tshe ning 'di snyam du sems te/sems can 'di ni 'dod pa'i rgyus sdug
252b4('dul ba): bsngal ba cher gyur to snyam//de skad du kha nas byung ma thag tu khyim bdag me skyes kyis thos nas/des bsams pa/bu zan mo'i bu gang po ni khab 'tshong ba slar khab rdung ba'i khyim du
252b5('dul ba): tsho par sems pa bzhin te/ji nas 'di la rkyal ka zhig bya'o snyam nas/de nas dbyug gu can mang po thams cad bde bar 'dug pa dang /khyim bdag des gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bco' ba
252b6('dul ba): dang /bzla' bas phor pa bka' nas snang du tshod ma blugs to byen//gang po gcig+sa pra li ni phrer pa'i zha' su tshong mu blugs nas steng du 'bros kyis g.yogs te b+hi no//gcer bu pa phul
252b7('dul ba): dag za zhing 'dug pa dang /gang pos nges mos pa ga mchogo par des ni nga la ston par dmigs te/des tshod ma zhim pa dang //kha zas bzang po sbyin par bas mas//snyam nas ji ci mchod ma
253a1('dul ba): brims zin pa dang //des bsams pa de ni dro lnga bas brjod kyis bdag gis bsku lo snyam nas dros bos nas//khyim bdag nga la ni 'bras 'ba'o shig ltos kyis rjod/
253a2('dul ba): mya ni medo zhes smras pa dang /des slar tshigasu bcad de smras po/mi mthong ba ni mthong bar byed//mthong bar bya ba mi mthong ste//dregs bral 'gram gyi spre'u mthong la//phor bu'i nang gi
253a3('dul ba): tshod ma min//gang po yang de'i gdong bltas pa dang /des khor bu'i zhabs tshod ma 'dug po bstan te/glang po khyod kyis chub dwags bral gyi 'grem nA spre'u 'dug pa ni mthong /phor bu'o
253a4('dul ba): nang na tshod mi 'dug pa ma mthong ngo zhes smras pa dang /des bsams pa/'dis bdag skyengs par byas kyis/ci nas kyang 'jogro rten 'di dang pha rol gnyis kar phan par mi 'gyur ba de
253a5('dul ba): ltar sbyin pa'i yon tan brjod do snyam du bsams pa dang /me skyes kyis de skyengs par shes nas sbyin pa'i yon tan brjod pa'i tshe de'i mdun nam 'dug/des zan zos nas sbyin pa'i
253a6('dul ba): yon tan blags pa/sbyin bdag gis ni sbyin pa'i dus/dge sbyong gzhan ni za ba'i dus/lhag ma gzhan la 'ongs pa'i dus/bsod nams mi dge yid ma yin/sgo ba zhig 'dug pa
253a7('dul ba): des sbyin pa'i ston brjod pa la nyan nyan to thos nas khros pa 'di 'dra ba'i sdig can zan zos la srung yang mi nus te/'di 'dra ba'i sbyin pa'i ston lhag la srid kyis/bu zin mo'i bu 'di la
253b1('dul ba): rgyal ka zhig bya'o snyam nas/des 'bras khu bum pa gang sgo drung du po'o//sgo gton gyi ldang byod cas dag zhas pa dgra gtsor bu pa phyir byung ba dang /'bras khu las grod de grad pa sgro gtan la thob nas khrag
253b2('dul ba): byu//de nas spro ba des mthong ste tshig su bcad de smras pa/sgro gtan phyung ba'i dus la bab//'bras bu pho ba'i dus bab pas//mgo bo snang ba'i dus yin gyis//dge dang mi dge'i dus med//de gla pa
253b3('dul ba): khrag zag bzhin du khyim bdag dpal skad gang ni ba der song ste phyin pa dang /dpal sbed mthong nas/btsun pa gang po 'di ni nyes zhes dris pa dang /des smras pa/me skyes kyis 'di 'dra ba'i gnod
253b4('dul ba): pa bya'o//dpal sbed kyis smras pa/khyed ni son por thar gyis sdod tsog dang /ci nas 'di ltar dge sbyong go'u tu ma nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas par kho bo'i khyim nas gson bzhin du phyir mi 'byung
253b5('dul ba): bar byas/mi dgar ma byed cig/dpal snyed kyis/khasems pa/'di'i gre la lan blan gyis spyan drang du 'gro'o//de ste dge sbyong go'u tA ma de thams cad mkhyen pa
253b6('dul ba): inon ni 'gron du bos kyang khas len du mi btub bo//de ste thams cad mkhyen pa mA yin nA ni khas len to snyam du bsams nas/bcom ldan 'das ga lA ba der song
253b7('dul ba): ste phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig tu dga' ba'i gtam sna tshogs byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'du'o//phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas khyim bdag dpal sbed kyis/bac+doMs la 'di skad
254a1('dul ba): 6\u0f7f/ces gsal to//k+ShiM gau'u t+yAm+b+ha/sang bdag gi khyim du dge slong gi dge 'dun dang lhan cig bshos lha gshegs par zhal gyis bzhes sh+log ces
254a2('dul ba): spyan drangs pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/gang gis ngo las bden pa mthong bar 'gyur ba 'di ltar byed do//de ste dras ma blangs na ni bden pa'i bar
254a3('dul ba): tshod dag tu 'gyur te/ji nas khas blang ngo //snyam nas gshegs par zhal gyis bzheso//dpel sred kyis bro sams pa/'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin te/
254a4('dul ba): de ste thams cad mkhyen pa yin na nI 'di ltar khas mi len pa'i rigs na/dze nas 'di thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'gyur bar dgra'i lan glan no snyam nas/ngo
254a5('dul ba): nas nga'i khyim du song ste/de'i khyim gyi sgo khar dong chen po bskos nas nang du shing ka di de'i me mdag dud pa med pas bkang nas/de'i steng du rtswas g.yogs
254a6('dul ba): nas saso bka ba ste bzhag go//dug rnon pos bza' ba dang btung bar sbyar te//de nas maM skyes kyi sring mos dpal sprad la jo bo ci zhig mdzad ces dris pa dang /
254a7('dul ba): des smras pa/dgra gsad par bya'o//jo bo la dgra su mchis/dge sbyong go'u ta ma'o//de ste jo bo khyod kyi dgra bcom ldan 'das yin na/'dza' bo su zhig
254b1('dul ba): ches kyis/dzI b+ho 'dil bu 'phyag smra pa'i chos ma yin pa'o las bya byar mi rigs par sa mad shog ces smyos bu dang /donas dpal snod kyis bsams pa 'od+ma'ang po
254b2('dul ba): skyes kyi gnyen du 'odra ste/dge slong kots+tsha t+yA pa la dad bas na gas shor bar 'gyur sgyum nas/sa po mdzod kyi nang du 'dug ste skye lcag s+ho brgyag sde bzhag go/
254b3('dul ba): po la sogs pa gcer bu pa thams cad bos nas/ngas dgra gsad pas ltar shog shig/dge sbyong go'u ta ma gsad pa'i phyir ska dang chen po brkos nas/nang du seng ldeng
254b4('dul ba): gi me mdag gis bkang ste bzhag/kha zas dang skom gyi nang du drug rnon pos bka //de dag yang rab tu dga' nas myor zhing rings su dong ste/yang thog gi steng du
254b5('dul ba): gas te 'khyo nasang bdug g+sa bde bar 'kho d+mod//dge hU~M ng+ge kroT+Tat+ta ma skye'i dong gi nang du ji ltar tshig pa dang /drug rnon po ste rab tu zhen b+ha dang /yin zin
254b6('dul ba): dusu la ltar 'artsom pa dag la bsgyur//de lta skyed kyis gtan ti bam sbyin las la sbyin 'dun pas dris gsol te/ko'u ta me sh+los kyang sgyur lags
254b7('dul ba): /seM go'u tu ma dus la bab par dag sa shig/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis che dang ldan bkun dani thal thoka phrul pa/kun dga' bo khyod song yi dge slong
255a1('dul ba): dag la 'di skad du dpal sprad kyi khyim du de bzhin gshegs pa ma gshegs par dge slong su'ang sngar ma 'dong shig ces bsgo shig/btsun pa de bzhin
255a2('dul ba): du bgyi'o//zhes nas/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la mnyan te/dge slong dag la tshe dang ldan pa dbye bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal sred kyis khyim du de
255a3('dul ba): bzhin gshegs pa ma gshegs par sngar dge slong su'ang ma 'dod shig ces bka' stsal te zhes bsgo'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus sham thabs banobs ltung
255a4('dul ba): bzed dang /chos gos bsnams te/dge slong mang pos bskor nas dge slong gi 'dun du byas te/dpal skyed kyi khyim gan bar der logasu bshegs so//de nas 'od me'i
255a5('dul ba): tshal nA gnas pa'i lha phrin rnams sdug bsngal zhing yid mi dga' bas gzir te/myur zhing rings par bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /bcom ldan
255a6('dul ba): 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs te snying rje bA'i tshig gis 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das dngul skyed kyi khyim du gshegs par mi rig so zhes gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'dra
255a7('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/lha de ma gnod pa ci zhig yod/bcom ldan 'das dpal sbed ni bcom ldan 'das la ma rung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bsham so zhes gsol pa dang /
255b1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/lha de bzhin gshegs pa ni gnod pa thams cad dang bral na des nga la gnod pa ci zhig byar yod/lha bran gyis gsol pa bcom ldan
255b2('dul ba): 'das bcom ldan 'das des dgrongs pa'i slad du dong chen po'i nang du seng ldang gis me mngag gis bkang ngo zhes smras pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/lha gang 'dod
255b3('dul ba): nags kyi me dang zhe sdang gi me dang gti mug gi me dag kyang ye shes kyi chus btab na zhi bar 'gyur na/me'i nang na tha ma des ci zhig byar yod kyis/mya ngan ma byed par 'dug shig/
255b4('dul ba): lha bran gyis gsol pa/de gcig bu ma lags kyi gzhan dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das dgrongs pa'i slad du bya bar sbar tau/dug rnon po mi bzad pas kha zas deng btung
255b5('dul ba): bi'i nang du sbyar te zhes smras pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/lha dag gi gnyen po ye shes kyis 'dod tshogs kyi dge dang /zhe sdang gi dug dang /gti nug gi/
255b6('dul ba): dug kyang rab tu btang /rab tu bskyugs/rab tu bor na/dug gi nang tha ma des byar ci zhig yod/bdag slar log la bdag gis las la nan tan du byos shig/de nas
255b7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab du byin pa dang /rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i lho dag gis snga ma bzhin du gsol pa dang /lha de dag la bcom ldan 'das kyis lha snga ma
256a1('dul ba): bzhin du ni ste sgyur bkye'o//de nas dngul skyed kyi khang pa'i sbyor byon pa dang /dpal spyod kyi khyim g+hi lhas snga ma bzhin du gsol pa dang /bcom ldan

256a3('dul ba): gi steng du zhabs bzhag go//de tsam ni dong gi kha rtsas g.yogs pa'i steng nas lhung ngo //da tsam ni bcom ldan 'das me'i nang du lhung nas/dus pos kyang 'tshal mchi ma

256b2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'ad sti sa'i snang dag tu zhabs bzhag ste/dpal skyed kyi khyim du byin pa dang /khyim bdag dpal sbed ngo cher che ba'i mig gis dgud de bltas nas/btsun
256b3('dul ba): pa gang po bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul dang chu 'phrul la ltos shig ces smras pa dang /gang po mi dgo' ba'i bzhin du bsgyur nas khyim bdag dge sbyong go'u ta ma la dang ngam
256b4('dul ba): du'i sgyu ma la dad dme zhes smras pa dang dpal srid kyis smras pa/btsun pa gang po de ltar 'di lta dus bsgrub tu chu ni ni khyod kyang thams cad mabyon pa ni sbyi de lta bu byos la ston
256b5('dul ba): tsag de lta bus de dang nga'i mdza' bo dang pu nu dag kyang bsgrur par gyis shig/gang pos bsams pa dgos pa ma grub par gyur te/slar 'gro'o snyam nas//des de 'o smos
256b6('dul ba): lja pa'i stong nas babs te skyengs nas/bcom ldan 'das la mngon du 'byung ma nus te/de nas 'gros dal zhing bags kyis song nas/gdong yangs la bltas te dpal sde
256b7('dul ba): kyi khyim nas byung ste bras te song ngo //de nas khyim bdag dpal sbeng khyim bdag me skyes kyi sring mo gang na ba der song ste byin nas/sgo lcags phye ste bzang mo tshur shog

257a2('dul ba): nas smras pa/sdig pa'i grogs po bslus te bsad na bdog la bgam du ci zhig yod ces smras pa dang /des bzang mo bden por zer te bgam pa ni ma yin gyis bcom
257a3('dul ba): ldan 'das dgrongs par ma nus pas/bcom ldan 'das la mngon du 'byung bar mi nus kyis/nga khrid la song shig ces smras pa dang /des dpal sbed kyi chung ma de dga'
257a4('dul ba): ba skyes nas mgu ba'i yid kyis dpal sbed khrid de/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/

257a7('dul ba): dang bzod do//de bzhini gshegs pa la ni mdza' ba dang /dgrar bye brag mi 'byed/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni

257b4('dul ba): zer na/da yang ci'i phyir na 'di skad du smra/des gsol pa/btsun pa bdag ni mi dge ba'i grogs po la bltas pas gyur pa'i blos log par lta ba gsum du 'gro
257b5('dul ba): ba'i sdig pas de la go zhol te kun la sdug par 'gro ba gnyis kyang bgags nas/bcom ldan 'das la gnod par bya ba'i phyir zhugaso zhes smras pa dang /bcom ldan
257b6('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/khyim bdag de bzhin gshegs pa ni gnod pa thams cad dang bral na/ci'i phyir nga la gnod par 'gyur/btsun pa bdag gis dug rnon
257b7('dul ba): pos zhal zas dang /skyems kyi nang du sbyar gyis/de dag pho la gdod sbyaro zhes smras pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/khyim bdag gang 'dod chags kyi
258a1('dul ba): dug dang /zhe sdang gri dug dang /gti mug gi dug kyang rab tu bskyugs shing bor na dug ngan pa 'di lta bus ci zhig bya bar yod gang sbyar ba de khyer
258a2('dul ba): te shog shig/de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun na gdan bting ba la bzhugs te/bzhugs nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bko' stsal po/
258a3('dul ba): kun dga' bo song la dge slong dge la 'di skad du nam rgan rims su 'byor chog so zhes skad mi byung gi bar dus yang zan ma za zhig par sgro shig/de nas tshe dang ldan pa

258a7('dul ba): gzhon nu dag gi drung du 'ongs pa dang /datsam dge slong rgan rims dag ni drus rnon pos 'gyel gir me chag go/gzhon nu nas yang rgan rims kyi drung du 'ongs nas
258b1('dul ba): yang 'di snyam du sems te/de'i blo yang de lta bur skyes nas/com ldan 'das ni 'dod chags dang zhe slong dang gti mug gi dug sbyangs kyis/nyan thos thams cad ma yin no//

258b7('dul ba): gsum smras te btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis phan bdags pa 'di lta bu ni bang gi la phas kyang ma bgyis/mas kyang ma bgyis sdug pa dang /mdza' ba dang /gnyen
259a1('dul ba): dang 'khor gyis kyang ma bgyis/rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/lhas kyang ma bgyis/snga ma'i pha mes dag gis ma bgyis/dge sbyong dang bram ze dag

259a3('dul ba): sgo ni phye ste/bdag ni lha dang mi'i gnas su gzhag go zhes smras nas yang gsol pa/nyes pa mang ba ma rungs pa//ngan du 'gro ba'i lam rnams te//khyod kyi mthus ni de
259a4('dul ba): ngag bcad//mtho ris 'gro ba'i sgo phye bsnod nams cam/mya ngan 'da' ba'i lam yang bdag gis thob//khyod la rten pas thob pa nyes bral ba'i//bdag gi mig ni

259a6('dul ba): shi rnam par bral//srid pa stong yang rnyed par shin tu dka'//thub pa khyod mthong dang ni 'bras bur ldan//btsun pa bdag ni mngon par rgal te/mngon pa rgal lo///
259a7('dul ba): da ni bdag bcom ldan 'das dang chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun du skyabasu mchi/deng phan chad nam 'tsho'i bar srog dang yang bsngos te skyabasu mchi nas mngon du dad kyis/
259b1('dul ba): bdag la dag bsnyun du zung shog/btsun pa dang phan chad mu skyugs can gan+d+ha bu pa dang /gtsor bu ma dang /gtso bu pa'i nyan pas rnams la ni sgrogacad/bcom ldan
259b2('dul ba): 'das kyi nyan thos dang /dge slong dang dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma la ni sgo dbye'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/khyim bdag dpal skad la chos skye
259b3('dul ba): gtam gyis yang dag par bstan bstabs yang dag par gzung bstod/rab tu dga' bar byas nas/gdan las bzhes te bzhud do//de nas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lan
259b4('dul ba): khang du byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du gdan bting ba la bzhug so//bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag khyim
259b5('dul ba): bdag dpal sbed kyi khyim du de lta bu'o gnod pa dag byung ba de la/der de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen par ma gyur na gor ma chag par dge slong rab tu mang po zhig dug phro
259b6('dul ba): dus 'das par 'gyur/khyim bdag de'ang ngan du spyod pas mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung ngo //de bas na dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi dge slong
259b7('dul ba): mi tshungs par spyod pa'i chos bca'o//dge 'dun kyo gnas brtan dge slong gi rgan rim su 'dug nas/kha zas dag bshams te/'ongs pa dang /sngar chung ngun lan
260a1('dul ba): /rga tsam yang mtha shog+sa/nam rgan rims su 'byor tshogs shos skad ma phyung ba zla sa na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro//gleng g+h+razh-i nIT+Tanyan du
260a2('dul ba): spyod pa na ste/de'i tshe byudag gzhan smrig gis gtsug lag khang chen po zhig 'jig pa la zhugs pa la/des byed tsam brtsigs pa dang dus 'das so//de'i du
260a3('dul ba): gyi drug bur b+hU nas dge sbyong dgagis de'i spun du sto ste/bzhin da'angs khyod kyi ngas gtsu lag khang drug po la zhubs pa dang/de 'ad byed mazin pa da dus
260a4('dul ba): 'angaso//de na ni khyod kyis 'jug bsgrub pa regs zhes smras pa dang /byed du pa chung ste/gtsug lag khang de ni rgyu bstan/ tsam btsogasus nus kyis/ste com
260a5('dul ba): wAn las kyis gnang na ni chen po de ba shig la chung ngungu sgyus twAM bkyi'i zhes skyes pa d+ma/de sgyur gyur ba dge slong gis bcoM m+b+ha ldan 'dres la gsol pa dang /
260a6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de ste tsig mi nus na shig la chung ngur gyis shig/de laM the tsom du ma byed cig//gleng shAzhi ni mnyen du yod pa na ste/khyim
260a7('dul ba): bdas gzhin zhig gis gtsug pa/khang cung ngu zhig cig pa la zhugs pa las/rlung byed tsam zin pa nga //de'i chu' khyim gyi bdag par gyur nas/
260b1('dul ba): de la dge slong dag gis de la bzhin bzangs khyod kyi phas/gtsug lag khang phyed brtsegs nas lus pa de/da khyod kyis 'jug bsgrubs shig ces smras pa dang /de rab tu dad pa
260b2('dul ba): zhig ste/'phags pa dgra bdag ni tsher bgyid par dang na/de ni chung ste bcom ldan 'das kyis rjesu gnang na/snga ma bshig la chen po zhig brtsig go zhes smras pa dang /de
260b3('dul ba): stur gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/baicoM me rdzun 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de ste nus na chung ngu bshig la/cher brtsig tu gnang gis de la
260b4('dul ba): the tsom du ma byed cig/de bzhin du khyim bdag gzhan zhig gi mchod rten chen po zhig brtsig par byasmra pa la phyed tsam zin pa dang /de dus 'das so//de'i du'ang khyim
260b5('dul ba): gyi bdag por gyur nas/de la dge slong dag gis bzhin bzangs khyod kyi phas mchod rten phyed tsam brtsigs shing 'dug na de khyod kyis mjug bsgrubs shig ces smras pa
260b6('dul ba): dang /de'ang ma dad pa zhig ste/'phags pa de che ches pas brtsig mi nus na/de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ni de la bdag gis de slar ze shig la chung ngur bgyi'o//
260b7('dul ba): zhes smras pa dang /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag gtsug lag khang
261a1('dul ba): chen po las chung ngur bskyed du yang rung /tsher yang rung gis mchod rten ni chen po las chung ngur ma bskyung shog/chu ru byas na 'das pA dar bAHsa/
261a2('dul ba): par 'gyur ro//khyim bdag gzhan zhig yang mchod rten chung ngu zhig brtsig pa la zhugs pa las/phyed tsam zen pa dang /de dus 'daso//de'i bu yang khyim gyi
261a3('dul ba): bdag por gyur nas/dge slong dag gis de la bzhin bzangs khyod kyi phas mchod rten brtsig tu zhugs pa las phyed zin pa dang /de'ang dus las 'das na/khyod
261a4('dul ba): kyis mjug bsgrubs shig ces smras pa dang /de'ang rab tu dad po zhig ste/bdag ni cher dad pa lags kyis/de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/bdag gis
261a5('dul ba): cher bskyed par bgyi'o zhes smras pa dang /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de
261a6('dul ba): chung ngu bo shig ste/chen po byed nus na gnang gis byos shig/de lnga the tshom du ma byid cig/mchod rten dang gdugs rnyings shing zhig pa'ang de bzhin no//bcom
261a7('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis chos shig tsos bka' stsal pa dang /gzhan zhig gis gdugs phob nas slar ma bsgrubs kyi bar du dus 'das pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis
261b1('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/rjes ma ma sbyin gyi bar du snga ma dbab par ma byed cig/de bzhin du su gzugs 'jim pa la byas pa dgu rnyings na/dge slong dgra be tsom skyes nas ma byas pa

261b5('dul ba): btsom du ma byed cig/rgung pa'i sgo gnyis kyi mdo'i tshogs bcad pa bzhi pa'o///bam tho zla gcig po/mngonan/gsar bu 'jug par bya ba dang /

261b7('dul ba): bu'i grib man bzhugs pa'i sku gzugs la/dus kyi mchod ston chen po dang bcas pas byos la/grong khyer gyi nang du bkur bar gyis shig ces bka' stsal pa dang /

262b1('dul ba): gzhogs du tshe/bdag gis rlo ma sbyar ro zhes smras pa dang//spyan 'das kyis bkar skya b+ha/sa pa dag do//rAn+ya gnang gos sbyor cig/sa sa rgyas bcom ldan

263a1('dul ba): nam brgyad kyi snga rol nas/dus kyi mchod ston chen po byed ngo zhes/grong khyer dang tshong dum dang /ska dang lam dang lam gyi bzhi mdo dag tu bsgrags
263a2('dul ba): par byos shig/de dag gis dus ston no dus ston no zhes bsgrags pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/zhag dus thob la zhag 'di snyed cig na dus ston
263a3('dul ba): byed do zhes sbron cig/de ltar byas kyang 'jig rten thams cad kyis ma thos nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gro ba la ris la bal glang gi steng du zhon te
263a4('dul ba): tshong dus dang srang dang /lam dang lam gyi bzhi mdo dag tu bsgrags par gyis shig/gang gi nyin mo//bac+doMs kyi dus ston chen po byed pa na/bac+doMs kyis dge slong gnas brtan dang /gan brtan

263b1('dul ba): /dang na des kyang dad do zhes smos shig/de'i 'og tu dge slong cag gis gsol pa dang lus byas shog/san cig btsun pa'i dge 'dun gyi rnams mang 'di zhes bgyi ba

269a1('dul ba): dang de yi ste//de ltar khye'u las bslang mi bya//mgon med zas sbyin de bzhin te//spu yi gri dang 'khor rnams dang //chu dang sdus par gsungs
