269a4('dul ba): lo sman med nas lhung bzed btsongs kyang khyim bdag gis ma nyos nas dus 'das par gyur to//de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang /bcom
269a5('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de lto bas na gnang gis yo byad dang gos chongs shog/bcom ldan 'das kyis yo byad dang /gos tshangs shig ces gsungs pa dang //
269a6('dul ba): dge slong dag gis dkrus nas kha bsgyur te bcangs pa dang /rin chung ngur gyur to//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/ma bkrus kha ma bsgyur/sar pa btags ma
269a7('dul ba): thag tshangs shig/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis/dge slong dag gis yo byad bcu gsum chongs
269b1('dul ba): ces bka' stsal na/ji ltar byin gyis pa sgrub par bgyi/u pA li so sor byin gyis brlab par bya ste/chos gos 'di ni sbyar mar byin gyis brlab par bya ste/bya ba/
269b2('dul ba): zin pa yongs su spyad pa'o//de bzhin du stong pa phyogs dang /mthang gos dang /sham thabs dang /sho mi thabs kyi 'theb dang /stod shagros dang /stong shags kyi 'the bo dang //
269b3('dul ba): gdong phyis dang /lus phyis dang /galan pa'i gos dang /skra zed dang /g.yogs ma dang /gos 'di ni yo byad kyi gosu byin gyis brlabs te/na ba la dgos te/bdag dang
269b4('dul ba): tshangs par spyod pa'i phyir byin gyis brlabs so//yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/tshe dang ldan pa u pa las zhus po/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yo byad bcu gsuM
269b5('dul ba): byin gyis ba rlobs shig chas bka' stsa ba ni/de las lhag pa'i gos rnams ji ltar bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/u ba li de ni slob dpon dang mkhan po dang /
269b6('dul ba): yid btsugs pa rnams la bsngos la bcad la bya ste/de yang 'di ltar bsngo bar bya s+t+waM/dge slong cig gi mdun du 'dug la 'di skad smros shig/dgongs shig tshe dang ldan pa bdag
269b7('dul ba): ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la gos 'di lhag par bsngo ste/bsngo ba'i rig pos ni mkhan po la bsngo ste/mkhan po la yid btsugs pas bcang bar bgyi'o//de bzhin du
270a1('dul ba): lan gnyis gsum du brjod par bya'o//rkang pa'i nang nas sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshogasu pa bcad pa dang po'o////mdor na/bus pa blun
270a2('dul ba): la sogs pa shes//bcu gnyis kyi ni gang zag dang //de bzhin rnam par dbye ba dang //tshul bzhin pa na gsum pa'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod
270a3('dul ba): pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugaso//bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/btsun pa gang zag du'i bslar
270a4('dul ba): bzlog pa mi btsan/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/u pa li bcu gnyis te/bus pa dang blun po dang mi gsal ba dang /mi mkhas pa dang ngo tsha med dang /
270a5('dul ba): khon du 'dzin pa dang /mtshams kyi phyi rol na 'dug pa dang /spangs pa dang /tshig mi brtan pa dang /spyod lam lngas gal ba dang /tshul bzhin du mi gnas pa dang /
270a6('dul ba): bslab pa byin pa'o//yang zhus pa/btsun pa ji tsam gyis na byis pa lta bu nAs/ji tsam gyis na bslab po stsal ba'i bar du lags/u pa li gang log par bsam
270a7('dul ba): pa sems pa dang /log par smra ba smra ba dang /bzlog dka' bo bzlog pa yin na ni/u pa li de ltar na byis par 'gyuraro//btsun pa ci tsam gyis na glen pa lags
270b1('dul ba): medo mi 'dzin pa/'dul ba mi 'dzin pa/ma lta bu mi 'dzin pa ste/'di tsam gyis na u pA li glen pa yin no//btsun pa ji tsam gyis mi gsal ba lags/u pa ma
270b2('dul ba): mdo sde yang 'dzin/'dul ba yang 'dzin/mi lta bu yang 'dzin mod kyi/'on kyang mdo sde dang /'dul ba dang /chos mngon pa'i don mi shes pa ste/'di tsam gyis na
270b3('dul ba): u pA li mi gsal ba yin no//btsun pa ji tsam gyis nu mi mkhas pa lags/u pa li gang mdo sde dang /'dul ba dang /ma lta bu yang 'dzin/de dag gi don kyang shes
270b4('dul ba): med kyi gzhan shes par byed mi nus pa ni/u pa yi mi mkhas pa ste/'di tsam gyis na/u ba lI mi mkhas pa yin no//btsun pa ji tsam gyis na/ngo tsha med pa
270b5('dul ba): lags/u ba li de ni phos pham pa bzhi las gang yang rung nyes pa byung bar gyur pa ste/u pa li den ngo tsha med par gyur pa'o//btsun pa ji tsam gyis na 'khon
270b6('dul ba): du 'dzin pa lags/ud pa li de ni khro ba dang 'thab mo dang /gzhan yang gang dang gang du 'thab pa'i sgor gyur pa ste/ud pa li de tsam gyis nu 'khon du 'dzin pa'o//
270b7('dul ba): badren pa ji tsam gyis na mtshams kyi sprid rol na mchis pa lags/da ni ud ba da sbyong gi mtshams kyi phyi rol na 'dug pasdu/ud pa mi de tsam gyis na mtshams
271a1('dul ba): kyi phyi rol na 'dug pa'o//btsun pa ji tsam gyis na spangs pa lcags/ud pa la de ni dge 'dun gyis gsol pa dang bzhi'i las kyis spangs pa
271a2('dul ba): ste/ud pa li de tsam gyis no spangs par gyur pa zhes bya'o//btsun pa ji tsam gyis na tshig mi brtan par gyur pa lags/u pa li de ni tshig mi brtun par gyur pa
271a3('dul ba): dang /brdzun du smra ba dang /phra ma dang /tshig rtsub po dang /tshig khyal par smra ba'o//u pa li de tsam gyis ni tshig mi brtan par gyur pa'o//btsun pa ji tsam na spyod lam
271a4('dul ba): bral bar gyur pa lags/u pa li de ni dge 'dun gyi nang nas langs nas spong ba'o//u pa li de ltar na spyod lam las 'grel par gyur pa'o//btsun pa ji tsam
271a5('dul ba): gyis na tshul bzhin la mi gnas par gyur pa zhes bgyi/u pa li de ni mi spyod pa ni spyod/dge slong gi bslab pa ni mi slob pa'o//u pa li de tsam gyis na
271a6('dul ba): tshul bzhin la mi gnas par gyur pa zhes bya'o//btsun pa ji tsam gyis na bslob pa stsal bar gyur pA zhes bgyi/u pa li de ni dge slong la dge 'dun gsol ba dang
271a7('dul ba): bzhi'i las kyis nam 'tsho'i bar du brlab pa byin par gyur pa ste/u pa li de lta bu ni bslab pa byin par gyur pa'o//yang gsol pa/btsun pa ji tsam gyi na gang zag
271b1('dul ba): gis nga sgrub pa la btsun pa lag+sas/ma ldan lus ky-i ka' stsal pa/u ba po rnam pa gsum to/tshul bzhin la g+hanas pa dang /tshogs paston pa dgra
271b2('dul ba): lus mi gul ba'o//rlung pa'i sgyogasam pa'i mi rdzogs da N+DI smA /med na/ shAd+d+hi ni byU ga/gang+gA reg garten
271b3('dul ba): gnyis te//bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa dang //khyim pa yin par khas blangs pa'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra
271b4('dul ba): na bzhugaso//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa ud pa lis zhus pa/sa btsun po bcom ldan 'das kyis gang la las bya ba de'i sgor bzlog pa mi btsa
271b5('dul ba): no zhes bka' stsal pa/btsun pa gang zag bcu gnyis so sor bsgo ba'i tshe de dag 'di skad mchi ste/tshe dang ldan pa dag nged cag la ni mo bsgo shig ces mchis na/
271b6('dul ba): ci de dag gi slar ra zlog pa yong mi btsun nam u pA li btsun no//de ni chad pa'i lus me se dgongs te gsu I//btsun pa bsnyen par rdzogs par bgyid pa khyim
271b7('dul ba): lags par khas bla nges na/bsnyen par rdzogs par zhes bgyi 'am/bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa zhes dge u paM li bsnyen par rdzogs zin kyang /khyim pa yin pas khas
272a1('dul ba): smyan//da yang bston par ma rtogs zhes rgyun/skyon par rdzogs pa na largya sgra sgrag tu dgas/rlung pa'i sgo gsum par/
272a2('dul ba): rigs su bcad pa gsum pa /mad ni/rnam bu dag ni mi rung ba//sde pa gangags rkang mi bsgre//dbang phyogs bsgrags par bye ba dang //zhing
272a3('dul ba): gi dngos po dge 'dun gyi'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugas+ho//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
272a4('dul ba): ste mi rung ba rnam po lnga'i ldum ma 'chad cig ces bka' stsal pa dang /drug ste dag gis mi rung ba rnam pa lnga po de dag go tshal bus rkang pa phyogs nas/yum gos
272a5('dul ba): ya'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi bal glang gi drung du song ste/rdzi phyogs su 'i kha pa dang /bral byung dag gis dri tshen+da nas bros pa dang /de dag gis cha dang ldan pa
272a6('dul ba): dag zung shig ces smras pa dang //de dag gis smras pa/bdag cag gis gzung bar mi nuso//bzhin bzangs nged kyis bzung ngam/'phags pa dag zung shig/
272a7('dul ba): nged la ci sbyin/bca' ba'i rin no//des de dag gis mdun du song ste/rdzi mi ldang ba'i phyog su 'dug pa dang /bal glang de dag kyang 'khod do//de dag gis smras pa
272b1('dul ba): 'phags pa dag ci khyed rig pa mkhyen tam/bzhin bzangs nged rig pa mi shes mod kyi/rod kyi bral glang cad shos kyi chu ba bus rkang pa bskus paso//'phags pa dag rgyal po'i
272b2('dul ba): bal glang mchog dag bros par gyur na/khyod kyis rgyal po la gnod pa byas par mi 'gyur ram zhes smras nas/de dag nyes pa ngor ba rjod cing phyas 'dogs te mi snyan par
272b3('dul ba): DUr ro//de ltar gyur par dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag gis bral glang cang shas kyi
272b4('dul ba): tshil gyis rkang byug par ma byed cig/dge slong gis bal glang cang shes kyi tshil gyis rkang pa le/byugs na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro//ji ltar bal glang cang shes
272b5('dul ba): pa bzhin du/rta cang shes dong /seng ge dang /stag dang gzigs la sogs pa rgyas par brjod par bya'o//gleng gzhi ni rgyal po'i khab na ste/de nas rgyal po gzugs can
272b6('dul ba): snying po che dang ldan pa kun dga' bo gang na bar song ste drung du phyin pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/
272b7('dul ba): phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/rgyal po gzugs can snying pos tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so//'phags pa kun dga' bo seng ge'i gdan bshams pa
273a1('dul ba): 'di ci zhig bgyi/ci dang chos bsgrags sam/de'i cho gso sbyin gyi dus la bab ste/des rgyal po chen po dge slong gis mtshungs par bzung ba
273a2('dul ba): las lags kyi//khyim pas mtshungs par bzung ma lagaso zhes smras pa dang /rgyal ngos rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te song ngo //mkhyen bzhin du 'dri ba ni sangs rgyas bcom
273a3('dul ba): ldan 'das te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ci'i phyir rgyal po chen po chos mnyan par song zhes smras pa dang /de ltar gyur pa bcom
273a4('dul ba): ldan 'das la zhib mor gsol ba dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' ba khyod kyis nyeso//de ste rgyal po gzugs can snying po so sor thar pa thos par
273a5('dul ba): gyur na/nges par de sngon pas kyang mngon du dga' bar gyur te/dga' nas dga' ba'i dbang gis bya ba byed du gdon mi za'o//de bas na ngas gnang gis 'di 'dra ba'i skyes/
273a6('dul ba): bu dam pa dad pa de dag la ni thos par gyis shig/gzhan yang rab tu phyag la ma dang dngul la rab tu dad de/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de lta bu dag la 'ang
273a7('dul ba): nges par gyis shig/gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa gro zhin bye ba nyi shu pa zhes bya ba skye'u bseng bseng po skye ma zhing ring la rmya zhing lus nyams chung bar gyur pa dang /bcom ldan 'das
273b1('dul ba): kyis gzigs te/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo ci'i phyir na gro zhin bye ba nyi shu zhes bya ba sgu'u bseng nga seng po skem zhing ring la rgyu zhing nyam chung ba
273b2('dul ba): gyung /des bcom ldan 'das de dang po btsas nas thug pa dba' shig gis lus bskyod pa lagaso zhes gsol pa dang /decom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/kun dga' bo
273b3('dul ba): de ltar na ngas gnang gis gro zhin bye ba nyi shu pa la drug pa lud cig/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gro zhin bya ba nyi shu pa la tshe dang ldan pagro zhin bcom ldan 'das kyis/khyod
273b4('dul ba): ni thug pa 'thung shig par gnang ngo zhes bsgo ba dang /des smras pa/btsun pa kun dga' bo bdag gcig pu la'am/de ste dge 'dun thams cad nges smras pa khyod gcig pu'o//btsun
273b5('dul ba): de kun dga' bo 'dis glengs pa nA/tshangs pa mtshus par spyod pa dag gis kyang 'di skad du gro zhin bye ba nyi shu pa bstan pa la rab tu byung ba/sngon grong khyer tsam pa na lo legs par
273b6('dul ba): gyur pa'i tshe/bal blang bdun gyis drang ba spangs te/rab tu byung nas/dazug pa tsam la yang chagaso zhes zer gyis/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gis phyir dge 'dun
273b7('dul ba): thams cad kyang thug pa gnang na/bdag kyang bzod 'tshal bar bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to//bcom
274a1('dul ba): /ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalnga pa/de ltar gnang gis/gro zhin bya ba nyi shu pa'i phyir dge 'dun thams cad kyang thugs pa 'thung shog/gang gi chu
274a2('dul ba): rgyal po gzugs can snying pe//bcom ldan 'das kyis dge 'dun rnams thug pa 'thung bar gnang ngo zhes thos nas/des dge 'dun las bon bum pa stong gi sa gdab pa'i
274a3('dul ba): zhing dag phul ba dang /dge slong dag gis ma blangs nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge 'dun gyi phyir blang bar bya ste/de la the tshom du mi byed cig/de bsam
274a4('dul ba): zhing las byung ba'i rnams dge 'dun gyis spyad par gyis shig/rkyang ba'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshig su bshad pa bzhi pa'o///mdor no//gding dang bsnyen
274a5('dul ba): par rdzogs par dang //dge tshul phra dang gsor bu dang //snyoms zhugs dang ni mi gnang ba//bslab pa byin pa gnyis pa'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod
274a6('dul ba): pan dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa yis zhus pa/btsun pa dge slong dang khyi/
274a7('dul ba): ba gnyis lhan cig tu gdid pa gcig la mches su rung ngam/u pa li de ni mi rung mod kyi//de lta bu'i rkyen cig byung na gnang ngo //btsun pa dge tshul pa dang /dge slong
274b1('dul ba): gsar bu dang ma ning dang /za ma dang /dge sbyong ma sun phyung ba dang /pha bsad pa dang /ma bsad pa dang /dgra bcom pa bsrung ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis
274b2('dul ba): brablazla phyung ba dang /mu stegs can dang /mu stegs can du song po dag rkun gnas dang /so sor gnas pa dang /mi gnas pa drug la sogs pa dang ga ding ba gcig gi steng na lhan cig tu mchis
274b3('dul ba): bAr rung ngam/u pa lI de ltar na mi rung mod kyi de lta bu'i rkyen gcig byung na/de bzhin du spyan cig gam/khri gcig gAm/khri'u gcig gam/bar btang gcig tu ru dngam+b+ha/
274b4('dul ba): mi rung mod kyi/de lta bu'i rkyen cig byung na rung ngo //btsun pa khyim pa dang /skyegs bu liM stan bting ba'i steng na lhan cig tu mchis par rung ngam/mi rung mod kyi/de lta bu'i
274b5('dul ba): rkyen cig byung na rung ngo //bar btang bdag gding yang mi rung mod kyi/de lta bu'i rkyen cig byung na par tang dag bting bar gyur pa'ang de bzhin no//de bzhin du dge tshul pa dang /
274b6('dul ba): dge slong gisar bu nas/so sor gnas pa'i bar du skye/de bzhin du gnas la/thos pa'i dmigs su ma byung gris bar du lhan cig 'dug na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyuraro//
274b7('dul ba): btsun pa bslab pa stsal ba gnyis shig stan gcig gi steng na lhan cig mchis su rung ngam/u pa l-i de ni mi rung ngo //rgyang ba'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshig su bcang ba lnga
275a1('dul ba): bam po zho gnyis pa/mdor na/mi bslang bu dang khri'u gcig/brel par gyur pa'ang de bzhin to//chung zad brel bar gyur pa dang /
275a2('dul ba): tsA dang shring yang dge 'dun gyi'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i chal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs pa'i tshe/dge slong dag
275a3('dul ba): khri'u'i steng na btso blag gi las byed cing 'dug pa dang /drug sde dag de nyid 'dug cing gnod par byed/de dag grol bzhin du bskyang ba dang /de dag la granod par gyur na/
275a4('dul ba): de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong btso blag gis las byed cing brel ba la
275a5('dul ba): dge slong dag gis mi blang shig/bslangs na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro//gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na/dge slong dag zan zla zhing 'khod po rnams la drug sde dag
275a6('dul ba): gyis rgan rims bzhin du bya'o zhes bslang ba dang /dge slong dag ldang du matub nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ji ltar rgan rims bzhin du 'dun
275a7('dul ba): shig/bcom ldan 'das kyis/ji ltar rgan rims bzhin du 'dug shig ces bka' stsal pa dang /drug sde dag phyis 'ongs nas/dge slong snga ma zas
275b1('dul ba): zhing brel ba dag bskrang bya dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong gis dge slong zad za ning byol ba drug ma blang bar gung du 'dug par byA ste/bsangs na 'das pa/
275b2('dul ba): dang bcas par 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u ba lis zhus pa/btsun pa ji tsam gyis na/dge slong dge zin zla nong bral ba des bgyi/bcom
275b3('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/chung ngu lan tshwa 'am shang tse 'am le phug kyang rung /brims par gyur pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong zan za zhing brel ba la ma
275b4('dul ba): bsdung shig ts+tshas bka' stsal ba dang /drug sde dag rgan rims kyis dang por 'dug nas/zan za zhing ched du brel bar byed pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
275b5('dul ba): dge sbyong dag gis grul mi yin par 'dug pa la zan za zhing brel bar ma byed cig/byas nas 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro//dge slong dag gral rims la mkhas
275b6('dul ba): bar gyis shig/de las gzhan du na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro//dge 'dun gyi btso blag gi bum pa dang /gzhong khung dag/dge slong dag gis blangs nas gtso
275b7('dul ba): drug gi las byed pa dang /drug sde dag gis tshe dang ldan pa dag dede rgan pas nged sngar dbang ngo zhes smras nas/tshen ci dag po ste khyer ba dang dge slong dag brel bar gyur nas/
276a1('dul ba): de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /dge slong dag gis bum pa'am gzhong khung dag brel ba la ma blang bar bya ba
276a2('dul ba): rnams zin nas gdod long shig/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gis bum pa'am gzhong khung dag brel pa la ma blang shig zhes bka' stsal pa/drug sde dag gis
276a3('dul ba): bsams bzhin du snod rnams tshon chung zad tsam gyi brel par byas te bzhag pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/tshon rtsi thams cad snod gcig cig nang du blugs
276a4('dul ba): la dgos na blang bar gyis shig/dge slong gis snod dag gi nang du tshen rtsi chung zad kyis brel par byas te ma bzhag shig/bzhag na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro//gleng
276a5('dul ba): gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste//khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis dze ta'i tshal shing thags kyis bskor ba dang /khyim bdag dag gis bcag cing bcag ci de khyer nas
276a6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ma bkur shig ces sgo shig/de dgra dag gis bsgo ba dang /shing dang rtswa yang bor te dong ngo //de dag chud zos nas/bcom
276a7('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/spyad du mi rung ba dag ni tshang mang du skyol cig/lhag ma dag ni las gsar du byed pa la phul cig/drug sde dag gis las gsar
276b1('dul ba): du byang nga ba'i shing ngag gshegs nas mer bus te btso blag gi las byed pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/las gsar du byar rung shing dag ni ma bud cig/
276b2('dul ba): bus na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro//rkyang ba'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigasu bcad pa drug pa'o////mdor na/mgon med zas sbyin gyi rgyan dang //'dug
276b3('dul ba): ba bslang bar mi bya dang //snod spyad lag na thogs pa dang //lham yang phyi bar bya ba'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i
276b4('dul ba): dze ta'i tshil mgon med zas spyan gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugaso//de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'odas kyis de ste gnang na bdag gisi dze ta'i
276b5('dul ba): tshal byu bral bar basbyin gi sogs sde po dang /brtson las ky-i gyu ba ma dag drug nang sa phul cig nges shing gang po'i ming du byA la~M nI bya'i rgyun gyis brgyan/

277a3('dul ba): du rgyan par gyis shig/rtsig pa'i ni ri mo'i yo byad du byos shig/bsro khang gi rtsig pa dang ka ba dag gi ni las gsar du byos shig/de'i sa'i ni dge 'dun gyi snang mar byos

284b4('dul ba): slong gzhan zhig gis bsod snyoms bslangs nas gnas khang du bzhag ste phyi rol tu song ba dang /de khyim pa zhig gis reg par mthong ste/dge slong de the tsom smyos nas ma zos//de lta

284b6('dul ba): pa'i phyir reg ces zer na byin len byos la zo shig/de ste 'dod pa'i phyir reg zhes zer na de'ang phye mar gos la byin len byos te de la the tsom du ma byed par zo shig/bac+doMs kyis dge

292b6('dul ba): grong du song ngo //dge slong de phu nu bo blta ba'i phyir bgro ba de bgos nas de'i thad du song ngo //des dge 'dun gyi bgo ba'i nang du gang zag gi bgo ba de gzhug nas gtam
292b7('dul ba): 'dzer cing 'khod do//de nas nor te dge 'dun gyi bge ba zhig gyon te song ngo //de nas zhal ta pa de slar 'ongs nas/de na bgo ba chung ngu zhig mthong ste/des tshe dang ldanapa
293a1('dul ba): ci dge 'dun gyis rnyed pa grub bam zhes smras pa dang /des smras pa/dge 'dun gyis rnyed pa cung me do/bgo ba 'di su'i 'di dag ni dge 'dun gyi'o//des/

300a1('dul ba): sor bcug pa dang /de'i phyibazhin du ngo mi shes pa'i dge slong zhig 'ongs te/dge slong de phyi rol tu song ba dang /des de'i lhung bzed dang /
300a2('dul ba): chos gos dag len pa la zhugs pa dang /gzhi na gnas pa'i dge slong gis bsams pa/'di ni gdon mi za bar grogs po zhi go snyams nas/des de ma bgags
300a3('dul ba): nas/des de khyer te bros so//phyis dge slong de slar 'ongs nas/lhung bzed dang chos gos mi snang nas/des smras pa tshe dang ldan pa bdag gi lhung bzed dang chos gos
300a4('dul ba): ngag sus khyer/gzhin gnas pa'i dge slong gis smras pa/khyod kyi grogs pos khyero//des smras pa ngo shes pa ni med kyi nga'i lhung bzed dang chos gos khyod kyis
300a5('dul ba): bor gyis/khyod kyis sbyin pa byin cig/de dang dge slong gzhi na gnas pa dang lhan cig tu cig la gcig rtsod par gyur nas/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis
300a6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/glo bur du 'ongs pa'i dge slong la 'di su zhig ces dris shig/dwe ste dge slong de nga ngo //
300a7('dul ba): sheso zhes zer na dge slong de la de ste khyod kyi lhung bzed dang chos gos sam/ngo'i yang 'di brnya zhes zer na sbyin nam mi sbyin zhes dris shig de ste ma sbyin cig
300b1('dul ba): sa zer nA rin thang bzhin du chod la phob shog/de spu byin cig ces zor ba las khyer na khyur du zad do//gleng gzhi na mnyan du yod pa na ste/dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa gas
300b2('dul ba): zhig/gzhi na 'dug pa'i dge slong zhig gis ngal sor bcug nas/de'i phyi bzhin du ngo mi shes pa'i dge slong zhig 'ongs te/ji tsam na gzhi ni gnas pa'i dge slong de
300b3('dul ba): so shing dor du phyi rol tu song ngo //de nas de'i lhung bzed dang /chos gos dag khyer ba dang /glo bur du 'ongs pa'i dge slong dag gis bsams pa/'di yang sngon khyim 'di na
300b4('dul ba): gnas pa zhig yino snyam nas des kyang cung zad kyang ma smras nas de khyer te bros so//gzhi na gnas pa'i dge slong de slar 'ongs pa dang /lhung bzed dang chos gos mi snang
300b5('dul ba): nas des smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa 'di lhung bzed dang /chos gos sus khyor/des smras pa/gnas khang na 'dug pas khyer//nga'i gnas khang ni gnas pa gang yin khyod kyis lhung
300b6('dul ba): bzed dang tshwas gos khyer kyis sbyin po byin cig de dang de gnyis lhan cig rtsod par gyur nas/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang /bcom
300b7('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bko' sprul po/glo bur du 'ongs pa'i dge slong gis/gzhin gnas pa'i dge slong la dge slong 'di khyod kyi cung zad ci'ang rung slong na sbyin nam mi sbyin
301a1('dul ba): /sa dus sh+log/d+hAsgyu na spyan drug d+hAs ts+tshe n+ya don byung brdzun rngu nan/rAT rgyun cag tu zong ba las lhor+ya nA khyod du chud do//gleng gzhon mnyan du
301a2('dul ba): spyod pa na/ nig sa rgya 'i nAg mes nganan /de ni tshi 'i slo'i sa dge 'ongs te/
301a3('dul ba): ces zer na byin cig nas smras nas sa dang //de'i slob ma zhig gis chas gos khyer d+ha dras so//de la dge slong des blangs pa dang /phan tshun cod par gyur nas/de ltar
301a4('dul ba): gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de ste sgrub ma la byin cig ces zeng na/des khye ban
301a5('dul ba): tshul du zad mdwai kyi/gtan tshigs yod na byin cig/bcom ldan 'das kyis gtan chags yod na byin ces dka' stsal pa dang /gtan tshigs kun gyis shes shing
301a6('dul ba): grogs par spyong ste/zhan gyis thos na sa brkus pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi sa bka' stsal po/gsang ste gtan tshigs smros shig/de 'ang gtan tshigs
301a7('dul ba): 'di 'dra bar shes pa zhig 'ongs na de la byin cig ces sgo shig/dge slong dag cig lam du zhugs nas/klung gi 'gram du byin te/de gru'i nang du zhugs pa dang /
301b1('dul ba): de na dge slong gzhan zhig 'dug pa la gru'i nang du zhugs pas smras pa/bdag gi tshong thur 'o ni chung stsol cig ces smras pa dang /des tshong thur byin pa zhugs pa las
301b2('dul ba): lhung ste/chus khyer ba dang /des smras pa//be bo'i tshang thur khyod kyis bor gyis khyod kyis sbyin pa byin cig/de gnyis rtsod par gyur pa dang /dge slong dag gis btso
301b3('dul ba): ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/khyod kyi lag tu 'ongs som zhes smros la 'ong so zhes zer na/gdod byin cig/de las gzhan
301b4('dul ba): du na ni ring thang bzhin du chod la phob shig/yo byad gzhan dag kyang de bzhin du sbyor cig/ji ltar klung bzhin du ri la 'dzeg pa dang /'ob sau la sogs pa la yang de
301b5('dul ba): bzhin du sbyar te lag tu sbyin te/lag tu 'ongs kyi thong zhes zer te btang ba las stor na ni stor du zad do//gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/gtsug lag khang zhig
301b6('dul ba): na gtsugo log khang skyong gis sgo rab tu ma bsdams nas/rab tu ma brtags pas/rkun po dag gis grags rnyed de brku so//dge slong dag zhig de'i sbyin pa ni gtsug
301b7('dul ba): lag khang skyong la dbab po zhes 'phya'o//de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong
302a1('dul ba): dag bsdam pa ni rnam pa lnga b+h+yo lA glang nanA/rgyu gtan dang /sgro gtan dang /'khor lo dang sgo lcags dang lde mig kyog po dag glo/gal te de tha~Mng
302a2('dul ba): gtsug lag khang na yod la/gtsug lag khang skyong gis bzhi ni bcug la/gcig ma bcug na cha gcig de la bib shig/gsum bcug la gnyis ma bcug na
302a3('dul ba): sum gnyis de la phob shig/gnyis bcu kra la gsum ma bcug na sum tsha de la phob shig/gcig bcug la bzhi ma bcug na bzhi cha de la phob shig/de ste thams
302a4('dul ba): cad ma bcug na ji tsam spyod pa de thams cad de la pob shig de ste bstim pa rnam pa lngas bsdams nu ster ba ni stong du zad do//gtsug lag khang na gtsug lag khang skyong
302a5('dul ba): la sbyin pa ma dbab shig//gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa ni ste/sangs rgyas bcom ldan la sA la tshe dang ldan pa u ba las zhus pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis
302a6('dul ba): dge slong dag gis chos gos khru tshad du gyis shig ces bka' stsal na/btsun pa khru thung la lus ring ni de'ang chos gos khru chad du bgyi 'am/u pa li de ni lus
302a7('dul ba): kyi tshad du gyis shig/gang lus thung la khru ring na ci de'ang lus kyi ched du bgyi'am/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/u ba li lus thung la khru ring na de
302b1('dul ba): yang lus kyi tshad du gyis shig/lus kyang che la khru yang ring na khru tshad du gyis shig/gzhan du na 'das pa dang bcas pa ste/ji ltar bcas pa las lhag pa zhig rnyed na yang de la//
302b2('dul ba): byin gyis mi brlab mod kyis 'on kyang rung ba la byin gyis brlabs te rung bar byas na/slob dpon nam mkhan po 'am/mdza' bo'i yin par bsngos la spyod cig/rkyang pa'i sgo
302b3('dul ba): bzhi 'i mdo'i tshogasu bcad pa dgu pa'o///mdor na/sham thabs rje su gnang ba dang //sham thabs 'theb kyang de bzhin te//stong myags mchod par bya bo dang /na
302b4('dul ba): len ma byas de bzhin te//rdul dang rkyang ba bstan pa brjod//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs//
302b5('dul ba): dge slong dag dpyid kyi dus la bab pos/sham thabs rnams rdul gyis dri mi zhim par gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sham thabs kyi 'theb chongs shig/
302b6('dul ba): sbyar ma yang rdul-i te dri mo zhim byar gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/stod chags chongs shog/de'ang de bzhin du dri mi zhim par gyur nas/bcom ldan
302b7('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/spyod chags kyi 'theb bcang bar bya ste de'ang dus du su khrus shig/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/dge slong rnams chos gos gyon te/
303a1('dul ba): mchod pa'i las drag byed pa na/de dag dri dang phyeng ma/'bru mar dag gis ma rung bar gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gang dri dag gis ma
303a2('dul ba): rung bar gyur pa ni khrus la gyon cig/gang phye mas ma rung por gyur pa ni sbugs la gyon cig/gang 'bru mar gyis ma rung bar gyur pa la ni/sgyum 'dug pa gang yin pasdu
303a3('dul ba): khyus la gyen cig/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa ste/dge slong rnams zin za ba las byin len ma byas par lhung bzed du lhung nas/the tsom skyes te mi zla ba dang /
303a4('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/byin lan+da byas la ling shig/sbyi len byed pa med nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis byuka'i stsal pa/de'i then kor cher long ste 'o la/
303a5('dul ba): du ma byed par zi shig/khu ba'i nang du phyung nAs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal bye/yang thun kor cher 'or la zo shig/gang dge slong dag phongs pa'i cho
303a6('dul ba): gi nang ba de/ma thongs pa'i tshe de ltar myi spyod cig/spyad na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyuraro//dge slong rnams bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /rlung dang char pa dag
303a7('dul ba): babanas/lhung bzed kyi nang du rdulaM song s+t+wa~M/tsam skyes nas mthos/gral na ba po'i tshe yang de bzhin te/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa li pa/dge slong
303b1('dul ba): rnams rdul ni rnam pa 'di lnga ste/rung ba'i rdul dang mi rung ba'i rdul dang /bzhag pa'i rdul dang /ma bzhag pa'i rdul dang /rdul gyi rdul dang lnga'o//gzhan yang rdul rnam pa lnga/
303b2('dul ba): ste/bza' ba'i rdul dang /btung ba'i rdul dang /gos kyi rdul dang /me tog gi rdul dang /'bras bu'i rdul te/mngon par gsal ba med pas na de thams cad kyang rung ba yin
303b3('dul ba): gyis/the tsom du ma byed par zo shig/rkyang pa'i sgo bzhi po'i mdo'i tshig su bcad pa bcu pa'o//rkyang pa'i sgo rnams rdzogaso////bam po zhe bzhi pa//nongs pa
303b4('dul ba): dmigs pa zhes bgyi 'am/mi dmigs pa zhes bgyi/gsungs pa nyes pa dmigs pa zhes bya'o//nongs pa gzugs ma mchis pa zhes bgyi 'am/gzugs mchis
303b5('dul ba): ba zhes bgyi/nyes pa gzugs yod pa zhes bya'o//nongs pa bstan tu mchis pa zhes bgyi 'am/bstan tu ma mchis pa zhes bgyi/gsungs pa nyes pa bstan du med pa
303b6('dul ba): zhes bya'o//nongs pa bar du thogs pa dang bcas pa zhes bgyi 'am/bAr du thogs pa ma mchis pa zhes bgyi/gsungs pa nyes pa bar du thogs pa dang btsas pa zhes
303b7('dul ba): bya'odo/nongs pa zag pa dang bcas pa zhes bgyi 'am/zag pa ma mchis pa zhes bgyi/gsungs pa nyes pa zag pa dang btsas pa zhes bya'o//nongs pa 'dus byas pa zhes
304a1('dul ba): / 'dus ma b+h+yas bya zhes paH/gsung ba ts+tsha ga du ng+yas pa nas d+hA'o// ba jug rten pa nus brgya'am/ rten sa pa zhes 'gyu/gas sa
304a2('dul ba): nyes pa 'jig rten pa zhes bya'o//nongs pa phung por gtogs pa zhes bgyi 'am/ma gtogs pa zhes bgyi/gsungs pa nyes pa phung por gtogs pa zhes bya'o//
304a3('dul ba): nongs pa kham su gtogs po zhes bgyi 'am/kham su mi gtogs pa zhes bgyi/nyes po khamasu gtogs pa zhes bya'o//nongs pa bzung ba zhes bgyi 'am/ma bcung
304a4('dul ba): ba zhes bgyi/gsungs pa nyes pa ma bzung ba zhes bya'o//nongs pa lung bstan pa zhes bgyi'am/lung ma bstan pa zhes bgyi/gsungs pa nyes pa lung bstan pa zhes
304a5('dul ba): kyang bya/smad ma bsten pa zhes kyang bya'o//lung bston pa gang zhe na/glang bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa bcas pa la bsams bzhin du 'da' bar byed pa ni lung
304a6('dul ba): ston pa'o//lung ma bstan pa go'o zhe na/gang bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa decas pa la ma bsams par 'das pa ni yungs bstan pa zhes bya'o//nongs
304a7('dul ba): 'byung ba chen par lung basbyin pa zhes 'gyi'am/babyung ba chen por srung mi bstan par nas kyi//gsungs panyes pa 'byung ba chen por lung bstan pa nas
304b1('dul ba): nongs bu kun tu sbyor ba zhes brgya'am byung ba nas dam+b+ha/gsungs pa ltos pa kun tu sbyor ba zhes rgyu//nangs pa bsgrubs pa zhes brgya'am/ma dasgribs pa zhes byagyi/1
304b2('dul ba): pa bsgrib so pa zhes bya'o//nongs pa nyon mongs pa zhes bgyi'am/nyon ma mongs po zhes 'gyi/gsungs pa nyes pa nyon mongs pa zhes kyang bya/nyon ma mongs pa zhes
304b3('dul ba): kyang bya'o//nyon mongs pa gang zhe na/gang sangs rgyas kyis bslab pa bcas pa la bsams bzhin du 'da' ba 'di ni nyon mongs pa'o//nyon mo mongs pa gang n+den/
304b4('dul ba): ga sangs rgyas kyi sgra bslab pa bcas pa lam bsam par 'da' ba 'di ni nyon ma mongs pa'o//nongs pa la zang zing dang bcas pa zhes dbyi 'am/nongs pa zang zing ma
304b5('dul ba): mchis pa zhos bgyi/gsungs pa nyes pa la zung zing du bcas pa zhes bya'o//nongs pa chags pa la gnas zhes bgyi 'am/'byung ba la gnas pa zhes dgyi/gsum
304b6('dul ba): banyesnapa chags pa la gnas pa zhes bya'o//nongs pa dgra ru bcas po zhes dgyi'am/dbyar ma bcas pa zhes bgyi/gsungs pa dgur bcas pa zhes bya'o//rlos
304b7('dul ba): pa dmigs pa zhes bgyi 'am/mo dmigs pa zhes bgyi/gsungs pa mi dmigs pa zhes bya'o//nongs pa sems zhes bgyi/sems ma lags nas bgyi/
305a1('dul ba): gsungs pa nyes pa sems ma yin pa zhes bya'o//nongs pa rnam par smin pa zhes bgyi 'am/rnam par mi smin pa zhes bgyi/gsungs pa rnam par
305a2('dul ba): smin pa zhes kyang bya/ma smin pa zhes kyang bya'o//smin pa gang zhe na/gang sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa bcas pa las bsams bzhin du 'das pa 'di ni smin pa zhes bya'o//ma
305a3('dul ba): smin pa gang zhe na/gang sangs rgyas kyis bslab pa bcas pa las/ma bsams par 'das pa ni ma smin pa'o//nongs pa las shes bgyi 'am/las ma la gso ba zhes
305a4('dul ba): bgyi/gsungs pa nyes pa la sau shes bya'o//nongs pa nang gi skye mched du gtogs pa zhes bgyi'am/phyi'i skye mched du gtogs pa zhes bgyi/gsungs pa phyi'i
305a5('dul ba): skye mched du gtogs zhes bya'o//nongs pa sngar 'das pa zhes bgyi'am/ma 'ongs pa zhes bgyi 'am/de ltar byung ba zhes bgyi/gsungs pa nyes pa sngar 'das
305a6('dul ba): po zhes kyang bya/ma 'ongs pa zhes kyang bya/da ltar byung ba zhes kyang bya'o//sngar 'das pa gang zhe na/nyes pa byung nas bshegs shing slar byas pa ni nyes pa de las langs
305a7('dul ba): te/don sngar 'das pa'o//ma 'ongs pa gang zhe na/nyes pa mo byung mod kyi nges par 'byung ba de ni ma 'ongs pa zhes bya'o//da ltar byung ba gang zhe na/nyes pa
305b1('dul ba): byung ba den da ltung brgya/nongs pa dge ba zhes pasgo ba 'o ma//mau dag pa zhes bad+mo'am/lung du mo ston pa zhes pa/gsungs panyaMs pa mo dge bzhes kyang bya/lung dum
305b2('dul ba): bstan pa zhes kyang bya mi dge ba gang zhe na/gang sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa bcas pa la bas myas bzhin du 'das pa 'di ma mi dge ba'o//lung du ma bstan pa dang zhe na/ga
305b3('dul ba): sangs rgyas kyis brnyas pa la/ma bsams bzhin 'das pad+ma na lung du ma bstan pa'o//nongs pa 'dod pa'i khamasu gtogs pa zhes bgyi 'om/gzugs kyi khams su
305b4('dul ba): gtogs pa zhes bgyi 'am/gzugs med pa'i khams matogs pa zhes pagyi/gsungs pa nyes pa 'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa zhes bya'o///nongs pa
305b5('dul ba): slob pa zhes bgyi 'am/mi slob pa zhes bgyi 'am/skyob pa yang ma lags mi slob pa'ang ma lags zhes bgyi/gsungs pa nyos pa slob pa yang ma yin/mi slob pa
305b6('dul ba): yang ma yin pa zhes bya'o//nongs pa mthong bas snang ba zhes bgyi 'am/bsgom pas spang ba zhes bgyi/gsungs pa bsgom pas spang ba zhes bya'o//nongs pa lus las
305b7('dul ba): byung ba zhes bgyi 'am/ngag las byung ba zhes bgyi'o//sems las byung ba nas bgyi/gsungs pa nyes pa lus las byung ba yang yod/ngag las byung ba yang yod/
306a1('dul ba): sems las byung ba yang yod de/lus las byung ba gang zhe na/mi tshangs par spyod pa byed pa dang /mya byin par len pa dang /me'i 'tsho ba dang
306a2('dul ba): 'bral bar byed pa dang /bsam bzhin khu ba 'byin pa dang /lus kyis reg par byed pa dang /rtsa sngon po gcod pa dang /phyi dro za ba dang /btung ba 'chang 'thung ba ni lus
306a3('dul ba): las byung ba'o//ngag las byung ba gang zhe na/gling med la med bzhin du dkyil 'khor bla mar gyur pa'i cho su bdag nyid spro ba dang bud med de la nyes pa sbom po'i tshig
306a4('dul ba): smra ba dang /bud med kyi mdun du bdag gi lus kyis kun spyad pa'i yon tan brjod pa dang /bud med la tshig lnga 'am/drug las lhag par chos ston pa ste/'di ni
306a5('dul ba): ngag las byung ba'o//sems las byung ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste/dge slong gcig pu dgon pa na gnas na/de de na gso sbyin la sems mi skyod pa/tshig tu'ang mi
306a6('dul ba): smra/de'i sems las byung ba'i nyes pa ma dag pa ste/'on kyang 'di skad du smra'o//sems las byung ba'i nyes pa dag med kyi/'on kyang 'dri ni dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyor ba'o/
306a7('dul ba): ping gi dngos po las nongs par 'gyur ba de la brtun te bgyis na/dngos po de nyid la brtun te bgyis kyang nongs par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam gsungs pa/
306b1('dul ba): dngos po de nyid la brtun te byas na nyes par 'gyur ba yang yod/dngos po de nyid la brtun tu byas na nyes par mi 'gyur ba yod do//dngos po de la brtan to byas na nyes par
306b2('dul ba): 'gyur ba gang zhe na 'di lta ste/dge slong brtan pa mra bting ba ches gos ci 'dod pa 'ching ste/sbyar ma med par grong du 'jug pa dang /'gron du ma bos par glong du 'jug
306b3('dul ba): pa dang /'dus shing za ba dang /yang yang za ba ni nyes pa'o//gang dngos po de nyid la brtun tu byas kyang nongs par mi 'gyur ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste/dge slong brtan
306b4('dul ba): pa bting la/chos gos ci 'dod pa 'chang ste/sbyar ma med par grong du 'jug pa dang /'gron du ma tho par grong du 'jug pa dang /yang yang za ba dang /'dus shing za ba
306b5('dul ba): la nyes pa medado//de ltar na dngos po gang la brtun te byos nas/nyes par 'gyur ba'i dngos po nyid la brtun te byas kyang nyes par mi 'gyur ro//las bgyis na nongs par 'gyur
306b6('dul ba): ba'i las de nyid dgyis kyang nongs par 'gyur po mchis sam/gsungs pa las byas na nyes par 'gyur ba'i las de nyid byas pa las nyes par mi 'gyur ba'ang yid
306b7('dul ba): do//las gang byas pa la nyes par 'gyur ba'i las de nyid byas kyang nyes par 'gyur ba gang zhe na/dge slong rnams kyis dge slong ma mthong ngo zhes nas spangs pa dang /
307a1('dul ba): slar las mi byed pa dang /sdig pa la lta ba mi gtong ste spangs pa lngas/dge slong rnams la 'byung bar gsol sru stsol bar byed pa lus mtshoms kyi phyi rol//
307a2('dul ba): tu 'byin na nyes par 'gyuraro//las de nyid byas la nyes byas par 'gyur ba blang zhe na/'di lta ste/dge slong rnams kyis dge sbyong ma mthong ngo zhes sbyangs pa dang /
307a3('dul ba): slar las mi byed pa dang sdig pa lo lte ba mo gtong ba spangs pa las/de nyid kyis dge slong rnams las 'byung bar gsol/spu snyol bar byed pa bal mo sbyar te phyug
307a4('dul ba): 'tshal bar ston pa mtshams kyi nang du phyung na nyes pa med do//de ltar na gang las byas pa las nyes par 'gyur ba'i las nyes par 'gyur ba'i las de nyid byas kyang nyes
307a5('dul ba): med do//las de nyid 'tshal kyang nongs por yang 'gyur la/las de nyid 'tshal la nongs par mi 'gyur ba ma mchis sam/gsungs pa las de shes la nyes
307a6('dul ba): par 'gyur ba dang /las de nyid shes la nyes par mi 'gyur ba yod do//ji ltar na las gang 'tshal la nongs par 'gyur la/las de nyid 'tshal la nongs par
307a7('dul ba): ming gyur ba lags/de 'di ltar dge slong rnams kyis dge slong ma mthong ngo zhes spangs pa dang /blar las mi byed pa dang /sdig pa la lta ba mi khatong bas spa
307b1('dul ba): pade dge slong rnams la 'byung bar gsol/spu nyal bar byed thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal bar ston/mtshams kyi phyi rol tu phyung nas/dge slong rnams de la 'dus par byed lhan
307b2('dul ba): cig gnas/gnas khang gcig na lhan cig nyal bar byed pa dang /dge slong gzhan dag gis smras pa/kye tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong 'di dge 'dun 'dus pas/chos
307b3('dul ba): bzhin ma mthong ngo zhes spangs na/dge slong de la dge slong rnams rjesu 'jug gam zhes smras pa dang /de dag 'di skad ces de ni bden te/dge slong 'di ni 'byung bar gsol/
307b4('dul ba): spu nyal bar byed thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal bar sten nas phyung ngo //gang du mtshams kyi phyi rol tu'o zhes smra ba ni nyes pa byung ba'o//'di ltar yang dge slong rnams kyis
307b5('dul ba): dge slong ma mthong ngo zhes spangs pa dang /slar las mi byed pa dang /sdig pa la lta ba slar mi gtong nas spangs te/dge slong rnams la 'byung bar gsol spu snyol
307b6('dul ba): dur byed/thal mo sbyar te/phyag 'tshal bar ston nus mtshoms kyi nang du phyung ste/de la dge slong rnams de dang 'dus par byed lhan cig gnas khang gcig na nyal bar
307b7('dul ba): byed do//dge slong gzhan dag gis smras pa/kye tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong 'di ni/dge 'dun 'dus pa chos bzhin mo mthong ngo zhes spangs nas/dge slong rnams
308a1('dul ba): dge slong de'i rje'u 'jug gam zhes smras pa dang /de dag gis 'di skad du smra'o//de ni bdun te dge slong 'di la 'byung bar gsol/spu snyol bar byed
308a2('dul ba): de thal mo sbyar cang phyag 'tshal bar ston nas phyung ngo //gang du mtshams kyi nang du'o//zhes zer ni nyes pa medo//de ltar na las shes la nyes par 'gyur ba dang /lus de
308a3('dul ba): nyid shes la nyes por mi 'gyur ba'o//bdag po yid dam las nongs pa dang /gzhan gyi yi dam las nongs par 'gyur ba mchis sam/gsungs pa bdag gi yi dam
308a4('dul ba): las nyes pa dang /gzhan gyi yi dam las nyes par 'gyur ba yod do//ji ltar na bdag gi yi dramA las nongs pa lags/de 'di ltar dge slong gis nyes pa'i phung
308a5('dul ba): po lnga'i nang nas gang yang rung ba'i nyes pa byung nas rang nyid kyis shes pa ni nyes pa'o//gzhan gyi yi dam las nongs pa gang lags/ji ltar yang dge slong gis nyes
308a6('dul ba): ba'i phung po lnga'i nang nas/gang yang rung ba'i nyes pa byung ba las/dad pa'i dge bsnyen gyi tshig bzhin nyes pa de chos bzhin du byed pa'o//de ltar na rang gi yid ma
308a7('dul ba): las nyes pa dang /gzhan gyi yi dam las nyes pa'o//dran pa las nongs par 'gyur ba dang /mi dran pa las nongs par 'gyur ba mo ches sam/gsungs pa yod do//
308b1('dul ba): de ltar na dran pa las nongs pa gang lags/de 'di ltar dge slong nyes pa'i phung po lnga'i nang nas/gang yang rung ba'i nyes pa byung ba dran pa de ni dran pa'i nyes pa'o//ji ltar na mi dran pa
308b2('dul ba): la nongs pa lags/de 'di ltar dge slong nyes pa'i phung po lnga'i nang nas gang yang rung ba'i nyes pa byung ba mi dran te/des cung zad mi dran du zin kyang de nyes par 'gyur ro//de ltar
308b3('dul ba): dran na yang nyes pa mi dran kyang nyes pa'o//mngon sum du gyur pa las nongs pa dang /mngon sum du ma gyur pa las nor pa mchis sam/gsungs pa yod do//ji ltar na mngon
308b4('dul ba): sum du gyur pa las nongs pa lags/de 'di ltar dge slong gis nyes pa'i phung po lnga'i nang nas gang yang rung ba nyes pa byung ba'i de ni mngon sum du gyur pa'i nyes pa'o//ji ltar
308b5('dul ba): na mngon sum du ma gyur pa'i nongs pa lags/de 'di ltar dge slong gis nyes pa'i phung po lnga'i nang nas gang rung nyes pa ma byung ba yang 'byung bar gi don mi za'o//de lta bu ni
308b6('dul ba): mngon sum du ma gyur kyang nyes pa dang mngon sum du gyur kyang nyes pa'o//dngos po gang gis mi gnas pa dang /dngos po de nyid kyis so sor gnas par 'gyur bar mchis
308b7('dul ba): sam/gsungs pa yod do//de 'di ltar dge slong rnams kyis dge slong ma mthong ngo zhes nas spangs pa dang /slar las mi byed pa dang /sdig pa la lta ba slar mi gtong ste/
309a1('dul ba): spangs pa de ni dngos po gang gis mi gnas pa dang /dngos po de nyid so sor gnas pa'o//las gang bgyis pas/mi gnas pa dang /las de nyid
309a2('dul ba): bgyis pas/so sor gnas par 'gyur ba mchis sam/gsungs pa las gang byas pas mi gnas pa dang /las de nyid byas pas so sor gnas pa yod do ji ltar na las
309a3('dul ba): gang byas pas mi gnas shing las de nyid byas pas so sor gnas pa lags/de 'di ltar dge slong rnams kyis dge slong ma de mthong ngo zhes spangs pa dang /slar las
309a4('dul ba): mi byed pa dang /sdig pa la lta ba slar mi gtong nas/spangs pa de lta bu ni las gang byas pas/mi gnas pa'i las de nyid byas kyang so sor gnas pa'o//las gang
309a5('dul ba): 'tshol nA mi gnas par 'gyur ba dang /las de nyid 'tshal na so sor gnas par 'gyur ba mchis sam/gsungs po las gang shes nas mi gnas pa dang /
309a6('dul ba): las de nyid shes kyang so sor gnas par 'gyur ba yod do//ji ltar las gang 'tshal kyang mi gnas pa dang /las de nyid 'tshal ba so sor gnas par 'gyur pa lag
309a7('dul ba): de 'di ltar dge slong rnams kyis/dge slong la ma mthong ngo zhes nas spangs pa dang /slar las mi byed pa dang /sdig pa la lta ba ma spangs pa de lta bu ni las gang
309b1('dul ba): kyang mi gnas pa dang /lngas de nyid shes kyang so snong gnas pa'o//rang gi yi dam gyis mi gnas pa dang /rang gi yi dam gyis so sor gnas par 'gyur ba mchis snyam/gsungs
309b2('dul ba): byarang gi yi dam gyis mi gnas pa dang /rang gi yi dam gyis so sor gnas par 'gyur ba yod do//ji ltar na rang gi yi dam gyis mI gnas pa dang /rang gi yi dam gyisas
309b3('dul ba): sor gnas par 'gyur ba lags/de 'di ltar dge slong rnams kyis/dge slong ma mthong zhes pa'i phyir spangs pa dang /slar las mi byed pa dang /sdig pa la lta ba slar mi
309b4('dul ba): gtong bas spangs pa de lta bu ni rang gi yi dam gyis mi gnas pa dang /rang gi yi dam gyis so sor gnas pa'o//gzhan gyi yi dam las mi gnas pa dang /gzhan gyi yi
309b5('dul ba): dam las so sor gnas par 'gyur ba mchis sam/bka' stsal pa/gzhan gyi yi dam las mi gnas pa dang /gzhan gyi yi dam las so sor gnas pa yod do//ji
309b6('dul ba): sbyar na gzhan gyi ye dmya lus mi gnas pa dang /gzhan gyi yi dam las so sor+yA gnas par 'gyur bu lags/de 'di ltar dge slong rnams kyis dge bsnyen pa'i tshe
309b7('dul ba): bzhin dge slong de ma mthong ngo zhes nas spangs pa dang /slar las mi byed pa dang /sdig pa la lta ba slar mi gtong ba'i phyir spangs pa de lta bu ni gzhan gyi yi dam las mi
310a1('dul ba): gnas pa dang /gzhan rgya yod ma lus so sor gnas pa'o//dran kyang mo gnas pa dang /dran kyang so sor gnas par 'gyur ba mchis sam/
310a2('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/dran kyang mi gnas pa dang /spyan kyang so sor gnas pa yid do//ji ltar dron kyang mi gnas pa dang /dran kyang sa sar gnas par 'gyur ba lags/
310a3('dul ba): 'di ltar dge slong rnams kyis dge slong mi mthong zhes nas spangs pa dang sbrar las mi byed pa dang /sdig pa la lta ba slar mi gtong ba'i phyir sbyangs pa de lta bu ni dran kyi
310a4('dul ba): mi gnas pa dang /dran kyang sna sar gnas par 'gyuraro//mi dran kyang mi gunas po dang /mi dran kyangs sor gnas par 'gyur ba mchis sam/bka' stsal pa/
310a5('dul ba): dran kyang mi gnas pa dang /mi dran kyang so sor gnas par 'gyur ba yod do//de ltar dge slong rnams kyis dge slong ma mthong ngo zhes nas spangs pa dang /slar las
310a6('dul ba): mi byed pa dang /sdig pa la lta ba slar mi gtong bya'i phyir spangs ze de lta bu mi dran kyang mi gnas pa dang /mi dren kyang so sor gnas pa'o//mngon sum du gyur pa la mi
310a7('dul ba): gnas pa dang /mngon sum du gyur pa la so sor gnas par 'gyur ba mchis sam/bka' stsal pa/mngon sum du gyur pa la me gnas pa dang /mngon sum du/
310b1('dul ba): gyur ba la so song gnas pa yang yod do//ji ltar na mngon sum du gyur pa las mi gnas pa la sogs pa lags/dro ltar dge slong rnams kyis/dge slong gis ma mthong zhes
310b2('dul ba): nas smrar las mi byed pa dang /sdig pa lA lta baM mi gtong ba'i phyir spangs pa de lta bu ni mngon sum du gyur pa las mi gnas pa dang /mngon sum du gyur pa las sa sa
310b3('dul ba): gnas pa'o//mngon sum du ma gyur kyang mi gnas/mngon sum du ma gyur kyang sa sor gnas pa mchis sam/gsungs pa med do//ji ltar na mngon sum du ma gyur
310b4('dul ba): kyang mi gnas pa dang /mngon sum du ma gyur kyang so sor glenas pa lags/de 'di ltar dge slong rnams kyis dge slong gis ma mthong zhes nas spangs pa dang /
310b5('dul ba): slar las mi byed pa dang /sdig pa la lci ba slar mi gtong ba'i phyir spangs pa de lta bu ni mngon sum du ma gyur kyang mi gnas pa dang /mngon sum du ma gyur kyang sa stor
310b6('dul ba): glanas pa'o//dngos pa gang gi phyir dge 'dun gyis lus bgyi ba dngos pa mang pa'i ste/gnyis sam gtsug gos bgyi ba mchis sam/gsungs pa dngos po gang
310b7('dul ba): byed/dge 'dun gyi las brgya bo'i dngos pa de mang po 'am/gnyis sam gcig gis bya ba yang mad de ji ltar na dngas pa gcig gis dge 'dun gyi las brgya
311a1('dul ba): dngos po de mang po'am gnyis sam gcig gi bgyi bar 'gyur ba lags/du 'di ltar dge slong rnams kyis dge sbyong la phyag ma 'tshal par bcas pa dang //
311a2('dul ba): gtam mi smra bar bcas pa dang /longs spyod pa mi gcig par bcas nas bskos te de lta bu'i dngos po gang gi phyir/dge 'dun gyi las byas pa'i dngos po de mang po'am//
311a3('dul ba): gnyis sam gcig gis kyang bya ba'o//las gang dge 'dun gyi la su bgyi ba'i las de mang po'am/gnyis samau gcig gis kyang de bzhin mchis sam/gsungs pa
311a4('dul ba): yod do//ji ltar snga ma bzhin du dge slong rnams kyis dge slong la phyag mi 'tshal bar bcas pa dang /gtam mi smra bar bcas pa dang /longs spyod mi gcig par bcas
311a5('dul ba): na bskos te/de ltar na las gang dge 'dun gyi las gang shes bzhin du dge 'dun gyis bya ba'i las su bya ba de mang po'am/gnyis sam gcig gis kyang de bzhin no///
311a6('dul ba): las 'chil bzhin du dge 'dun gyis bgying ba'i las de nyid 'tshal na/gnyis sam gcig gis kyang de bzhin mchis sam/gsungs pa las gang shes bzhin
311a7('dul ba): du dge 'dun gyis bya ba'i las de nyid shes kyang mang po'am/gnyis sam/gcig gis bya ba yang yod do//ji ltar na las 'tshal bzhin du dge 'dun gyis
311b1('dul ba): bgyid pa'i las de nyid 'tshal na/mang po 'am/gnyis sam gcig gos 'gyi ba lags/de 'di ltar dge slong la dge slong rnams kyis phyag mo 'tshal bar bcas pa dang /
311b2('dul ba): gtam mi smra bar bcas pa dang /longs spyod mi gcig par bcas nas bskos pa de lta bu ni gang shes bzhin du dge 'dun gyis bya ba'i las de nyid shes kyang mang po 'am
311b3('dul ba): gnyis sam gcig gis kyang de bzhin no//rang gi yi dam bzhin dge 'dun las mdzad na rang gi yi dam bzhin mang po 'am/gnyis sam gcig gis de bzhin du
311b4('dul ba): 'gyur ba mchis sam/gsungs pa rang gi yi dam bzhin dge 'dun las byed na'ang rang gi yi dam bzhin/mang po 'am gnyis sam gcig gis bya ba yod do//je
311b5('dul ba): ltar na rang gi yi ma bzhin dge 'dun las ma mdzad na rang gi yi dam bzhin mang po'am gnyis sam gcig gis bgyi ba lags/de 'di ltar dge slong rnams kyis
311b6('dul ba): phyag mi bya bar bcas pa dang /gtim mi smra ba bcas pa dang /longs spyod mi gcig par bcas nas bskos pa de lta bu ni rang gi yi dra ma bzhin dge 'dun las byed
311b7('dul ba): no'ang /rang gi yi dam bzhin mang po'am/gnyis sam gcig gis kyang de bzhi no//gzhan gyi yi dam gyis kyang /dge 'dun gyis las mdzad na/gzhan gyi yi
312a1('dul ba): dam gyis mang po 'am gcig gos kyang /de bzhin du bgyi bar 'gyur ba mchis sam/gsungs pa yod do//de 'di ltar dge slong la dge slong rnams kyis
312a2('dul ba): phyag mi bya bar bcas pa dang /gtam mi smra bar bcas pa dang /longs spyod mi gcig par bcus nas bsgos pa de lta bu ni gzhan gyi yi dam gyis kyang dge 'dun gyis
312a3('dul ba): las byed na/gzhan gyi yi dam gyis mang po 'am/gnyis sam gcig gis kyang snga ma bzhi no//dran bzhin du'ang dge 'dun gyis las mdzad na/dran pa bzhin du'ang
312a4('dul ba): mang po'am/gnyis sam gcig gis kyang de bzhin du 'gyur ba mchis sam/bka' stsal pa/dran bzhin du'ang dge 'dun gyis las byed na'ang drin bzhin du'ang /
312a5('dul ba): mang po 'am gnyis sam gcig gis kyang de bzhin du 'gyur ba yod do//de 'di ltar dge slong la dge slong rnams kyis phyag mi bye bar bcas pa dang /gtam mi smra bar
312a6('dul ba): bcas pa dang /longs spyod mi gcig par bcas nas/bskos pa de lta bu ni/dran bzhin du yang dge 'dun gyi las byed no/dran bzhin du'ang mang po 'am gnyis sam
312a7('dul ba): gcig gis kyang snga ma bzhin no//mi dran pa las kyang mchis sam/snga ma bzhin te mi dran kyang mang po 'am gnyis sam/gcig gis zhes bya ba'i bar du de bzhin no//
312b1('dul ba): mngon sum du gyur kyang dge 'dun gyi las mdzad na/mngon sum du gyur kyang mang po'am gnyis sam gcig gis kyang de bzhin du gyur pa mchis sam/gsungs pa/
312b2('dul ba): mngon sum du gyur kyang mang po 'am gnyis sam gcig gis de bzhin du gyur pa yod do/de 'di ltar dge slong la dge slong rnams kyis phyug mi bya bar bcas pa dang
312b3('dul ba): gtam mi smra bar bcas pa dang /longs spyod mi gcig par bcas nas bskos pa de lta bu ni mngon sum du gyur kyang dge 'dun gyis los byed na/mngon sum du gyur
312b4('dul ba): kyang mang po'am gnyis sam gcig gis snga ma bzhin no//mngon sum du gyur kyang dge 'dun gyis las bgyis na mngon sum du ma gyur kyang de bzhin du 'gyur ba
312b5('dul ba): mchis sam/gsungs pa yod de/de 'di ltar dge slong la dge slong rnams kyis kyang phyag mi bya bar bcas pa dang /gtam mi smra bar bcas pa dang /longs spyod mi
312b6('dul ba): gcig par bcus nas bskos pa de lta bu ni mngon sum du ma gyur kyang dge 'dun gyis las byed na mngon sum du ma gyur kyang mang po 'am gnyis sam gcig gos
312b7('dul ba): kyang snga ma bzhi no//smra dbab pa las bsdigs pa dang /smad pa dang /bskrad pa dang /slar bsdums pa bzhi sa/bsdigs pa'i las su rigs pa las/smad pa dang /
313a1('dul ba): bskrad pa dang /slar bsdum pa'i las bgyis na/bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/don gang gis dbang du bya ba gsum
313a2('dul ba): po des sam lnga po nges byas na/byas pa zhes bya'o//de ste mdo sde'i dbang gis byed na/mu byas pa zhes bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/bsngags pa'ang gzhan smad pa'ong gzhan
313a3('dul ba): bskrad pa'am gzhan slar bsdum pa'am gzhan pa'i phyir ro//btsun pa slad po'i lasu rigs pa lags/bskrad pa dang /slar bsdums pa dang bsdigs pa'i las bgyis
313a4('dul ba): na/bgyis zhes bgyi'am/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/don gang gi dbang gis byed de/gsum po des sam lnga tshwa des byas na byas pa zhes bya'o//de ste mdo sde/
313a5('dul ba): dbang gis byed na ma byas pa zhes bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/spyad pa'ang gzhan bskrad pa'am gzhan slar bsdum pa'ang gzhan/bsdigs pa'ang gzhan pa'i phyir//btsun
313a6('dul ba): pa bskrad pa'i lasu rigs pa las/slar bsdum pa dang /bsdigs pa dang /smad pa'i las bgyis na/bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
313a7('dul ba): don gang gis dbang du bya ba gsum po des sam/lnga po nges byas na byas pa zhes bya'o//de ste mdo sde'i dbang gis byas na ma byas pa zhes bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/bskrad pa
313b1('dul ba): 'ang gzhan slar bsdum pa'adra gzhan/bsdigs pa'ang gzhan smad pa'ang gzhan pa'i phyir//btsun pa slar bsdum pa'i las su rigs pa lags/bsdigs pa dang snang ba dang
313b2('dul ba): bsgrud pa'i las bgyis na 'gyis pa zhes bgyi'am/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol pa/de na gang gi dbang du bya ba gsum po des sam lnga po des byas na byas pa zhes byul
313b3('dul ba): da sti mdo sde'i dbang gis byas na ma byas pa zhes bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/slar bsdum pa'ang gzhan bsdigs pa la sogs pa 'am gzhan pa'i phyir//dngos po gang gis
313b4('dul ba): bskrad pa'i la su bgyi ba dngos po des smad pa dang /bsdigs pa dang /slar bsdum par rung ngam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de'i don gyi dbang du byas na rung ngo /
313b5('dul ba): dngos po gang gis skud pa'i lasu bgyi ba'i dngos po des bskrad pa dang /bsdigs pa dang /slar bsdums par rung ngam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/de'i dran
313b6('dul ba): gyi dbang du byas na rung //dngos po gang gis bsdigs pa'i las su bgyi ba'i dngos po des sgrar bsdum pa dang /bskrad pa dang /smad par rung ngam/bcom ldan 'das kyis
313b7('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/de'i don gyi dbang du byas na rung ngo //dngos po gang gis slar bsdum pa'i lasu bgyi ba'i dngos po des bskrad pa dang /bsdigs pa dang /smad pa rung ngam/
314a1('dul ba): tsam ldan+ta 'das kyus pakA d+hA pa ga dran dang du byas na rlung po//ngos pa grang gos lhag ma ma pa 'i rmongs par 'gyur ba'o dngos po des la
314a2('dul ba): ma dang bcas par 'gyur ba mchis sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa yod do//'di ltar dge slong ma dang thun mong ma yin pa'i phas pham pa bzhi byas na
314a3('dul ba): lhag ma med par 'gyuraro//dge slong la ni lhag ma dang bcas par 'gyuraro//dngos po gang gis phas pham pa'i dngos po gang gis nongs par 'gyur ba'i dngos po des/dge
314a4('dul ba): 'dun gyi lhag mar 'gyur ba mchis sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa yod de/dge slong ma ni lus kyis reg par spyod pas/phas pham par 'gyur dge
314a5('dul ba): slong la dge 'dun gyis lhag mar 'gyur ro//dngos po gang gis phas pham pa'i nongs par 'gyur ba'i dngos po des/ltung bar 'gyur ba mchis sam/bcom ldan
314a6('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa yod de/dge slong mas shes bzhin du dge slong ma'i nyes pa sbom po'i nyes pa skya rung bye gis bar du bcabs na/phas pham par 'gyur/
314a7('dul ba): dge slong dag gis dge slong gi bcabs na ltung bar 'gyur//dngos po gang gis phas pham par 'gyur ba de'i dngos po nyes byas su 'gyur ba mchis sam/bcom
314b1('dul ba): na 'das kyis bka' stsal pa yod de/dge slong mas 'di ltar dge 'dun 'dus pas/chos bzhin du dge slong ma mthong ngo zhes nas spangs pa'i rje su zhugs pa de la/dge
314b2('dul ba): 'dun gyi nang du lam gsum gyi bar du bsgo yang mi gtong na/dge slong ma la ni phas pham par 'gyuraro//dge slong bsgo ste ma btang na nyes bya su 'gyur ro//dngos po gang gis
314b3('dul ba): dge 'dun gyi lhag mar 'gyur la/dngos po de nyid ltung bar 'gyur ba mchis sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa yod de/dge slong gi bsams bzhin du khu ba
314b4('dul ba): byung na dge 'dun gyi lhag mar 'gyuraro//dge slong mas phyung na ltung bar 'gyuraro//dngos po gang gis dge 'dun gyi lhag mar 'gyur la/dngos po de nyid kyis nyes byasu
314b5('dul ba): 'gyur ba mchis sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa yod de/dge slong ma dus ma yin par don gyi phyir phyi rol tu byung na/dge 'dun gyi lhag mar 'gyur ro///
314b6('dul ba): dge slong ni nyes byasu 'gyuraro//gang gis dngos po ltung bar 'gyur la/de'i dngos pos so sor bshags par 'gyur ba mchis sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
314b7('dul ba): stsal pa yod de/dge slong gis gnyen ma yin pa las bsod pa'i zas bslangs na ltung bar 'gyur ro//dge slong mas blangs na so sor bshags par 'gyur ro//
315a1('dul ba): gang gis dngos pos ltung bar 'gyur ba de'i dngos po de nyid kyi nyes bya su 'gyur ba mchis sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/yod do//
315a2('dul ba): dge slong mas rtsa sngon po'i steng du gshang gci byas na ltung bar 'gyur ro//dge slong gis byas na nyes byasu 'gyur ro//dngos po gang gis so sor bshags par 'gyur la/
315a3('dul ba): de'i dngos po de nyid kyis nyes byas su 'gyur ba mchis sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa yod de/dam bcas pa'i slob pa'i rigs pa las/bdag gis
315a4('dul ba): lag gis dang te/bza' ba dong bca' ba dag blangs nas/so sor chags par 'gyuraro//dge slong mas blangs na nyes byas 'gyuraro//rgyun nas su yi dam 'cha' bzhin bsnyen
315a5('dul ba): bapar ma rdzogs par yang /bsnyen par rdzogs par mi bgyi ba dang /bsnyen par rdzogs pa las/slar dbyung bar bgyi ba dang /bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa las bsnyen par
315a6('dul ba): rdzogs par bgyi ba dang /bsnyen par rdzogs pa la mi dbyung ba mchis sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/yod de/lan gnyis sem lan gsum gyi bar du
315a7('dul ba): gso sbyin mngon du myong na/de bsnyen par ma rdzogs na bsnyen par rdzogs par mi bya/bsnyen par rdzogs na yang slar dbyung bar bya/gang zhig gis gso sbyin lan
315b1('dul ba): dra myong na/de bsnyen par ma rdzogs na yang bsnyen par rdzogs par bya/bsnyen par rdzogs na yang /dbyung bar mi bya'o//dge slong ma sun phyung ba yi dam 'cha' bzhin du
315b2('dul ba): bsnyen par ma rdzogs na yang /bsnyen par rdzogs par mi bgyi ba dang /bsnyen par rdzogs pa na yang slar dbyung ba dang /bsnyen par ma rdzogs na yang /bsnyen par rdzogs
315b3('dul ba): par bgyi ba dang /bsnyen par rdzogs na yang mi 'byung ba mchis sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba yod de/mi tshangs par spyod pa gang gis/dge slong ma
315b4('dul ba): sun phyung bar gyur pa de ni bsnyen par ma rdzogs na yang /bsnyen par rdzogs par mi bya/bsnyen par rdzogs na lnga slar dbyung bar bya/gang gis lus kyis reg pas/dge slong

322b6('dul ba): na/rnam pa 'di dag ma gautogs pa'o//gang gis dge 'dun phye ba de thams cad log par nges pa logs sam//log par nges pa de tha~Md dge 'dun 'byed pa lags/gsungs pa dge 'dun
322b7('dul ba): 'byed par byed na/log par ma nges pa'ang sngo log par nges la dge 'dun mi 'byed pa'ang yod/dge 'dun 'byed la log par nges pa yang yod/dge 'dun yang mi 'byed pa la log par ma nges pa /
323a1('dul ba): yod do//dge 'dun 'byed la log par ma nges pa gang zhe na/gang gis chos bzhin du 'du shes bzhin dge 'dun phye bar gyur pa de ni dge 'dun 'byed par bgyid pa la log pa//
323a2('dul ba): ma nges pa'o//log par nges la dge 'dun mi 'byed pa gang zhe na/pa bsad pa dang ma bsad pa dang /dgra bcom pa bsod pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa lo ngan sems kyi khrag phyung ba
323a3('dul ba): de dag ni log par nges la/dge 'dun gyi dben mi byed pa'o//dge 'dun gyi dbyen yang byas la log par yang nges pa gang zhe na/lhas byin yin te/dge 'dun yang phye la log par yang
323a4('dul ba): nges pa'o//dge 'dun phye ba yang ma yin la/log par ma nges pa gang zhe na/de rnams ma gtogs pa'o//gang dge 'dun gyi dbyen byed pa de thams cad mi mkhas pa ma lags la/mi
323a5('dul ba): mkhas pas smras pa ma lags sam/mi mkhas la mi mkhas par smra ba de thams cad dge 'dun gyi dbyen dgyid pa lags sam gsungs pa/dge 'dun gyi dbyen byed la mi mkhas
323a6('dul ba): pa ma yin la/mi mkhas pas smras pa ma yin pa yang yod/mi mkhas la mi mkhas par smra zhing /dge 'dun gyi dbyen du mi 'gyur ba yang yod//dge 'dun gyi dbyen yang byas shing
323a7('dul ba): mi mkhas la mi mkhas par smra ba yang yod/dge 'dun gyi dbyen yang ma byas la/mi mkhas pa yang ma yin la/mi mkhas pa smra ba ma yin pa yod/dge 'dun gyi dbyen yang byas
323b1('dul ba): la mi mkhas pa yang ma yin/mi mkhas par smra ba yang ma yin pa gang zhe na/gang gis chos bzhin du 'du shes bzhin/dge 'dun gyi dbyen byas par gyur na/de lta bu ni dge 'dun gyi dbyen
323b2('dul ba): yang byas la mi mkhas pa yang ma yin mi mkhas par smra ba yang ma yin pa'o//mi mkhas la mi mkhas par smra yang dge 'dun gyi dbyen du mi 'gyur ba gang zhe na/ston pa drug por yi
323b3('dul ba): dam bcas pa ste/de ni mi mkhas la mi mkhas par smras kyang /dge 'dun gyi dbyen du mi 'gyur ba'o//dge 'dun gyi dbyen yang byas la mi mkhas la mi mkhas par smra ba gang zhe na/
323b4('dul ba): lha sbyin yin te/de ni dge 'dun gyi dbyen yang byas la/mi mkhas la mi mkhas por smra'o//dge 'dun gyi dbyen yang ma byas la/mi mkhas pa yang ma yin/mi mkhas par smra ba
323b5('dul ba): ma yin pa gang zhe na/de rnams ma gtogs pa'o//btsun pa dge slong gis dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi dbyen du 'gyur ram/'on te dge slong ma 'am/dge slob ma 'am/dge tshul pha
323b6('dul ba): 'am/dge tshul mas dge 'dun gyi dbyen du 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi dbyen du 'gyur gyi/dge slong ma'am/dge slob ma'am/dge
323b7('dul ba): tshul pha 'am/dge tshul mas dge 'dun gyi dbyen du mi 'gyur ro//btsun pa dge slong ma dge 'dun ma'i dbyen du 'gyur ram/'on te dge slong ngam/dge slob ma 'am/dge tshul
324a1('dul ba): pa'am/dge tshul mas dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyi dbyen du 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong ma dge 'dun gyi dbyen du 'gyur gyi/dge
324a2('dul ba): slong ngam/dge slong ma 'am/dge tshul pa'am/dge tshul mas dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyi dbyen du mi 'gyur ro//btsun pa dge 'dun phye ba dang ldan nam/'on te kha na ma tho ba dang
324a3('dul ba): ldan/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge 'dun la ni bye ba dang ldan 'byed pa'i gang zag la ni kha na ma tho ba dang ldan dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis na/nongs pa cir 'gyur//
324a4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro//dge 'dun phye na nongs pa gang bshags par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/nyes pa sbom
324a5('dul ba): po'o//gang nye bar phyogs pa de thams cad mi gnas pa 'am/de ste gang mi gnas pa de thams cad nye bar phyogs pa lags/nye bar phyogs pa la mi gnas pa ma yin pa
324a6('dul ba): yang yod/mi gnas la nye bar mi phyoT pa'ang yod/nye bar phyogs la mi gnas par 'gyur ba'ang yod/nye bar yang ma phyogs la mi gnas pa yang yod do//nye bar phyogs
324a7('dul ba): la mi gnas pa ma yin pa gang zhe ni/gang gis dngos po lnga la nye bar phyogs par gyur cing nyes pa rnams bzhi po las gang yang rung nyes pa byung bar ma 'gyur ba de ni/
324b1('dul ba): nyebar phyogs pa ste/mi gnas par 'gyur ba ma yin no//mi gnas par 'gyur la phyogs pa ma yin pa gang zhe na/gang gis nyes pa bzhi las gang yang rung /nyes pan
324b2('dul ba): byung bar gyur gyi/dngos po lnga la khas blangs par ma gyur pa de ni mi gnas pa ste/nye bar phyogs pa ma yin//nye bar phyogs la mi gnas par 'gyur ba gang zhe na/dngos po
324b3('dul ba): khas blangs par gyur cing nyes pa bzhi las gang yang rung /nyes pa byung ba de ni nye bar phyogs la mi gnas par yang 'gyur ba'o//nye bar ma phyogs la mi gnas par yang
324b4('dul ba): mi 'gyur ba gang zhe na/rnam pa de rnams ma gtogs pa'o//gang mi gnas pa de thams cad so sor gnas pa lags sam/gang so sor gnas pa de thams cad mi
324b5('dul ba): gnas pa lags sam/mi gnas la so sor gnas pa ma yin pa yang yod/so sor gnas la mi gnas pa ma yin pa yang yod/mi gnas pa yin la so sor gnas pa yang
324b6('dul ba): yod/mi gnas pa yang ma yin la so sor gnas pa ma yin pa yod do//mi gnas la so sor gnas pa ma yin pa gang zhe na/de 'di ltar nyes pa rnam pa bzhi las gang lnga
324b7('dul ba): rung ba byung bar ni 'gyur gyi/dge 'dun gyis ma mthong ba'i phyir/spangs pa dang /slar la mi byed pa dang /sdig pa la lta ba bslar ma btang bas spangs par ma gyur pa de ni mi gnas pa
325a1('dul ba): ste/so sor gnas pa ma yino//so sor gnas la mi gnas pa ma yin pa gang zhe na/de 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis ma mthong ba'i phyir spangs pa dang /slar
325a2('dul ba): las mi byed pa dang /sdig pa la lta ba slar ma btang nas/spangs par ni gyur gyi/nyes pa bzhi las gang yang rung bar nyes par ma gyur pa de ni so sor gnas la/mi gnas
325a3('dul ba): pa ma yin pa'o//me gnas pa yang yin la/so sor gnas pa gang zhe na/nyes pa bzhi las gang yang rung /nyes pa yang byung bar gyur/ma mthong ba'i phyir spangs pa dang //
325a4('dul ba): slar las mi byed pa dang /sdig pa la lta ba slar ma btang nas spangs par yang 'gyur la/nyes pa bzhi las gang yang rung /nyes pa byung bar gyur na de ni/mi gnas la so
325a5('dul ba): sor gnas pa'o//mi gnas pa yang ma yin la/so sor gnas par yang mi 'gyur ba gang zhe na/de rnams ma gtogs pa'o//de rnams ma gtogs pa ni mi gnas pa
325a6('dul ba): so sor gnas pa ma yino//gang gis spangs par bgyi ba de bskur ba zhes kyang bgyi 'am/gsungs pa gang gis spangs pa de bskur ba yang de nyid//las gang lags/dngos po gung laT+Ta/
325a7('dul ba): nyes pa 'byin par byed pa lag so//bshags pa ni dngos po'o//brtan pa ni gang lags/brtan pa gding ba ni gang lags/brtan pa dbyung ba ni gang lags/u pa li ges de
325b1('dul ba): ming ni brtan pa zhes bya'o//der sems bskyed pa ni brtan pa bting ba'o//rnam pa brgyad du bsams pa ni brtun pa phyung ba'o//dge slong ma lags par nongs par byung la/dge slong du gyur na//
325b2('dul ba): tshangs par 'gyur ba mchis sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/yod de ji ltar dge slong ma yin pa la nyes pa byung la/dge slong du gyur na tshangs par 'gyur zhe na/
325b3('dul ba): 'di ltar dge slong ma'i tshe thun mong ma yin pa'i dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i nyes pa byung ba las/de mtshan 'phos te/mtshan 'phos nas dge slong pho'i nang du 'ongs na nyes pa tshangs
325b4('dul ba): zhes bya'o//ji ltar na dge slong gi tshe nongs par byung la/dge slong ma lags pa'i tshe/tshangs pa zhes bgyi/de 'di ltar dge slong gi tshe mi 'drab/dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i nyes pa byung ba
325b5('dul ba): laso/de mtshan 'phos te/mtshan 'phos nas dge slong mar gyur na/de nyes pa tshangs pa zhes bya'o//mi 'tshal bzhin du nongs pa byung la 'tshal bzhin du tshangs par
325b6('dul ba): 'gyur ba mchis sam/'tshal bzhin du nongs pa byung la ma 'tshal bzhin du tshangs par 'gyur ba mchis sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/yod de ji ltar mi
325b7('dul ba): bzhin du nyes pa byung la/shes bzhin tshangs par 'gyur zhe na/de 'di ltar dge slong gi nyid kyis log pa las bteg ste/mel stan chen po mthon po'i steng du bzhag pa'o//
326a1('dul ba): yang na gnyid kyis log pa las bud med kyi mal du bzhug pa'o//bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa'i phyir phyung ste/nyalta ba dang /de'i 'og tu bstan
326a2('dul ba): par ma rdzogs pa de slar 'ongs te/'dug nas bdag sad nas nyes pa de nyid ji ltar chos bzhin par slar byed pa de ni slar mi shes bzhin du nyes pa byung ste/shes
326a3('dul ba): nas tshungs par gyur pa'o//shos bzhin du nyes pa byung la/mi shes bzhin du tshangs par 'gyur ba gang zhe na/de 'di ltar dge slong dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i nyes pa
326a4('dul ba): byung ste/de dbyung bar lus kyi tshig rnams byed de/gsol ba byas pa dang /de dag gnyid kyis log nAs/las kyi tshig gsum mjug tu phyin pa dang /langs pa
326a5('dul ba): de lta bu ni shes bzhin du nyes pa byung la/mi shes bzhin tshangs par gyur pa'o//gnyid log pa'i tshe nongs pa byung la/sad pa'i tshe tshongs par 'gyur ba
326a6('dul ba): mchis sam/sad pa'i tshe nongs pa byung la gnyid log pa'i tshe tshangs par 'gyur ba mchis sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/yod de gnyid log
326a7('dul ba): ba'i tshe nyes pa byung ba las sad pa'i tshe tshangs par 'gyur ba gang zhe na/de 'di ltar dge slong gnyid kyis log pa las mal stan mthun po'i mal stan chen po'i
326b1('dul ba): steng du bteg ste bzhag pa dang /yang gnyid kyis log pa las bud med kyi mal du bzhag pa dang /bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa phyir phyung ste/nyal ba'i 'og tu bsnyen par mya
326b2('dul ba): rdzogs pa de slar 'ongs te/'dug nas bdag sdud nas nyes pa 'di nyid ji ltar chos bzhin slar byed pa de nI gnyid log bzhin nyes pa byung la de nas tshangs par gyur pa'o//
326b3('dul ba): sred bzhin du nyes pa byung la/gnyid log bzhin tshangs par 'gyur ba gang zhe na/'di ltar dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis lhag ma'i nyes pa byung ste/de 'byung bar las
326b4('dul ba): kyis tshig rnams byed de gsol ba byas pa dang /nga gnyin kyis log nas las kyi tshig gsum mjug tu phyin pa dang /langs pa de lta bu ni sad bzhin nyes pa byung la
326b5('dul ba): gnyid log bzhin tshongs par gyur pa'o//dge slong gis gcig smras pa/mjug tu phyin nAs/ngas phas pham pa gsum 'byung bar 'gyur ba mchis sam/bcom
326b6('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/yod/de 'di ltar dge slong gis dge slong ma dang lhan cig tu 'di skad du/gang gi tshe mthong ba na khyim bdag 'di zhes bya ba rdzas rin
326b7('dul ba): thang che ba zhig ma byin par blangs pa dang /mi 'tsho ba dang bral ba dang /ngas dgra bcom pa yang thob par khyod kyis shes par gyis shog/de thams cad dge slong mas
327a1('dul ba): tshig gcig rdzogs par smras na pus pham pa bzhi 'byung bar 'gyur ba mchis sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/yod//de ltar
327a2('dul ba): dge slong ma zhig dge slong ma dang lhan cig 'di skad du gang gi tshe/khyod kho bo mthong ba na/khyim bdag 'di zhes bya ba las/rdzas shig ma byin par blangs/mi 'tsho ba
327a3('dul ba): dang phral ba dang /'di zhes bya ba'i rdzas phrogs pa dang /kho bos/dgra bcom pa thob pa de ltar shes par byos shig/dge slong gnas gcig na mchis bzhin du nongs
327a4('dul ba): pa'i phung po lnga 'byung ba mchis sam bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa yod ston pa'i chos gos kyi tshad tsam spyad na nyes bya su 'gyur/bslab pa'i sdom pa
327a5('dul ba): bcas pa'i grong nas rang gi lag gis bza' ba dang /bca' ba blangs na so sor bshags par 'gyuraro//bud med la chog lnga 'am drug las lhag par chos bstan
327a6('dul ba): na ltung ba'o//bud med la gnas ngan len gyi tshig smras na dge 'dun gyi lhag mar 'gyuraro//myed la kun tu med bzhin du mi las bla mar gyur pa'i chos bdag
327a7('dul ba): nyid kyis smras na phas pham par 'gyur ro//dge slong sbyor ba gcig gis nongs pa brgya'am/stong ngam/de bas kyang mang du 'gyur ba mchis sam/bcom
327b1('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/yod 'di ltar dge slong zhig 'chi ga khros tshig pa zos te yid 'khrugs nas/skye bo mang po 'dus shing 'khod pa la sran ma sbar ba gang
327b2('dul ba): ngam/phye sbar ba gang yang rung des gtor na/des ji skad phog de snyed kyi nyes par 'gyuraro//dge slong zhig gis rdza so rin thang che ba zhig gnas nas gan su bskyod kyang phas
327b3('dul ba): baM par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/yod de mi ma yin pa'i rdzas rin thang che ba 'am/de ste ma sha lngar mi chog pa'o//dge slong
327b4('dul ba): gis ma sha gsum rkus na phas pham par 'gyur du mchis sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/yod de ma sha rin thang che bar 'gyur ro//dge slong gis ma sha
327b5('dul ba): lnga nus kyang phas pham par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/yod de kar sha pa na rin thang chung bar gyur pa'o//chung ngu zhig ma byin
327b6('dul ba): par blangs pas nongs par 'gyur ba dang /chung ngu de nyid ma byin par blangs pas nongs par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa yod
327b7('dul ba): de/shog bal las chung ngu blangs na nyes par 'gyuraro//bal nog po las chung ngu blangs na nyes par mi 'gyuraro//mnyam par 'gyur ba las lhag par bgyis kyang nongs
328a1('dul ba): bar 'gyur ba dang /mnyam par ba bra las lhag par 'artson d+ha/nongs par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis gyu
328a2('dul ba): sprul pa/yod nag pa mnyam par bya ba las lhag par byas na nyes par 'gyur/gribs mnyam par bya ba las lhag par byas pa la nyes par mi 'gyuraro//
328a3('dul ba): dgyi ba las ma dkris te nongs par 'gyur ba dang /bgyis te nongs par myi 'gyur mchis sam/bcomo ldan 'das kyis bko' stsal pa/yod de gas sar
328a4('dul ba): bya rnyed pa'i dge slong gis kha dog bsgyur ba gsum las gang yang rung /kha dog bsgyur ba ma byas na nyes pa'o//de ltar byas na nyes pa medado//chad bzhin bgyis nA
328a5('dul ba): rmongs par 'gyur ba dang /tshad bzhin pa myis nongs par ma gyur bya mchi smras ma/bcom ldan 'das kyis+'u kr-I stsal pa yod/de bzhin gshugs pa
328a6('dul ba): chos gos kyi tshad du bgyis nanyes par 'gyur//dkyil 'khor gyi tshad du bgyis na nyes par mi 'gyur//dngos po gang gis bsamya gtan dang po la snyoms par
328a7('dul ba): zhugs na/dge 'dun gyi lhag mar 'gyur ba'i dngas po de nyid kyis/bsami brgyan gnyis padang /gsum pa dang /bzhi pa la snyoms par zhugs na/dge
328b1('dul ba): 'dun gyi lkog mar 'gyur ba mchis sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/yod/'di ltar dge slong des bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa na bdag
328b2('dul ba): gikha paM brtsigs shig ces bsgon de skad bsgo ma theg tu bas mu gtan dang po lnga snyoms par bzhugs de bsam gtan dang pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'i tshe//khang pa
328b3('dul ba): yang zin par gyur na/de la dge 'dun gyi lhag mar 'gyuraro//de'i dngos po de nyid kyi phyir bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /gsum pa dang bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa
328b4('dul ba): na/des nga'i khang pa brtsegs shig ces bsgo ste/bsgo ma thag tu bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /gsum pa dang bzhi pa la snyoms par zhugs te/de bsam gtan
328b5('dul ba): bzhi pa la snyoms par zhugs pa dang /khyang pa yang zin par gyur na/dge 'dun gyi lhag mar 'gyur ro//dge slong gis gang na yang nongs par ma bgyis la/chung ngu na
328b6('dul ba): nyes byas tsam yang ma bgyis nA/dge slong du mi rung ba mchis sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/yod de mtshan 'phos par gyur pa'o//dge slong
328b7('dul ba): mas gang na yang nongs pa ma bgyis la/chung ngu ni smad g.yog rked pa las brlabs te/bgo ba tsam yang ma bgyis par dge slong mar mi rung ba mchis sam
329a1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bkA' stsa la la/maud de mtshan 'phos pa'o//dge slong gtsug lag khang gi nang du zhugs la/de nyid kyi nang na
329a2('dul ba): chos gos 'dug bzhin/dbyar zhig pa zhes kyang bgyi/chos gos dang bral ba zhes kyang bgyi/yi dam las 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur pa mchis sam/
329a3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/yod de 'di ltar dge slong dbyar tshul du zhugs pa las/tha ma'i mdun po la bab ste/byin gyis ma brlabs par chos
329a4('dul ba): gos kyang khri 'am/khri'u 'am/gdang la gzhag nas/steng gi na mkha' la 'dug bzhin du/skya reng shar na de dbyar zhig pa zhes kyang bya/chos gos dang bral
329a5('dul ba): ba zhes kyang bya/yi dam las 'gal bas 'dres pa dang btsas pa zhes kyang bya'o//dge slong gcig bu gtsug lag khang gi nang du zhugs no/phas pham par
329a6('dul ba): 'gyur ba mchis samya/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/yod/mi tshangs par spyod pa ste/gang zhe na/mtshan rings dang rgyab mnyeno//ma byin
329a7('dul ba): par len pa dang /srog gcod pa gang zhe na/dge slong des las sbyar te nang du zhugs pa dang /des brkus par yang gyur/srog bcad par yang gyur pa'o///
329b1('dul ba): brdzun du smra ba'i rgyu gang zhe na/de 'di ltar nga ni dgra bcom pa'o//nga ni sangs rgyaso zhes zer ba'o//dge slong gis dge slong gi 'tsho ba dang phral na/pha yang ma laDa//
329b2('dul ba): ma yang ma lags bzhin du phas pham par yang 'gyur la/de mtshams med pa'i la su yang 'gyur ba mchis sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/yod
329b3('dul ba): de/de 'di ltar dge slong de'i ma rab tu byung ste/bsnyen par rdzogs par gyur pa las mtshan 'phos te/mtshan 'phos par gyur pa las/srog bcad na phas pham
329b4('dul ba): ba yin la/de mtshams med pa'i las kyis kyang reg par 'gyuraro//dge slong mas dge slong ma'i 'tsho ba dang phral na/ma yang ma lags/dgra bcom pa yang ma
329b5('dul ba): lags na/phas pham par 'gyur zhing /de mtshams med pa'i la su yang 'gyur ba mchis sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/yo/dge slong ma de'i
329b6('dul ba): pha rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par gyur pa de'i mtshan 'phos te/mtshon 'phos nas/de'i 'tsho ba dang phral na phas pham pa yang yin la de mtshams med pa'i
329b7('dul ba): lasu yang 'gyuraro//gzhan gyis smras la des smras pa'i rkyen gyis gzhan la phas pham par 'gyur ba mchis sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
330a1('dul ba): yod de 'di ltar dge sbyong mas dge 'dun 'dus pa dge 'dun gyis ma mchis pa'i phyir/de'i rje su phyogs te/de yang dge 'dun rgyu
330a2('dul ba): dbu su lan gsum gyi bar bsgo yang mi gtong bA de ni phas pham par 'gyur ro//gzhan gyis smras na des smras pa'i rkyen gyis gzhan la dge 'dun gyi lhag mar
330a3('dul ba): 'gyur ba mchis sam+ba/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/yod de de 'di ltar gang gis dge 'dun gyi dbyen byas pa dang /de'i rjesu phyogs pa dang /
330a4('dul ba): bka' blo mi bde ba'i tshig dge 'dun gyi nang du lan gsum gyi bar du bsgo yang slar mi gtong ba ni/dge 'dun gyi lhag mar 'gyuraro//gzhan gyis smras na de'i
330a5('dul ba): rkyen gyis gzhan la nongs par 'gyur ba mchis sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/yod de/de 'di ltar dge slong gang gis sdig pa la lha bzung
330a6('dul ba): rab tu bzung nas/slar mi gtong ba de/dge 'dun gyi nang du len ga sum gyi bar du bsgo yang slar mi gtong ba ni ltung bar 'gyur ro//gzhan gyis smras pa'i rkyen
330a7('dul ba): gyis gzhan la slar bshags par 'gyur ba mchis sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/yod 'di ltar dge slong gang gis grong du 'gron du bos te/
330b1('dul ba): zas za ba'i tshe de na yang dge slong ma zhig sgo zhing 'dug ste/'di la 'bras byin 'di la sran tshod byin/'di la yang byin zhes zer ba de la ma bsgo bar zos na slar bshags/
330b2('dul ba): par 'gyuraro//gzhan gyis smras pa de'i rkyen gyis gzhan la nongs par 'gyur ba mchis sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/yod de 'di ltar dge slong gang
330b3('dul ba): gis so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pa'i tshe dge 'dun gyi nang du lan gsum gyi bar du bsgrags kyang /nyes pa dran bzhin du slar mi 'chags pa ni nyes bya su 'gyuraro//btsun
330b4('dul ba): pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong mas bslab pa phul na/slar dge slong ma'i dngos por bsnyen par rdzogasu mi rung ste/dge slong ma gang dag gi sla rab tu phyung ngam/
330b5('dul ba): bsnyen par rdzogs par byas na/de dag nyes pa dang bcaso zhes gsungs na/dge slong mas bslab pa phul te babs pa las de de dag gis rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen par
330b6('dul ba): rdzogs par bgyis na/bsnyen par rdzogs pa yang lags la de dag la yang nongs par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/yod de/
330b7('dul ba): de 'di ltar dge slong ma de bslab pa phul ste babs pa las/de'i mtshan 'phos te/mtshan 'phos par gyur pa de rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par byas na/nyes
